anya-e0201n0:969: Himavanto pabbato dha. pa. 304, himavā pabbato.
anya-e0201n0:970: 126. Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse ka. 93; rū. 106; nī. 251.
anya-e0201n0:971: Aṃ, sesu ntassa ca ntussa ca sabbassa ṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:972: ‘‘Ajjhogāhetvā himava’’nti apa. thera 2.47.59 pāḷi. Satimaṃ, bandhumaṃ, guṇavassa, satimassa, bandhumassa.
anya-e0201n0:973: Mahāvuttinā kvaci simhi ge ca pare ntussa attaṃ hoti, ‘‘atulo nāma nāmena, paññavanto jutindharo’’ti bu. vaṃ. 21.10 ca ‘‘gatimanto satimanto, dhitimanto ca yo isī’’ti theragā. 1052 ca ‘‘cakkhumanto mahāyaso’’ti ca ‘‘tuyhaṃ pitā mahāvīra, paññavanta jutindharā’’ti apa. therī 2.2.389 ca pāḷī.
anya-e0201n0:974: Paṭhamāyomhi kvaci ntussa ṭa hoti, vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pārā. 194, etha tumhe āvuso sīlavā hotha a. ni. 5.114, cakkhumā andhakā honti, ye itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gatā jā. aṭṭha. 2.3.36, saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutimā bhavanti su. ni. 887 (saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutīmā).
anya-e0201n0:978: Simhi ntassa aṃ hoti vā. Silopo.
anya-e0201n0:979: Gacchaṃ, gacchanto, gacchantā, gacchanto, bho gaccha, bho gacchā, bho gacchaṃ, bhonto gacchantā, bhonto gacchanto, gacchantaṃ, gacchante, gacchantena, gacchatā, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi, gacchantassa, gacchato, gacchantānaṃ, gacchataṃ, gacchantasmā, gacchantamhā, gacchantā, gacchatā, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi, gacchantassa, gacchato, gacchantānaṃ, gacchataṃ, gacchantasmiṃ, gacchantamhi, gacchati, gacchante, gacchantesu.
anya-e0201n0:980: Evaṃ karaṃ, kubbaṃ, caraṃ, cavaṃ, jayaṃ, jahaṃ, jānaṃ, jiraṃ, dadaṃ, dahaṃ, juhaṃ, suṇaṃ, pacaṃ, saraṃ, bhuñjaṃ, muñcaṃ, sayaṃ, saraṃ, haraṃ, tiṭṭhaṃ, bhavissaṃ, karissaṃ, gamissaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:982: ‘Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse’ti aṃ, sesu ntassa ṭattaṃ, yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ. Sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati jā. 1.15.181. Kiccānukrubbassa kareyya kiccaṃ jā. 1.2.145 – anukrubbassāti puna karontassa.
anya-e0201n0:983: Mahāvuttinā paṭhamāyomhi ca savibhattissa ntassa aṃ hoti, api nu tumhe ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ viharatha dī. ni. 1.425, kasaṃ khettaṃ bījaṃ vapaṃ, dhanaṃ vindanti māṇavā therīgā. 112, bharanti mātāpitaro, pubbe katamanussaraṃ a. ni. 5.39.
anya-e0201n0:985: Simhi etesaṃ ntassa ṭā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:986: Mahā, mahaṃ, mahanto, mahantā, mahanto, bho maha, bho mahā, bho mahaṃ, bhonto mahantā, bhonto mahanto, mahantaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:987: ‘Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃse’ti aṃmhi ntassa ṭattaṃ, ‘‘sumahaṃ puraṃ, parikkhipissa’’nti jā. 2.22.792 pāḷi-suṭṭhu mahantaṃ bārāṇasipuranti attho. Sesaṃ gacchantasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:988: Arahā tiṭṭhati. ‘Ntassaṃ simhī’ti simhi ntassa aṃ, arahaṃ sugato loke saṃ. ni. 1.161, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pārā. 1, arahantā, arahanto, arahantaṃ, arahante, arahantena, arahatā, arahantehi, arahantebhi, arahantassa, arahato, arahantānaṃ, arahataṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:989: Mahāvuttinā brahmantassa ca ntassa ṭā hoti simhi, brahā, brahanto, brahantā, brahanto, brahantaṃ, brahante iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:990: ‘‘Sā parisā mahā hoti, sā senā dissate mahā’’ti jā. 2.22.771 ca ‘‘mahā bhante bhūmicālo’’ti a. ni. 8.70 ca ‘‘mahā te upāsaka pariccāgo’’ti jā. aṭṭha. 4.13.akittijātakavaṇṇanā ca ‘‘mahā me bhayamāgata’’nti ca ‘‘bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā’’ti jā. aṭṭha. 1.1.mahāsīlavajātakavaṇṇanā ca ‘‘mahāssa honti parivārā brāhmaṇagahapatikā, mahāssa honti parivārā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo’’ti dī. ni. 3.204 ca ‘‘mahā vahanti dudiṭṭhiṃ, saṅkappā rāganissitā’’ti ca pāḷī. Atra mahāsaddo nipātapaṭirūpakopi siyā.
anya-e0201n0:992: Bhūdhātusiddhato ntassa aṃ hoti simhi. Suddhe niccaṃ, upapade aniccaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:993: Bhavaṃ tiṭṭhati, sampattiṃ anubhavaṃ, anubhavanto, taṇhaṃ abhibhavaṃ, abhibhavanto, dukkhaṃ paribhavaṃ, paribhavanto tiṭṭhati, bhavantā, bhavanto, he bhavanta, he bhavantā, he bhavanto, he bhava, he bhavā, he bhavaṃ. ‘‘Kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi araññe’’ti jā. 2.18.18 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:994: He bhavantā, he bhavanto, bhavantaṃ, bhavante, bhavantena, bhavatā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi, bhavantassa, bhavato, bhavantānaṃ, bhavataṃ, bhavantasmā, bhavantamhā, bhavantā, bhavatā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi, bhavantassa, bhavato, bhavantānaṃ, bhavataṃ, bhavantasmiṃ, bhavantamhi, bhavati, bhavante, bhavantesu.
anya-e0201n0:995: 130. Bhavato vā bhonto gayonāse ka. 243; rū. 8, 110; nī. 484.
anya-e0201n0:996: Ga, yo, nā, sesu bhavantassa bhonto hoti vā. Suttavibhattena aṃ, hi, naṃ, smādīsu ca.
anya-e0201n0:997: Bhontā, bhonto, he bhonta, he bhontā, he bhonto, bhontaṃ, bhonte, bhontena, bhotā, bhontehi, bhontebhi, bhontassa, bhoto, bhontānaṃ, bhotaṃ, bhontasmā, bhontamhā, bhontā, bhotā, bhontehi, bhontebhi, bhontassa, bhoto, bhontānaṃ, bhotaṃ, bhontasmiṃ, bhontamhi, bhoti, bhonte, bhontesu.
anya-e0201n0:998: Bho, bhanteti dve vuddhiatthe siddhā āmantanatthe nipātā eva, tehi paraṃ ga, yonaṃ lopo, ito bho sugatiṃ gaccha itivu. 83, ummujjabho puthusile, kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā jā. 1.9.87, passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, ehi bhante khamāpehi, so te bhikkhū khamāpesi ‘‘khamatha bhante’’ti. Tathā bhaddante, bhaddantāti dve ‘‘tuyhaṃ bhaddaṃ hotu, tumhākaṃ bhaddaṃ hotū’’ti atthe siddhā āmantananipātāva, ‘‘bhaddante’’ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ saṃ. ni. 1.249, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, yāvantettha samāgatā jā. 1.7.108. Bhaddanta, bhadantasaddā pana purisādigaṇikā eva.
anya-e0201n0:999: Santasaddo pana sappurise vijjamāne samāne ca pavatto idha labbhati. Sameti asatā asaṃ jā. 1.2.16. Saṃ, santo, santā, santo, bhosanta, bhosantā, bhosa, bho sā, bho saṃ vā, bhonto santā, bhonto santo. Yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ jā. 1.15.180. Sante, santena, satā.
anya-e0201n0:1000: 131. Sato sabba bhe ka. 185; rū. 112; nī. 378.
anya-e0201n0:1001: Bhe pare santassa sabaādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1002: Santehi, santebhi, sabbhi, santassa, sato, santānaṃ, sataṃ, santasmā, santamhā, santā, satā, santehi, santebhi, sabbhi, santassa, sato, santānaṃ, sataṃ, santasmiṃ, santamhi, sati, sante, santesu. Santo sappurisā loke, dūresanto pakāsenti dha. pa. 304, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ a. ni. 4.85, pahusanto na bharati su. ni. 91.
anya-e0201n0:1003: Khede nirodhe ca pavatto santo purisādigaṇādiko, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ dha. pa. 61, santā honti samitā niruddhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1007: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1010: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonaṃ āno hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1013: Bho rāja, bho rājā, bhonto rājāno.
anya-e0201n0:1015: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnañca ānaṅa hoti vā aṃmhi.
anya-e0201n0:1016: Rājānaṃ, rājaṃ, rājāno, caturo ca mahārāje pe. va. 11.
anya-e0201n0:1018: Nā, smāsu rājassa raññā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1024: Su, naṃ, hisu rājassa uhoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1027: Separe savibhattissa rājassa rañño, raññassa, rājino honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1033: Raññaṃ, rājasmā, rājamhā, raññā, rājūhi, rājūbhi, rājehi, rājebhi, rañño, raññassa, rājino, rājassa vā, rājūnaṃ, rājānaṃ, raññaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1035: Smiṃmhi savibhattissa rājassa raññe, rājini honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1036: Raññe, rājini, rājasmiṃ, rājamhi, rājūsu, rājesu.
anya-e0201n0:1038: Samāsaṭṭhāne sabbe te ādesā vikappena honti.
anya-e0201n0:1039: Cattāro mahārājā dī. ni. 2.336, cattāro mahārājāno a. ni. 3.37, devarājānaṃ, devarājaṃ, devarājāno, devarāje, cattāro ca mahārāje, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ jā. 2.22.1394, kāsiraññā, kāsirājena, devarājūhi, devarājehi, kāsirañño, kāsirājassa, devarājūnaṃ, devarājānaṃ…pe… kāsiraññe, kāsirāje, devarājūsu, devarājesu.
anya-e0201n0:1040: Mahāvuttinā rājato yonaṃ ino hoti, ‘‘samantapāsādikā nāma, soḷasāsiṃsu rājino, ekūnatiṃse kappamhi, ito soḷasarājino apa. thera 1.12.54-55 (ekūnatiṃsakappamhi, ito soḷasarājāno), kusarājaṃ mahabbalaṃ jā. 2.20.67, sālarājaṃva pupphitaṃ apa. thera 1.42.86, uḷurājaṃva sobhitaṃ, caturo ca mahārāje pe. va. 11, yudhañcayo anuññāto, sabbadattena rājinā jā. 1.11.81, tadā adāsi maṃ tāto, bimbisārassa rājino apa. therī. 2.2.326, nikkhamante mahārāje, pathavī sampakampatha’’ iccādīni pāḷipadāni.
anya-e0201n0:1041: Brahmā, brahmāno, bho brahma, bho brahmā. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa ettaṃ, bho brahme, bhonto brahmāno, brahmānaṃ, brahmaṃ, brahmāno.
anya-e0201n0:1046: Sa, naṃsu brahmassa u hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1047: 144. Jhalā sassa no ka. 117; rū. 124; nī. 292.
anya-e0201n0:1050: 145. Smā nāva brahmā ca ka. 270; rū. 120; nī. 542.
anya-e0201n0:1051: Attā’tumehi ca brahmato ca smāssa nā viya rūpaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1052: Brahmunā, brahmasmā, brahmamhā, brahmuno, brahmassa, brahmūnaṃ, brahmānaṃ. ‘Kammādito’ti suttena smiṃno ni hoti, brahmasmiṃ, brahmamhi, brahmani, brahme, brahmesu.
anya-e0201n0:1053: Attā, attāno, bho atta, bho attā, bhonto attāno, attānaṃ, attaṃ, attāno. ‘Nāsseno’ti vikappena nāssa enattaṃ, attanā, attena.
anya-e0201n0:1055: Su, hisu attā’tumānaṃ anto anaka hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1059: Attano, attassa, attānaṃ, attasmā, attamhā, attā, attanā, attanehi, attanebhi, attehi, attebhi, attano, attassa, attānaṃ, attasmiṃ, attamhi, attani, atte, attesu, attanesu.
anya-e0201n0:1060: Samāse pana purisādirūpaṃ hoti, pahito attā etenāti pahitatto, pahitattā, pahitattaṃ, pahitatte, pahitattena, pahitattehi, pahitattebhi, pahitattassa, pahitattānaṃ, pahitattasmā, pahitattamhā, pahitattā, pahitattehi, pahitattebhi, pahitattassa, pahitattānaṃ, pahitattasmiṃ, pahitattamhi, pahitatte, pahitattesu.
anya-e0201n0:1061: Ātumā, ātumāno, ātumānaṃ, ātumaṃ, ātumāno, ātumanā, ātumena, ātumanehi, ātumanebhi, ātumano, ātumassa, ātumānaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1063: 148. Āyo no ca sakhā ka. 191; rū. 130; nī. 394.
anya-e0201n0:1064: Sakhato yonaṃ āyo ca no ca honti vā āno ca.
anya-e0201n0:1067: No, nā, sesu sakhantassa i hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1069: Suttavibhattena ttapaccayamhi ittaṃ, ‘‘sakhittaṃ kareyya, sakhittaṃ na kareyyā’’ti theragā. 1017 (sakhitaṃ) pāḷī.
anya-e0201n0:1071: Yosu aṃ, hi, smā, naṃsu sakhantassa āraṅa hoti. ‘Ṭoṭe vā’ti suttena ārādesato yonaṃ kamena ṭo, ṭe honti.
anya-e0201n0:1072: Sakhāro tiṭṭhanti. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa vikappena ettaṃ, bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhe, hare sakhā kissa maṃ jahāsi jā. 1.6.94.
anya-e0201n0:1073: ‘‘Sakhi, sakhīti dvayaṃ itthiyaṃ siddha’’nti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1074: Bhonto sakhāno, bhonto sakhāyo, bhonto sakhino, bhonto sakhāro, sakhānaṃ, sakhāraṃ, sakhaṃ, sakhāno, sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāre, sakhāro, sakhinā, sakhārena, sakhena, sakhārehi, sakhārebhi, sakhehi, sakhebhi, sakhissa, sakhino, sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1076: Smā, naṃsu sakhantassa i hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1077: Sakhīnaṃ, sakhismā, sakhimhā, sakhā, sakhinā, sakhārasmā, sakhāramhā, sakhārā, sakhārehi, sakhārebhi, sakhehi, sakhebhi, sakhissa, sakhino, sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ, sakhīnaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1079: Sakhato smiṃno ṭe hoti. Niccatthamidaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1080: Sakhe, sakhāresu, sakhesu. ‘‘Netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā’’ti jā. 1.7.9 pāḷi. Purisādinayena yonaṃ vidhi.
anya-e0201n0:1081: Samāse pana sabbaṃ purisādirūpaṃ labbhati, ‘‘sabbamitto sabbasakho, pāpamitto pāpasakho’’ti dī. ni. 3.253 ca pāḷi. Pāpasakho, pāpasakhā, pāpasakhaṃ, pāpasakhe, pāpasakhena, pāpasakhehi, pāpasakhebhi…pe… pāpasakhasmiṃ, pāpasakhamhi, pāpasakhe, pāpasakhesu.
anya-e0201n0:1084: Yuva, pumādīhi paṭhamā, dutiyāyonaṃ kamena no, ne honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1086: No, nā, nesu yuvādīnaṃ anto ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1087: Yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvā, he yuva, he yuvā, he yuvāno, he yuvā vā, yuvānaṃ, yuvaṃ, yuvāne, yuve, yuvena, yuvānā.
anya-e0201n0:1089: Yuva, pumādīnaṃ anto ānaṅa hoti vā su, hisu.
anya-e0201n0:1095: Yuva, pumādīhi smā, smiṃnaṃ nā, ne honti vā. ‘Nonānesvā’ti nāmhi āttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1096: Yuvānā, yuvānehi, yuvānebhi, yuvehi, yuvebhi, yuvassa, yuvino, yuvānaṃ, yuvasmiṃ, yuvamhi, yuve, yuvāne, yuvānesu, yuvesu.
anya-e0201n0:1097: Rūpasiddhiyaṃ pana ‘‘maghava, yuvādīnamantassa ānādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsū’’ti rū. 140; nī. 343 vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1098: Pumā, pumāno, he puma, he pumā.
anya-e0201n0:1101: He pumaṃ, he pumāno, pumānaṃ, pumaṃ, pumāne, pume.
anya-e0201n0:1105: 160. Pumakammathāmaddhānaṃ vā sasmāsu ca ka. 157, 159; rū. 139, 140; nī. 338, 140.
anya-e0201n0:1106: Nāmhi ca sa, smāsu ca puma, kamma, thāmaddhānaṃ anto u hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1107: Pumunā, pumānehi, pumānebhi, pumehi, pumebhi, pumassa, pumuno, pumānaṃ, pumasmā, pumamhā, pumānā, pumunā, pumānehi, pumānebhi, pumehi, pumebhi, pumuno, pumassa, pumānaṃ, pumasmiṃ, pumamhi, pume.
anya-e0201n0:1109: Pumato smiṃno ne hoti vā. ‘Nonānesvā’ti pumantassa āttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1112: Sumhi pumantassa ā ca hoti āne ca.
anya-e0201n0:1114: Si, yonaṃ purisādividhi ca hoti, ‘‘yathā balākayonimhi, na vijjati pumo sadā apa. thera 1.1.511, soḷasitthisahassānaṃ, na vijjati pumo tadā cariyā 3.49, itthī hutvā svajja pumomhi devo dī. ni. 2.354, thiyo tassa pajāyanti, na pumā jāyare kule’’ti jā. 1.8.54 pāḷī.
anya-e0201n0:1115: Maghavasaddo yuvasaddasadisoti rūpasiddhiyaṃ rū. 66 vuttaṃ, guṇavādigaṇikoti saddanītiyaṃ nī. pada. 220 icchito. Aghanti dukkhaṃ pāpañca vuccati, na aghaṃ maghaṃ, sukhaṃ puññañca, magho iti purāṇaṃ nāmaṃ assa atthīti maghavāti saṃ. ni. 1.259 attho pāḷiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1116: Thāmasaddo purisādigaṇo, thāmena, thāmunā, thāmassa, thāmuno, thāmasmā, thāmamhā, thāmā, thāmunā, thāmassa, thāmuno. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1117: Addhā vuccati kālo. Nādyekavacanesu-dīghena addhunā, addhanā, addhena, dīghassa addhuno, addhussa, addhassa, addhunā, addhumhā, addhusmā, addhā, addhamhā, addhasmā, addhuno, addhussa, addhassa, addhani, addhe, addhamhi, addhasminti cūḷamoggallāne āgataṃ. Sesaṃ yuvasadisaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1118: Upaddhavācako addhasaddo idha na labbhati, ekaṃsatthavācako ca nipāto eva. ‘‘Addhānamaggappaṭipanno’’tiādīsu addhānasaddo pana visuṃ siddho napuṃsakaliṅgova.
anya-e0201n0:1119: Muddhasadde ‘‘muddhā te phalatu sattadhā, muddhā me phalatu sattadhā’’ iccādīsu jā. 1.16.295; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.tissattheravatthu siro vuccati, ‘‘pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito’’ iccādīsu dī. ni. 2.70 matthakaṃ vuccati, tadubhayaṃ idha labbhati, smiṃvacane muddhanīti siddhaṃ, sesaṃ yuvasamaṃ. Bālavācako pana purisanayo. Hatthamuṭṭhivācako itthiliṅgo.
anya-e0201n0:1120: Asmā vuccati pāsāṇo, usmā vuccati kāyaggi, bhismā vuccati bhayānako mahākāyo.
anya-e0201n0:1121: Tattha asmasadde ‘‘taṃ te paññāya bhindāmi, āmaṃ pakkaṃva asmanā su. ni. 445, mā tvaṃ cande khali asmanī’’ti pāḷī. Sesaṃ yuvasamaṃ. Usmā, bhismāsaddāpi yuvasadisāti vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:1122: Cūḷamoggallāne muddha, gāṇḍīvadhanva, aṇima, laghimādayo ca asmasadisāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1123: Yattha suttavidhānaṃ na dissati, tattha mahāvuttinā vā suttavibhattena vā rūpaṃ vidhiyati.
anya-e0201n0:1128: ‘Ekavacanayosvaghona’nti yosu ca ekavacanesu ca rasso, ‘ato yona’miccādinā vidhānaṃ, sā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1130: Aṃ, sesu ge ca sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1131: Bho sāna, bhonto sā, saṃ, sānaṃ, se, sena, sāhi, sābhi, sassa, sānassa, sānaṃ, sasmā, samhā, sā, sāhi, sābhi, sassa, sānassa, sānaṃ, sasmiṃ, samhi, se, sāsu.
anya-e0201n0:1132: Atha vā ‘sāssaṃse cānaṅa’iti sutte casaddo avuttasamuccayatthopi hotītikatvā sito sesāsu vibhattīsupi ānaṅa hoti vā, mahāvuttinā ca ānādesato yonaṃ o.
anya-e0201n0:1133: Sā gacchati, sāno gacchanti, sā vā, he sa, he sā, he sāna, he sā, he sāno, saṃ, sānaṃ, se, sāne iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1135: Sā tiṭṭhati, sā tiṭṭhanti, sāno tiṭṭhanti, bho sā, bhonto sā, sāno, sānaṃ, sāne, sānā, sānehi, sānebhi, sāssa, sānaṃ, sānā, sānehi, sānebhi, sāssa, sānaṃ, sāne, sānesūti nīti. pada. 211.
anya-e0201n0:1138: Vattahato sassa no hoti, naṃvacanassa nānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1139: Vattahāno deti, vattahānānaṃ deti. Sesaṃ yuvasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1140: Saddanītiyaṃ pana nā, sesu vattahinā, vattahinoti nīti. pada. 219; (tattha nāmhi vattahānāti dissati) vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1141: Daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammāno. ‘‘Sikkhitā daḷhadhammino’’tipi saṃ. ni. 1.209 pāḷi. Bho daḷhadhammā, bhonto daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammāno, daḷhadhammino, daḷhadhammānaṃ, daḷhadhammāne, daḷhadhamminā, daḷhadhammehi. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ. Evaṃ paccakkhadhammāti. Vivaṭacchadasadde pana nāmhi ittaṃ natthi, sesaṃ daḷhadhammasamaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘daḷhadhammoti vissuto’’ti jā. 2.22.300 ca ‘‘loke vivaṭacchado’’ti dī. ni. 1.258 ca diṭṭhattā ete saddā purisarūpā akārantāpi yujjanti.
anya-e0201n0:1142: Vuttasirā vuccati navavoropitakeso, vuttasirā brāhmaṇo, vuttasirā, vuttasirāno, vuttasirānaṃ, vuttasirāne, vuttasirānā, vuttasirānehi. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘kāpaṭiko māṇavo vuttasiro’’tipi ma. ni. 2.426 dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1143: Rahā vuccati pāpadhammo. Rahā, rahā, rahino, rahānaṃ, rahine, rahinā, rahinehi, rahinebhi, rahassa, rahino, rahānaṃ…pe… rahāne, rahānesūti nīti. pada. 217 sabbaṃ saddanītiyaṃ vuttaṃ, idha pana mahāvuttinā siddhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1148: Jha, lato yonaṃ lopo hoti. ‘Yolopanīsu dīgho’ti dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:1150: 166. Yosu jhissa pume ka. 96; rū. 148; nī. 259.
anya-e0201n0:1151: Pulliṅge yosu jhasaññassa i-kārassa ṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1155: Bho muni, ‘ayunaṃ vā dīgho’ti dīgho, bho munī, bhonto munī, bhonto munayo, muniṃ, munī, munayo, muninā, munīhi, munībhi, munissa, munino, munīnaṃ, munismā, munimhā.
anya-e0201n0:1157: Jha, lato smāssa nā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1158: Muninā, munīhi, munībhi, munissa, munino, munīnaṃ, munismiṃ, munimhi, munīsu.
anya-e0201n0:1159: Isi gacchati, isī, isayo, bho isi, bho isī, bhonto isī, bhonto isayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1160: Aggi jalati, aggī, aggayo, bho aggi, bho aggī, bhonto aggī, bhonto aggayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1161: Evaṃ kucchi, muṭṭhi, gaṇṭhi, maṇi, pati, adhipati, gahapati, senāpati, narapati, yati, ñāti, sāti, vatthi, atithi, sārathi, bondi, ādi, upādi, nidhi, vidhi, odhi, byādhi, samādhi, udadhi, upadhi, nirupadhi, dhani, senāni, kapi, dīpi, kimi, timi, ari, hari, giri, kali, bali, sāli, añjali, kavi, ravi, asi, masi, kesi, pesi, rāsi, ahi, vīhiiccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1163: Mahāvuttinā akatarassehipi kehici jhasaññehi yonaṃ no hoti, ‘‘cha munino agāramunino, anagāramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino, munimunino’’ti mahāni. 14 ca ‘‘ñāṇupapannā munino vadantī’’ti ca ‘‘ekamekāya itthiyā, aṭṭhaṭṭha patino siyu’’nti ca jā. 2.21.344 ‘‘patino kiramhākaṃ visiṭṭhanārīna’’ vi. va. 323 nti ca ‘‘haṃsādhipatino ime’’ti jā. 2.21.38 ca suttapadāni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1164: Gāthāsu ‘ghabrahmāditve’ti munito gassa ettañca hoti, porohicco tavaṃ mune apa. thera 1.1.540, dhammadasso tavaṃ mune apa. thera 1.1.540, ciraṃ jīva mahāvīra, kappaṃ tiṭṭha mahāmune apa. thera 1.2.168, paṭiggaṇha mahāmune apa. thera 1.41.83. Tuyhatthāya mahāmuneti apa. thera 1.3.345.
anya-e0201n0:1165: Tehiyeva aṃvacanassa nañca hoti, tamāhu ekaṃ muninaṃ carantaṃ su. ni. 210, muninaṃ monapathesu sikkhamānaṃ jā. 1.8.44, pitaraṃ puttagiddhinaṃ jā. 2.22.2377, sabbakāmasamiddhinaṃ jā. 1.13.103.
anya-e0201n0:1169: Yo no’jja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise jā. 2.22.1164. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa ettañca hoti, nisīdāhi mahāise jā. 2.20.114, tvaṃ no’si saraṇaṃ ise jā. 2.22.1326, putto uppajjataṃ ise jā. 1.14.104.
anya-e0201n0:1171: Isimhā dutiyassa yossa ṭe hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1172: Samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande, sampannacaraṇe ise jā. 1.16.314.
anya-e0201n0:1173: Samāse pana mahesi gacchati, mahesī gacchanti, mahesayo, mahesino. Aṃvacane mahesinanti sijjhati. ‘‘Saṅgāyiṃsu mahesayo vi. va. ganthārambhakathā pe. va. ganthārambhakathā, vānamuttā mahesayo’’ti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe 113 piṭṭhe ca ‘‘na taṃ sammaggatā yaññaṃ, upayanti mahesino, etaṃ sammaggatā yaññaṃ, upayanti mahesino saṃ. ni. 1.120, pahantā mahesino kāme, yena tiṇṇā mahesino’’ti ca ‘‘mahesiṃ vijitāvina’’nti ma. ni. 2.459 ca ‘‘saṅghañcāpi mahesinaṃ, kuñjaraṃva mahesinaṃ, upagantvā mahesinaṃ bu. vaṃ. 9.1, khippaṃ passa mahesinaṃ jā. 2.19.70, katakiccaṃ mahesina’’nti jā. 2.19.102 ca suttapadāni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1175: 170. Sissaggito ni ka. 95; rū. 145; nī. 254; ‘sissāggito ni’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1177: Aggi jalati, aggini jalati, aggī jalanti, aggayo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1178: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘aggi, gini, agginī’’ti tayo aggipariyāyā dissanti – ‘‘rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggī’’ti a. ni. 7.46 ca ‘‘channā kuṭi āhito gini, vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini su. ni. 19, mahāgini sampajjalito theragā. 702 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ), yasmā so jāyate ginī’’ti jā. 1.10.58 ca ‘‘agginiṃ sampajjalitaṃ pavisantī’’ti su. ni. 675 ca. Tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ rūpamālā labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:1179: Seṭṭhi, pati, adhipati, senāpati, atithi, sārathisaddehi ca yonaṃ no hoti, aṃvacanassa naṃ hoti vā, seṭṭhino, seṭṭhinaṃ, patino, patinaṃ, adhipatino, adhipatinaṃ, senāpatino, senāpatinaṃ, atithino, atithinaṃ, sārathino, sārathinanti. Gahapatayo, jānipatayo iccādīni niccarūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1181: ‘Ratthyādīhi ṭo smiṃno’ti smiṃno ṭo hoti, ādismiṃ, ādimhi, ādo, gāthādo, pādādo. ‘‘Ādiṃ, gāthādiṃ, pādādiṃ’’ iccādīsu pana ādhāratthe dutiyā eva ‘‘imaṃ rattiṃ, imaṃ divasaṃ, purimaṃ disaṃ, pacchimaṃ disaṃ, taṃ khaṇaṃ, taṃ layaṃ, taṃ muhuttaṃ’’ iccādīsu viya.
anya-e0201n0:1184: Pume aññapadatthasamāse i-kāramhā paṭhamā, dutiyāyonaṃ kamena no, ne honti vā. Suttavibhattena uttarapadatthasamāsepi kvaci yonaṃ no, ne honti.
anya-e0201n0:1186: Micchādiṭṭhino, sammādiṭṭhino, muṭṭhassatino, upaṭṭhitassatino, asāre sāramatino dha. pa. 11, nimmānaratino devā, ye devā vasavattino saṃ. ni. 1.168, aṭṭhete cakkavattino, dhamme dhammānuvattino saṃ. ni. 5.34, saggaṃ sugatino yanti dha. pa. 126, tomara’ṅkusapāṇino jā. 2.22.223, daṇḍamuggarapāṇino, ariyavuttino, nipakā santavuttino iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1188: Muṭṭhassatine, upaṭṭhitassatine, ariyavuttine, tomara’ṅkusapāṇine jā. 2.22.190 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1189: Vātveva? Micchādiṭṭhī janā gacchanti, micchādiṭṭhī jane passati.
anya-e0201n0:1190: Garū pana ‘‘tomara’ṅkusapāṇayo, atthe visāradamatayo’’ti ka. 253 rūpāni idha icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1191: Aññattheti kiṃ? Micchādiṭṭhiyo dhammā, micchādiṭṭhiyo dhamme.
anya-e0201n0:1192: Pumeti kiṃ? Micchādiṭṭhiniyo itthiyo, micchādiṭṭhīni kulāni.
anya-e0201n0:1194: Pume aññatthe ito smiṃno kvaci ne hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1195: Kataññumhi ca posamhi, sīlavante ariyavuttine jā. 1.10.78. Sabbakāmasamiddhine kule, chattapāṇine, daṇḍapāṇine, tomara’ṅkusapāṇine jā. 2.22.190 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1196: Suttavibhattena ītopi smiṃno kvaci ne hoti, mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine jā. 2.19.96, devavaṇṇine, brahmavaṇṇine, arahantamhi tādine theragā. 1182 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1199: Īkārante ‘simhi nā’napuṃsakassā’ti suttena simhi rassattaṃ natthi, ‘ge vā’ti ge pare vikappena rasso, yosu ca aṃ, nā, sa, smā, smiṃ su ca ‘ekavacanayosvaghona’nti niccaṃ rasso, daṇḍī gacchati. ‘Jantu hetu’ iccādisuttena vikappena yonaṃ lopo, daṇḍī gacchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1201: 173. Yonaṃ none pume ka. 225; rū. 151; nī. 452, 453.
anya-e0201n0:1202: Pume jhasaññamhā ī-kārato paṭhamā, dutiyāyonaṃ kamena no, ne honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1203: Daṇḍino gacchanti, bhodaṇḍi, bho daṇḍī, bhonto daṇḍino, daṇḍiṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1205: Pume jhasaññamhā ī-kārato aṃvacanassa naṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1208: Pume jhīto dutiyāyossa no hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1209: Daṇḍī, daṇḍino, daṇḍine, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi, daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṃ, daṇḍismā, daṇḍimhā, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi, daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṃ, daṇḍismiṃ, daṇḍimhi.
anya-e0201n0:1213: ‘Ne smiṃno kvacī’ti vibhattasuttena smiṃno ne ca hoti, daṇḍine, daṇḍīsu.
anya-e0201n0:1214: Evaṃ cakkī, pakkhī, sukhī, sikhī, cāgī, bhāgī, bhogī, yogī, saṅghī, vācī, dhajī, bhajī, kuṭṭhī, raṭṭhī, dāṭhī, ñāṇī, pāṇī, gaṇī, guṇī, cammī, dhammī, sīghayāyī, pāpakārī, brahmacārī, māyāvī, medhāvī, bhuttāvī, bhayadassāvī, yasassī, tejassī, chattī, pattī, dantī, mantī, sattughātī, sīhanādī, sāmī, piyappasaṃsī. Atthadassī, dhammadassī iccādayo. Gāmaṇī, senānī, sudhī iccādīsu pana smiṃno nittaṃ natthi.
anya-e0201n0:1216: Mahāvuttinā yosu jhī-kārassapi kvaci ṭattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0201n0:1217: ‘‘Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, hatthayo pasadā migā;
anya-e0201n0:1218: Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmiṃ tulyatā jā. 1.2.103.
anya-e0201n0:1219: Purisālū ca hatthayo, saññatā brahmacārayo a. ni. 6.37, apace brahmacārayo’’ti dissanti. Tattha ‘hatthayo’ti hatthino, ‘purisālū’ti purisalolā balavāmukhayakkhiniyo, ‘brahmacārayo’ti brahmacārino, ‘apace’ti pūjeyya.
anya-e0201n0:1220: Sussapi kvaci nesu hoti, susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, verinesu averino dha. pa. 197, verinesu manussesu, viharāma averino. Tattha ‘verinesū’ti verīcittavantesu.
anya-e0201n0:1221: Samāsepi paṭhamāyossa nottaṃ, dutiyāyossa nottaṃ nettañca hoti. Tattha dve nottāni pākaṭāni. Nettaṃ pana vuccate, ‘‘assamaṇe samaṇamānine a. ni. 8.10, nare pāṇātipātine itivu. 93, mañjuke piyabhāṇine jā. 2.22.1721, māladhārine jā. 2.22.1727, kāsikuttamadhārine jā. 2.22.195, vaṇṇavante yasassine dī. ni. 2.282, cāpahatthe kalāpine, ubho bhassaravaṇṇine jā. 2.21.111, brāhmaṇe devavaṇḍine, samuddharati pāṇine apa. therī 2.3.137, evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine’’ti saṃ. ni. 1.136 dissanti. Tattha ‘bhassaravaṇṇine’ti pabhassaravaṇṇavante. Smiṃno nette pana ‘‘mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine’’ iccādīni jā. 2.19.96 pubbe vuttāneva.
anya-e0201n0:1225: ‘Gasīna’nti silopo, bhikkhu. Yonaṃ lope dīgho, bhikkhū.
anya-e0201n0:1227: 177. Lā yonaṃ vo pume ka. 119; rū. 155; nī. 294.
anya-e0201n0:1228: Pume lasaññehi uvaṇṇehi yonaṃ vo hoti vāti yonaṃ vo.
anya-e0201n0:1230: Pume ve, vosu paresu lasaññassa u-kārassa ṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1233: Bho bhikkhu, bho bhikkhū, bhonto bhikkhū.
anya-e0201n0:1235: Pume ālapane lasaññamhā u-kārato yossa ve, vo honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1236: Bhonto bhikkhave, atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘‘bhikkhavo’’ti ma. ni. 1.1, devakāyā abhikkantā, te vijānātha bhikkhavo dī. ni. 2.334, bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo, bhikkhunā. ‘Sunaṃhisū’ti dīgho, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi, bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhusmā, bhikkhumhā, bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi, bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhusmiṃ, bhikkhumhi, bhikkhūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1237: Evaṃ maṅku, maccu, ucchu, paṭu, bhāṇu, setu, ketu, sattu, sindhu, bandhu, kāru, neru, meru, ruru, veḷu iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1239: Hetu, jantu, kurusaddesu ‘jantuhetu’ iccādisuttena vikappena yonaṃ lopo, hetu dhammo, hetū dhammā, atīte hetavo pañca.
anya-e0201n0:1240: 180. Yomhi vā kvaci ka. 97; rū. 156; nī. 260.
anya-e0201n0:1241: Yosu lasaññino u-kārassa kvaci ṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1245: Bho hetu, bho hetū, bhonto hetū, hetavo, hetayo, hetuyo vā, hetuṃ, hetū, hetavo, hetayo, hetuyo vā. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1246: Jantu gacchati, jantū, jantayo, jantuyo vā.
anya-e0201n0:1247: 181. Jantādito no ca ka. 119; rū. 155; nī. 294; ‘jantvādito’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1248: Pume jantādito yonaṃ no ca hoti vo ca.
anya-e0201n0:1249: Jantuno, jantavo, bhojantu, bhojantū, bhonto jantū, jantayo, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo, jantuṃ, jantū, jantayo, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1250: Kuru, kurū, kurayo, kuruyo, kuruno, kuravoti sabbaṃ jantusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1251: ‘‘Ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayātu jā. 2.22.1632, nandanti taṃ kurayo dassanena jā. 2.22.1641, ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayāmī’’ti jā. 2.22.1634 dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:1252: Mahāvuttinā latopi aṃvacanassa kvaci naṃ hoti, ‘‘kimatthinaṃ bhikkhunaṃ āhu, bhikkhunamāhu maggadesiṃ, bhikkhunamāhu maggajīviṃ, buddhaṃ ādiccabandhuna’’nti dissanti, tathā ‘‘roganiḍḍaṃ pabhaṅgunaṃ, bhogānañca pabhaṅgunaṃ dha. pa. 139, viññāṇañca virāguna’’nti ca. Tattha ‘kimatthina’nti kiṃsabhāvaṃ, ‘maggadesi’nti maggaṃ desentaṃ, ‘maggajīvi’nti magge jīvantaṃ, ‘roganiḍḍa’nti rogānaṃ kulāvakabhūtaṃ, ‘pabhaṅguna’nti pabhijjanasīlaṃ, ‘virāguna’nti virajjanasīlaṃ. Katthaci paṭhamantampi dissati, tattha nāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:1257: Simhi pare ltupaccayantānaṃ satthu, kattuiccādīnaṃ pitādīnañca u-kāro ā hoti. ‘Gasīna’nti lopo.
anya-e0201n0:1260: Samhā aññasmiṃ vibhattigaṇe pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro āraṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1265: Ge pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro hoti a ca ā ca. Bhosattha, bho satthā, bhonto satthāro, satthāraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1267: Āraṅato yonaṃ kamena ṭo, ṭe honti vā. Ettha ca vāsaddo sakhasadde vikappanattho tattha vidhyantarasabbhāvā. Puna ṭoggahaṇaṃ lahubhāvatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1276: Naṃmhi pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro āraṅa hoti vā. Imesaṃ mahānāma tiṇṇaṃ satthārānaṃ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhāti a. ni. 3.127. Satthūnaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1278: Naṃmhi pare ltu, pitādīnaṃ u-kāro ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1279: Satthānaṃ, satthārā, satthārehi, satthārebhi, satthu, satthussa, satthuno, satthūnaṃ, satthārānaṃ, satthānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1285: Bahulādhikārā nā, smāsu satthunāti ca sumhi satthūsūti ca siddhaṃ. ‘‘Dhammarājena satthunā, pūjaṃ labbhati bhattusū’’ti jā. 2.22.1517 pāḷi. ‘Bhattusū’ti sāmīsu, ‘bhattāsū’tipi pāṭho.
anya-e0201n0:1286: ‘Ltupitādīnamase’ti aseggahaṇena tomhi āraṅa hoti nī. 414, ‘‘satthārato satthāraṃ gacchanti, satthārato satthāraṃ ghaṭentī’’ti mahāni. 27 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1287: Evaṃ kattā, bhattā, gantā, jetā, janetā, chettā, cheditā, viññātā, viññāpetā, uṭṭhātā, uṭṭhāpetā, taritā, tāretā, dātā, dāpetā, sandhātā, sandhāpetā, netā, nettā, posetā, bhettā, yātā, vattā, setā, hantā, sakamandhātā, mahāmandhātā iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1289: Mahāvuttinā yonaṃ ā hoti, avitakkitā gabbhamupavajanti jā. 1.13.138 (visadisaṃ), te bhikkhū brūhetā suññāgārānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1290: Amaccavācīhi kattu, khattusaddehi gassa ettaṃ, uṭṭhehi katte taramāno jā. 2.22.1690, natthi bho khatte paroloko dī. ni. 2.408.
anya-e0201n0:1291: Ge pare āraṅa ca hoti, pucchāma kattāra anomapañña, ‘‘kattāraṃ anomapañña’’ntipi jā. 1.10.28 yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:1292: Aṃmhi pare pubbassaralopo ca hoti, anukampakaṃ pāṇasamampi bhattuṃ jahanti itthiyo. ‘‘So patīto pamuttena, bhattunā bhattugāravo’’ti jā. 2.21.48 diṭṭhattā kattunā, gantunā iccādīnipi yujjanti.
anya-e0201n0:1293: Nettumhā smiṃno ettaṃ nī. 430, nette ujuṃ gate sati jā. 1.4.133, ete saddā tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpā honti, kattā itthī, kattā puriso, kattā kulaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1299: Pitaro, bho pita, bho pitā, bhonto pitaro. Pitaraṃ, pituṃ vā. ‘‘Mātuṃ pituñca vanditvā’’ti jā. 2.22.1859 dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1300: Pitaro, pitare, pitarā, pitunā, pitarehi, pitarebhi, pitūhi, pitūbhi, pitu, pitussa, pituno, pitūnaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitarā, pitunā, pitarehi, pitarebhi, pitūhi, pitūbhi, pitu, pitussa, pituno, pitūnaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitānaṃ, pitusmiṃ, pitumhi, pitari, pitaresu, pitūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1301: Anaṇo ñātinaṃ hoti, devānaṃ pitunañca so jā. 2.22.126, mātāpitūnaṃ accayena, dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, mātāpitūsu khattiya jā. 2.17.39.
anya-e0201n0:1303: Anattādīnanti kiṃ? Nattā, nattāro, nattāraṃ, nattāro, nattāre iccādi. Tathā panattusaddopi.
anya-e0201n0:1304: Mātu, dhītu, duhitusaddā pana itthiliṅgā eva, mātā, mātaro, bhoti māta, bhoti mātā, bhoti māte vā, ‘‘acchariyaṃ nandamāte, abbhutaṃ nandamāte’’ti a. ni. 7.53 dissati. ‘Ghabrahmāditve’ti gassa ettaṃ. Bhotiyo mātaro, mātaraṃ, mātuṃ, mātaro, mātare, mātuyā, mātarā, mātarehi, mātarebhi, mātūhi, mātūbhi, mātu, mātussa, mātuyā. ‘‘Mātussa sarati, pitussa saratī’’ti rū. 169; nī. 160 piṭṭhe satthe dissati. ‘‘Buddhamātussa sakkāraṃ, karotu sugatoraso’’ti apa. therī. 2.2.259 ca dissati. Mātūnaṃ, mātānaṃ, mātarānaṃ. Pañcamīrūpaṃ tatiyāsamaṃ. Chaṭṭhīrūpaṃ catutthīsamaṃ. Mātusmiṃ, mātumhi, mātari, mātuyā, mātuyaṃ, mātaresu, mātūsu. Evaṃ dhītu, duhitusaddā.
anya-e0201n0:1305: Visesavidhimhi gāthāsu mahāvuttinā mātu, pitusaddehi nādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ ekavacanānaṃ yā hoti, smiṃno pana yañca hoti, antalopo ca. Matyā kataṃ, matyā deti, matyā apeti, matyā dhanaṃ, matyā ṭhitaṃ. Matyaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Evaṃ petyā kataṃiccādi, idha vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:1306: Anuññāto ahaṃ matyā, sañcatto pitarā ahaṃ jā. 2.22.29. Matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu jā. 2.18.61, ahañhi jānāmi janinda etaṃ, matyā ca petyā ca jā. 2.18.59, sabbaṃ pubbepi vuttameva.
anya-e0201n0:1307: Satthu, pitādīnaṃ samāse vidhānaṃ samāsakaṇḍe āgamissati.
anya-e0201n0:1312: ‘Gasīna’nti lopo, sayambhū gacchati. ‘Lopo’ti yonaṃ lopo, sayambhū gacchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1314: ‘Jantādito no cā’ti yonaṃ vo, no, sayambhuvo, sayambhuno.
anya-e0201n0:1315: ‘Ge vā’ti ge pare vikappena rasso, bho sayambhu, bho sayambhū, bhonto sayambhū, sayambhuvo, sayambhuno.
anya-e0201n0:1316: ‘Ekavacanayosvaghona’nti amādīsu ekavacanesu niccaṃ rasso, sayambhuṃ, gāthāyaṃ ‘sayambhuna’ntipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:1317: Sayambhū, sayambhuvo, sayambhuno. Sayambhunā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi, sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṃ. Sayambhusmā, sayambhumhā, sayambhunā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi, sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṃ. Sayambhusmiṃ, sayambhumhi, sayambhūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1318: Evaṃ abhibhū, parābhibhū, vessabhū, gotrabhū, vatrabhū iccādi. Sesesu pana yonaṃ no eva labbhati, cittasahabhuno dhammā dha. sa. dukamātikā 61.
anya-e0201n0:1320: Pume kūpaccayantehi yonaṃ no hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1322: Viññū, vadaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññū, mattaññū, vidū. Idha kūsaddena rūpaccayantāpi gayhanti, vedagū, pāragū. Tathā bhīrū, pabhaṅgū, virāgūiccādi ca.
anya-e0201n0:1324: Okāranto pana gosaddo eva, so pubbe vuttoyeva.
anya-e0201n0:1328: Atha napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ dīpiyate. Taṃ pana pañcavidhaṃ adantaṃ, idantaṃ īdantaṃ, udantaṃ, ūdantanti.
anya-e0201n0:1333: Napuṃsake ato yonaṃ ni hoti. ‘Yolopanīsū’ti nimhi dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:1335: 197. Nīnaṃ vā ka. 107; rū. 69; nī. 275; ‘nīna vā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1336: Ato nīnaṃ ṭā, ṭe honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1337: Cittā, he citta, he cittā, he cittāni, he cittā vā, cittaṃ, cittāni, citte, cittena. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1338: Evaṃ dakaṃ, udakaṃ, sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ, mukhaṃ, aṅgaṃ, liṅgaṃ, siṅgaṃ, aghaṃ, saccaṃ, naccaṃ, rajjaṃ, pajjaṃ, ambujaṃ, dhaññaṃ, thaññaṃ, araññaṃ, puññaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ, bhaṇḍaṃ, tuṇḍaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, leṇaṃ, karaṇaṃ, caraṇaṃ, chattaṃ, khettaṃ, nettaṃ, amataṃ, sotaṃ, pīṭhaṃ, vatthaṃ, padaṃ, gadaṃ, āvudhaṃ, kānanaṃ, ghānaṃ, jhānaṃ, dānaṃ, dhanaṃ, vanaṃ, pāpaṃ, dumaṃ, hadayaṃ, cīraṃ, cīvaraṃ, kulaṃ, mūlaṃ, balaṃ, maṅgalaṃ, bhisaṃ, sīsaṃ, lohaṃiccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1345: ‘Pumakammathāmaddhāna’nti suttena nā, smāsu uttaṃ, kammunā, kammassa, kammuno, kammasmā, kammamhā, kammanā, kammunā, kammassa, kammuno.
anya-e0201n0:1348: Kammasmiṃ, kammamhi, kammani, kamme. Sesaṃ cittasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1349: Kamma camma ghamma asma vesma addha muddha aha brahma attaātumā kammādi. Kammani, cammani. ‘‘Kiṃ chando kimadhippāyo, eko sammasi ghammanī’’ti jā. 1.16.1 ca ‘‘kiṃ patthayaṃ mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammanī’’ti jā. 1.13.83 ca ‘‘mā tvaṃ cande khali asmanī’’ti ca ‘‘tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi vesmanī’’ti ca dissanti. Addhani, muddhani, ahani, brahmani, attani, ātumani, sabbametaṃ pubbepi vuttameva ca. Tattha ‘sammasī’ti acchasi, ‘ghammanī’ti gimhakāle ātape vā, ‘asmanī’ti pāsāṇe, ‘vesmanī’ti ghare.
anya-e0201n0:1351: 200. Aṃ napuṃsake ka. 125; rū. 198; nī. 300; ‘aṃṅaṃ napuṃsake’ (bahūsu)?.
anya-e0201n0:1352: Napuṃsake simhi ntussa aṃ hoti vā. Silopo.
anya-e0201n0:1355: Simhi mahāvuttinā ntussa anto a hoti, tato sissa aṃ hoti, guṇavantaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1356: ‘Yvādo ntussā’ti yvādīsu ntussantassa attaṃ, guṇavantāni, guṇavantā, he guṇava, he guṇavā, he guṇavantāni, he guṇavantā, guṇavaṃ, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavantāni, guṇavante, guṇavantena, guṇavatā kulena. Sabbaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1358: Gacchaṃ kulaṃ, gacchantaṃ kulaṃ, gacchantāni kulāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1363: Napuṃsake jha, lato yonaṃ ni hoti vā. ‘Yolopanīsū’ti dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:1364: Aṭṭhīni, he aṭṭhi, he aṭṭhī, he aṭṭhīni, he aṭṭhī vā, aṭṭhiṃ, aṭṭhinaṃ, aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhinā, aṭṭhīhi, aṭṭhībhi. Sesaṃ munisamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1365: Samāsepi sammādiṭṭhi kulaṃ, sammādiṭṭhīni kulāni iccādi, yonaṃ no, ne natthi.
anya-e0201n0:1366: Smiṃmhi sammādiṭṭhismiṃ, sammādiṭṭhimhi, sammādiṭṭhini, sammādiṭṭhine kule, ariyavuttine kule iti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1367: Evaṃ akkhi, acchi, satthi, dadhi, vāri iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1370: Īkārante ‘ekavacanayosvaghona’nti suttena simhi rasso, daṇḍi kulaṃ, daṇḍīni kulāni, yonaṃ lope daṇḍī.
anya-e0201n0:1371: ‘Ge vā’ti rasso, he daṇḍi, he daṇḍī vā, he daṇḍīni, he daṇḍī, daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍīni, daṇḍī, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. Pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1372: Samāsepi sīghayāyi cittaṃ, sīghayāyīni, sīghayāyī, he sīghayāyi, he sīghayāyī vā, he sīghayāyīni, he sīghayāyī, sīghayāyiṃ, sīghayāyinaṃ, sīghayāyīni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1373: Evaṃ sukhakāri dānaṃ, cakkī, pakkhī, sukhī, sikhī iccādayo kulasambandhino ca veditabbā.
anya-e0201n0:1376: Āyu tiṭṭhati, ‘jhalā vā’ti yonaṃ nitte lope ca dīgho, āyūni, āyū, he āyu, he āyū, he āyūni, he āyū, āyuṃ, āyunaṃ, āyūni, āyū. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1377: Āyusaddo pulliṅgepi vattati, ‘‘punarāyu ca me laddho dī. ni. 2.369, āyuñca vo kīvatako nu samma jā. 1.15.205, āyu nu khīṇo maraṇañca santike, na cāyu khīṇo maraṇañca dūre’’ti pāḷipadāni.
anya-e0201n0:1378: Evaṃ cakkhu, hiṅgu, siggu, jatu, vatthu, matthu, madhu, dhanu, tipu, dāru, vasu, assu iccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:1380: Ambu, paṃsuiccādīhi smiṃno ni hoti vā.

anya-e0201n0:1544: ‘Ci’itinipātena yutte pana ekaccatthaṃ vā appatthaṃ vā vadati. Kāci itthī, kāci itthiyo, kiñci itthiṃ, kāci, kāyaci, kāhici, kāyaci, kassāci, kāsañci, kutoci, kāhici. Sattamiyaṃ - kāyaci, katthaci, kāsuci.
anya-e0201n0:1545: Koci puriso, keci, kiñci, keci, kenaci, kehici, kassaci, kesañci, kismiñci, kimhici, katthaci, kesuci.
anya-e0201n0:1546: Kiñci kulaṃ, kānici kulāni, kiñci, kānici. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1547: Puna yasaddena yutte sakalatthaṃ vadati. Yā kāci itthī, yākāci itthiyo.
anya-e0201n0:1548: Yo koci puriso, ye keci, yaṃ kiñci, ye keci yena kenaci, yehi kehici, yassa kassaci, yesaṃ kesañci yato kutoci, yehi kehici, yassa kassaci, yesaṃkesañci, yasmiṃ kismiñci, yamhi kimhici, yattha katthaci, yesu kesuci.
anya-e0201n0:1549: Yaṃ kiñcicittaṃ, yāni kānici, yaṃ kiñci, yāni kānici. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1551: Ekasaddo saṅkhyatthe pavatto ekavacanantova, aññatthe pavatto ekabahuvacananto.
anya-e0201n0:1552: Tattha saṅkhyatthe – ekā itthī, ekaṃ, ekāya, ekissā iccādi. Punnapuṃsakesu ekavacanesu purisa, cittarūpameva.
anya-e0201n0:1553: Aññatthe – ekā itthī, ekā itthiyo, ekaṃ, ekā, ekāya, ekissā, ekāhi, ekābhi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1554: Eko puriso, eke, ekaṃ, eke, ekena, ekehi, ekebhi, ekassa, ekesaṃ, ekesānaṃ. Pulliṅga sabbasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1555: Ekaṃ kulaṃ, ekāni kulāni, ekaṃ kulaṃ, ekāni kulāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1557: ‘‘Ekikā sayane setu, yā te ambe avāhari jā. 1.4.175. Ekākinī gahaṭṭhāhaṃ, mātuyā paricoditā’’ti apa. therī 2.3.188 pāḷi, ekako puriso, ekakaṃ, ekakena. Ekakaṃ kulaṃ iccādi ekavacanantameva, ekakānaṃ bahutte vattabbe dve ekakā, dve ekake, dvīhi ekakehīti labbhati. ‘‘Pañcālo ca videho ca, ubho ekā bhavantu te’’ti pāḷi. Iminā nayena bahuvacanampi labbhati. ‘Ekā’ti missakā.
anya-e0201n0:1558: Paṭisedhayutte pana anekā itthiyo, anekāsaṃ itthīnaṃ. Aneke purisā, anekesaṃ purisānaṃ. Anekāni kulāni, anekesaṃ kulānaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘nekāni dhaññagaṇāni, nekāni khettagaṇāni, nekānaṃ dhaññagaṇānaṃ, nekānaṃ khettagaṇāna’’ntipi atthi.
anya-e0201n0:1559: Ekacca, ekacciya, kati, bahusaddāpi idha vattabbā. Ekaccā itthī, ekaccā, ekaccāyoti sabbaṃ kaññāsamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1563: Ekacce purisā, ekacce purise. Sesaṃ purisasamaṃ. Ādisaddena appekacca, ekatiya, ubhādayo saṅgayhanti. Appekacce purisā, ekatiye purisā, ubhe purisā.
anya-e0201n0:1568: Ekacciya, ekacceyya, ekatiyasaddā kaññā, purisa, cittanayā. ‘‘Itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipa saṃ. ni. 1.127. Saccaṃ kirevamāhaṃsu, narā ekacciyā idha. Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro’’ti jā. 1.1.73 ca ‘‘parivāritā muñcare ekacceyyā’’ti ca ‘‘na vissase ekatiyesū’’ti ca pāḷī – tattha ‘niplavita’nti udakato ubbhataṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1572: Kati itthiyo, kati purisā, kati purise, kati cittāni. Katihi itthīhi, katihi purisehi, katihi cittehi.
anya-e0201n0:1574: Naṃmhi bahu, katīnaṃ ante nuka hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1575: Katinnaṃ itthīnaṃ, katinnaṃ purisānaṃ, katinnaṃ cittānaṃ, ayaṃ nāgamo bahulaṃ na hoti, ‘katinaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇī katimī’ti ca dissati. ‘‘Bahūnaṃ vassasatānaṃ, bahūnaṃ vassasahassāna’’nti ca ‘‘bahūnaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ, bahūnaṃ akusaladhammāna’’nti ca ‘‘bahūnaṃ vata atthāya, uppajjiṃsu tathāgatā’’ti vi. va. 807 ca pāḷī.
anya-e0201n0:1576: Katisu itthīsu, katisu purisesu, katisu cittesu.
anya-e0201n0:1577: Bahusadde dvīsu naṃvacanesu bahunnaṃ, bahunnanti vattabbaṃ. Sesaṃ dhenu, bhikkhu, āyusadisaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1578: Kapaccaye kaññā, purisa, cittasadisaṃ, bahū itthiyo, bahukā itthiyo. Bahū purisā, bahavo purisā, bahukā purisā. Bahūni cittāni, bahukāni cittāni iccādinā vattabbaṃ. Bahūnaṃ samudāyāpekkhane sati ekavacanampi labbhati, ‘‘bahujanassa atthāya bahujanassa hitāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāyā’’ti a. ni. 1.141 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1579: Ubhasaddo bahuvacanantova, ‘ubhagohi ṭo’ti yonaṃ ṭo, ubho itthiyo, purisā, kulāni gacchanti, ubho itthiyo, purisā, kulāni passati.
anya-e0201n0:1581: Su, hisu ubhassa anto o hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1585: Ubhinnaṃ. Sabbattha itthi, purisa, kulehi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1586: 241. Yomhi dvinnaṃ duvedve ka. 132; rū. 228; ni. 310.
anya-e0201n0:1587: Yosu savibhattissa dvissa duve, dve honti. ‘Dvinna’nti vacanaṃ dvissa bahuvacanantaniyamatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1588: Dve itthiyo, dve purisā, dve purise, dve cittāni, duve itthiyo, duve purisā, duve purise, duve cittāni, dvīhi, dvībhi.
anya-e0201n0:1589: 242. Naṃmhi nuka dvādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ ka. 67; nī. 229; nī. 214.
anya-e0201n0:1590: Naṃmhi pare dvādīnaṃ aṭṭhārasantānaṃ sattarasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ ante nuka hoti. U-kāro uccāraṇattho. Kānubandhaṃ disvā anteti ñāyati.
anya-e0201n0:1593: Naṃmhi savibhattissa dvissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1594: Duvinnaṃ, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṃ, duvinnaṃ, dvīsu. Mahāvuttinā sumhi duve hoti, nāgassa duvesu dantesu nimmitā vi. va. 706, cakkāni pādesu duvesu vindati dī. ni. 3.205. Evañca sati duvehi, duvebhītipi siddhameva hoti, ayaṃ dvisaddo ubhasaddo viya aliṅgo.
anya-e0201n0:1595: 244. Tisso catasso yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ka. 133; rū. 230; nī. 311.
anya-e0201n0:1596: Itthiyaṃ yosu savibhattīnanti, catunnaṃ tisso, catasso honti.
anya-e0201n0:1598: Mahāvuttinā hisu ca tissa, catassā honti, ‘‘tissehi catassehi parisāhi, catassehi sahito lokanāyako’’ti pāḷī. Tīhi, tībhi itthīhi, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi itthīhi.
anya-e0201n0:1600: Itthiyaṃ naṃmhiti, catunnaṃ tissa, catassā honti.
anya-e0201n0:1601: Tissannaṃ itthīnaṃ, catassannaṃ itthīnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ itthīnaṃ, catunnaṃ itthīnaṃ, samaṇo gotamo catunnaṃ parisānaṃ sakkato hoti, catunnaṃ parisānaṃ piyo hoti manāpoti dī. ni. 1.304, tissehi, catassehi, tīhi, tībhi, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, tissannaṃ, catassannaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ, tīsu, catūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1602: Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘catassehī’’ti diṭṭhattā tissesu, catassesūtipi diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1603: 246. Pume tayo cattāro ka. 133; rū. 230; nī. 311.
anya-e0201n0:1604: Pulliṅge yosu savibhattīnanti, catunnaṃ tayo, cattāro honti.
anya-e0201n0:1605: Tayo purisā, tayo purise, cattāro purisā, cattāro purise.
anya-e0201n0:1606: 247. Caturo catussa ka. 78, 205, 31; rū. 160; nī. 234; ‘caturo vā catussa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1608: Caturo purisā, caturo purise. Kathaṃ caturo nimitte nādassiṃ, caturo phalamuttameti? ‘‘Liṅgavipallāsā’’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi.
anya-e0201n0:1609: 248. Iṇṇaṃiṇṇannaṃ tito jhā ka. 87; rū. 231; nī. 243; ‘ṇṇaṃṇṇannaṃtiko jhā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1610: Jhasaññamhā timhā naṃvacanassa iṇṇaṃ, iṇṇannaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1611: Tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, catunnaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, catunnaṃ, tīsu, catūsu.
anya-e0201n0:1613: Napuṃsake yosu savibhattīnanti, catunnaṃ tīṇi, cattāri honti.
anya-e0201n0:1614: Tīṇi cittāni, cattāri cittāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1615: Vacanasiliṭṭhatte pana sati visadisaliṅgavacanānampi padānaṃ aññamaññasaṃyogo hoti, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā dī. ni. 3.145, cattāro sammappadhānā dī. ni. 3.145, tayomahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paṭṭhā. 1.1.58, sabbe mālā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe kaññā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe ratanā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe yānā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, avijjāya sati saṅkhārā honti, saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇaṃ hoti saṃ. ni. 2.50 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1616: Gāthāsu vipallāsāpi bahulaṃ dissanti, aññe dhammāni desenti, evaṃ dhammāni sutvāna, satañca dhammāni sukittitāni sutvā, atthāni cintayitvāna, uttamatthāni tayi labhimhā, kiṃ tvaṃ atthāni jānāsi, iccheyyāmi bhante sattaputtāni, siviputtāni avhaya jā. 2.22.2235, puttadārāni posenti, balībaddāni soḷasa iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1618: 250. Ṭa pañcādīhi cuddasahi ka. 134; rū. 251; nī. 247.
anya-e0201n0:1619: Pañcādīhi aṭṭhārasantehi saṅkhyāsaddehi yonaṃ ṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1620: Pañca itthiyo, pañca purisā, purise, pañca cittāni, cha itthiyo.
anya-e0201n0:1621: Ḷāgame pana ‘‘itthibhāvā na muccissaṃ, chaḷāni gatiyo imā’’ti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1622: Cha purisā, cha purise, cha cittāni. Evaṃ satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasa, ekādasa…pe… aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0201n0:1624: Su, naṃ, hisu pañcādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ assa attameva hoti, na ettaṃ vā dīghattaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1625: Pañcahi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu, chahi, channaṃ, chasu, sattahi, sattannaṃ, sattasu, aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhannaṃ, aṭṭhasu, navahi, navannaṃ, navasu, dasahi, dasannaṃ, dasasu, ekādasahi, ekādasannaṃ, ekādasasu…pe… aṭṭhārasahi, aṭṭhārasannaṃ, aṭṭhārasasu.
anya-e0201n0:1627: ‘Itthiyamatvā’ti vīsa, tiṃsa, cattālīsa, paññāsehi āpaccayo, mahāvuttinā simhi rasso silopo ca, ‘niggahīta’nti vikappena niggahītāgamo, vikappena aṃlopo, nādīnaṃ ekavacanānaṃ yādeso, vīsa itthiyo, vīsaṃ itthiyo, vīsa purisā, vīsaṃ purisā, vīsa purise, vīsaṃ purise, vīsa cittāni, vīsaṃ cittāni, vīsāya itthīhi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya purisehi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya kulehi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya itthīnaṃ, purisānaṃ, kulānaṃ, sattamiyaṃ vīsāya itthīsu, purisesu, kulesu.
anya-e0201n0:1628: Tipaccaye vīsati, tiṃsatisaddāpi saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti, navutisaddā viya niccaṃ itthi liṅgekavacanantā eva, si, aṃlopo, vīsati itthiyo, vīsati purisā, purise, vīsati kulāni, vīsatiyā itthīhi, itthīnaṃ, purisehi, purisānaṃ, kulehi, kulānaṃ, vīsatiyā, vīsatiyaṃ itthi, purisa, kulesu, evaṃ yāvanavutiyā veditabbā. Vaggabhede pana sati bahuvacanampi vikappena dissati, dve vīsatiyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1629: Sataṃ, sahassaṃ, dasasahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ, dasasatasahassanti ime napuṃsakaliṅgāyeva. Saṅkhyeyyapadhāne pana itthiliṅge vattabbe sahassī, dasasahassī, satasahassīti itthiliṅgaṃ bhavati. Vaggabhede pana dve satāni, tīṇi satāni, dve sahassāni, tīṇi sahassāni iccādīni bhavanti. Koṭi, pakoṭi, koṭipakoṭi, akkhobhiṇīsaddā itthiliṅgā eva. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ yāvaasaṅkhyeyyā napuṃsakameva.
anya-e0201n0:1630: Sahassaṃ kāsi nāma, dasasahassaṃ nahutaṃ nāma, satasahassaṃ lakkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:1631: Duvidhaṃ padhānaṃ saṅkhyāpadhānaṃ, saṅkhyeyyapadhānañca. Purisānaṃ vīsati hoti, purisānaṃ navuti hoti, purisānaṃ sataṃ hoti, sahassaṃ hoti iccādi saṅkhyāpadhānaṃ nāma, vīsati purisā, navuti purisā, sataṃ purisā, sahassaṃ purisā iccādi saṅkhyeyyapadhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:1632: Etthapi vīsatisaddo itthiliṅgekavacano eva. Sata, sahassasaddā napuṃsakekavacanā eva. Saṅkhyāsaddānaṃ pana padavidhānañca guṇavidhānañca samāsakaṇḍe āgamissati.
anya-e0201n0:1638: Yosu savibhattissa amhassa kamena mayaṃ, asmā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1642: 254. Tumhassa tuvaṃtvaṃmhi ca ka. 146; rū. 236; nī. 324; ‘tumhassa tuvaṃtvamamhica’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1643: Simhi ca aṃmhi ca savibhattissa tumhassa tuvaṃ, tvaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1644: Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni theragā. 839, tvaṃ no satthā anuttaro, tumhe gacchatha, tuvaṃ passati, tvaṃ passati.
anya-e0201n0:1645: 255. Aṃmhi taṃ maṃ tavaṃ mamaṃ ka. 143-4; rū. 234-5; nī. 322.
anya-e0201n0:1646: Aṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1647: Maṃ passati, mamaṃ passati, taṃ passati, tavaṃ passati, amhe passati, tumhe passati.
anya-e0201n0:1648: 256. Dutiyāyomhi vā ka. 162; rū. 237; nī. 345; ‘dutiye yomhi vā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1649: Dutiyāyomhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ ṅānubandhā aṃ, ākaṃādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1650: Amhaṃ, amhākaṃ passati, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ passati.
anya-e0201n0:1652: Nā, smāsu savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ tayā, mayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:1653: Mayā kataṃ, tayā kataṃ, mayā apeti, tayā apeti.
anya-e0201n0:1654: 258. Tayātayīnaṃ tva vā tassa ka. 210; rū. 239; nī. 435.
anya-e0201n0:1655: Tayā, tayīnaṃ tassa tva hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1656: Tvayā kataṃ, tvayā apeti, amhehi kataṃ, tumhehi kataṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1659: Mama dīyate, mayhaṃ dīyate, tava dīyate, tuyhaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0201n0:1661: Naṃ, sesu savibhattissa amhassa kamena asmākaṃ, mamaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n0:1664: Naṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ ṅānubandhā aṃ, ākaṃādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1665: Amhaṃ dīyate, amhākaṃ dīyate, tumhaṃ dīyate, tumhākaṃ dīyate. Pañcamiyaṃ mayā, tayā, tvayā, pubbe vuttāva.
anya-e0201n0:1668: Tvamhā apeti, amhehi, tumhehi, mama, mamaṃ, mayhaṃ, tava, tuyhaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, asmākaṃ, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1669: 263. Smiṃmhi tumhamhānaṃ tayimayi ka. 139; rū. 245; nī. 318.
anya-e0201n0:1670: Smiṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ tayi, mayi honti.
anya-e0201n0:1671: Tayi, mayi, tvatte tvayi, amhesu, tumhesu.
anya-e0201n0:1675: Mahāvuttinā yo, hisu amhassa asmādeso, yonaṃ ettañca, asmā gacchāma, asme passati, asmāhi kataṃ, asmākaṃ dīyate, asmāhi apeti, asmākaṃ dhanaṃ, asmāsu ṭhitaṃ. ‘‘Asmābhijappanti janā anekā’’ti jā. 1.7.68 pāḷi-asme abhijappanti patthentīti attho. ‘‘Asmābhi pariciṇṇosi, mettacittā hi nāyakā’’ti apa. therī 2.2.230 therīpāḷi – ‘pariciṇṇo’ti paricārito.
anya-e0201n0:1676: Catutthiyaṃ asmākaṃ adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181 – ‘adhipannāna’nti dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1677: Chaṭṭhiyaṃ esasmākaṃ kule dhammo jā. 1.4.147, esā asmākaṃ dhammatā.
anya-e0201n0:1678: Sattamiyaṃ yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā. Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tvamhā, bhattirasmāsu yā tava jā. 2.21.81 – tattha ‘yaṃ kicca’nti yaṃ kammaṃ kattabbaṃ, tava asmāsu yā bhatti, tāya mayaṃ tvamhā nissaṃsayataṃ pattāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1680: Apādādimhi pavattānaṃ padato paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ vidhi hoti. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1682: Pañcamīvajjitesu yo, naṃ, hisu paresu apādādopavattānaṃ padato paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1683: Gacchatha vo, gacchatha tumhe, gacchāma no, gacchāma amhe, passeyya vo, passeyya tumhe, passeyya no, passeyya amhe, dīyate vo, dīyate tumhākaṃ, dīyate no, dīyate amhākaṃ, dhanaṃ vo, dhanaṃ tumhākaṃ, dhanaṃ no, dhanaṃ amhākaṃ, kataṃ vo puññaṃ, kataṃ tumhehi puññaṃ, kataṃ no puññaṃ, kataṃ amhehi puññaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1684: Apañcamyāti kiṃ? Nissaṭaṃ tumhehi, nissaṭaṃ amhehi.
anya-e0201n0:1685: Apādādotveva? Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ khu. pā. 7.12.
anya-e0201n0:1687: Ekavākyetveva? Devadatto tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagare.
anya-e0201n0:1690: Nā, sesu tādisānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumha, amhasaddānaṃ te, me honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1691: Kataṃ te puññaṃ, kataṃ tayā puññaṃ, kataṃ me puññaṃ, kataṃ mayā puññaṃ, dinnaṃ te vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ tuyhaṃ vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ me vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ mayhaṃ vatthaṃ, idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ tava raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ me raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ mama raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1693: Anvādesaṭṭhāne tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā niccaṃ bhavanti punabbidhānā.
anya-e0201n0:1694: Gāmo tumhākaṃ pariggaho, atho nagarampi vo pariggaho. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n0:1695: 269. Sapubbā paṭhamantā vā ‘saṃpubbā paṭhamanthā vā’ (mūlapāṭhe) caṃ. 6.1.21; pā. 8.1.26.
anya-e0201n0:1696: Saṃvijjati pubbapadaṃ assāti sapubbaṃ, sapubbā paṭhamantapadamhā paresaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā vikappena honti anvādesaṭṭhānepi.
anya-e0201n0:1697: Gāme paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho nagare kambalaṃ vo, atho nagare kambalaṃ tumhākaṃ vā. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n0:1699: Ca, vā, ha, aha, evasaddehi yoge tumhā’mhānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā na honti.
anya-e0201n0:1700: Gāmo tava ca mama ca pariggaho, gāmo tava vā mama vā pariggaho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1701: Cādiyogeti kiṃ? Gāmo ca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1703: Ālocanaṃ olokanaṃ, ālocanato aññasmiṃ dassanatthe payujjamāne tumhā’mhānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā na honti.
anya-e0201n0:1704: Gāmo tumhe uddissa āgato, gāmo amhe uddissa āgato – ‘gāmo’ti gāmavāsī mahājano.
anya-e0201n0:1705: Anālocaneti kiṃ? Gāmo vo passati, gāmo no passati.
anya-e0201n0:1707: Āmantanabhūtaṃ pubbapadaṃ asantaṃ viya hoti, padatoti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:1710: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte pade sati pubbaṃ sāmaññavacanabhūtaṃ āmantanapadaṃ asantaṃ viya na hoti, padatoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:1712: Sāmaññavacananti kiṃ? Māṇavaka devadatta! Tuyhaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1713: Ekattheti kiṃ? Devadatta! Yaññadatta! Tumhākaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1715: Bahūsu janesu pavattamānaṃ sāmaññavacanabhūtampi āmantanapadaṃ ekatthe pade sati asantaṃ viya na hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:1716: Brāhmaṇā guṇavanto vo pariggaho, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto tumhākaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n0:1720: Vibhatyatthānaṃ jotakattā vibhattiṭṭhāne ṭhitā paccayā vibhattipaccayā.
anya-e0201n0:1723: Tomhi dīghānaṃ rasso, kaññato, rattito, itthito, dhenuto. Mahāvuttinā tomhi mātāpitūnaṃ ittaṃ, mātito, pitito, vadhuto, purisato, munito, daṇḍito, bhikkhuto, satthārato, kattuto, gotrabhuto, sabbato, yato, tato.
anya-e0201n0:1726: Ito, ato, etto, kutoti ete saddā topaccayantā nipaccante.
anya-e0201n0:1727: Imamhā imehīti vā ito, etasmā etehīti vā ato, etto, kasmā kehīti vā kuto. Ettha ca imamhā, imehītiādikaṃ atthavākyaṃ disvā pakatiliṅgaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā suttena imassa ittaṃ, etassa attaṃ ettañca, ‘saramhā dve’ti esaramhā dvittaṃ, kiṃsaddassa kuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesu nipātanesu.
anya-e0201n0:1732: Ubhato gāmaṃ gāmassa ubhosu passesūti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1736: Ādito, majjhato, purato, passato, piṭṭhito, orato, parato, pacchato, puratthimato, dakkhiṇatoiccādīsu bahulaṃ sattamyatthe dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1737: Tathā tatiyatthepi rūpaṃ attato samanupassati saṃ. ni. 3.44, pañcakkhandhe aniccato vipassati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1738: Yatonidānaṃ su. ni. 275, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ, yatodakaṃ tadādittamiccādīsu jā. 1.9.58 paṭhamatthe icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1739: Ito ehi, ito balāke āgaccha, caṇḍo me vāyaso sakhā iccādīsu dutiyatthe.
anya-e0201n0:1740: Paratoghoso, nādiṭṭhā parato dosaṃ iccādīsu chaṭṭhyatthe.
anya-e0201n0:1741: 279. Sabbādito sattamyā tratthā ka. 249; rū. 266; nī. 494; caṃ. 4.1.10; pā. 5.3.10.
anya-e0201n0:1742: Sabbādināmakehi sabbanāmehi sattamiyā atthe tra, tthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:1743: Sabbasmiṃ sabbesūti vā sabbatra, sabbattha, sabbassaṃ sabbāsu vātipi. Evaṃ kataratra, katarattha, aññatra, aññattha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1745: 280. Katthetthakutrātrakvehidha ka. 251; rū. 269; nī. 499; caṃ. 4.1.11; pā. 5.3.11, 12.
anya-e0201n0:1746: Kattha, ettha, kutra, atra, tva, iha, idhāti ete saddāttha, tra,va ha, dhāpaccayantā sattamyatthe sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1747: Kasmiṃ kesūti vā kattha, kutra, kva. ‘Kuva’ntipi sijjhati, ‘‘kuvaṃ sattassa kārako, kuvaṃ satto samuppanno saṃ. ni. 1.171, kuvaṃ asissaṃ, kuvaṃ khādissa’’nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:1748: Etasmiṃ etesūti vā ettha, atra, imasmiṃ imesūti vā iha, idha.
anya-e0201n0:1749: 281. Dhi sabbā vā ka. 250; rū. 268; nī. 502.
anya-e0201n0:1751: Namo te buddha vīra’tthu, vippamuttosi sabbadhi saṃ. ni. 1.90.
anya-e0201n0:1757: Tahiṃ, tahaṃ. Dutiyatthepi dissati ‘‘tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento gacchatī’’ti.
anya-e0201n0:1759: Kiṃmhā sattamyatthe hiṃ, taṃ hoti. Kiṃssa kuttaṃ kattañca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1760: Kuhiṃ gacchati, kuhaṃ gacchati. Kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtaka saṃ. ni. 2.63. Kuhiñci, kuhiñcananti dve ci, cana-nipātantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1764: Sabba, eka, añña, ya, tasaddehi kāle dā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1765: Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekasmiṃ kāle ekadā, aññasmiṃ kāle aññadā, yasmiṃ kāle yadā, tasmiṃ kāle tadā.
anya-e0201n0:1767: Etepi sattamyatthe kāle dā, dhunā, dānipaccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1768: Kiṃsmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e0201n0:1770: Etepi kāle jja, jju, rahi, raha paccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1772: Samāne kāle sajju-‘samāne’ti vijjamāne. Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajju khīraṃva muccati dha. pa. 71, sajjukaṃ pāhesi – tattha ‘sajjū’ti tasmiṃ divase.
anya-e0201n0:1774: Imasmiṃ kāle etarahi, kiṃsmiṃ kāle karaha. Kutoci, kvaci, katthaci, kuhiñci, kadāci, karahacisaddā pana ci-nipātantā honti, tathā yato kutoci, yattha katthaci, yadā kadācīti. Kiñcanaṃ, kuhiñcanaṃ, kudācananti cana-nipātantāti.
anya-e0201n0:1779: Chabbidhāni abyayapadāni upasaggapadaṃ, nipātapadaṃ, vibhattipaccayantapadaṃ, abyayībhāvasamāsapadaṃ, abyayataddhitapadaṃ, tvādipaccayantapadanti. Byayo vuccati vikāro, nānāliṅgavibhattivacanehi natthi rūpabyayo etesanti abyayā, asaṅkhyāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0201n0:1780: Tattha vibhattipaccayantapadato puna vibhattuppatti nāma natthi. Abyayībhāvasamāsamhi vibhattīnaṃ vidhi samāsakaṇḍe vakkhati, tasmā tāni dve ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri idha vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:1782: Asaṅkhyehi padehi yathārahaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti, kehici padehi paṭhamāya lopo, kehici padehi dutiyāya lopo…pe… kehici sattamiyā, kehici dvinnaṃ, kehici tissannaṃ…pe… kehici sattannanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1783: Tattha āvuso, bho, bhanteiccādīhi āmantananipātehi atthi, natthi, sakkā, labbhā, siyā, siyuṃ, sādhu, tuṇhīiccādīhi ca paṭhamāya lopo.
anya-e0201n0:1784: Ciraṃ, cirassaṃ, niccaṃ, satataṃ, abhiṇhaṃ, abhikkhaṇaṃ, muhuttaṃ iccādīhi accantasaṃyogalakkhaṇe dutiyāya.
anya-e0201n0:1785: Yathā, tathā, sabbathā, sabbaso, musā, micchāiccādīhi tatiyāya.
anya-e0201n0:1788: Pure, purā, pacchā, uddhaṃ, upari, adho, heṭṭhā, antarā, anto, raho, āvi, hiyyo, suveiccādīhi sattamiyā lopo.
anya-e0201n0:1789: Namosaddamhā ‘‘namo te buddha vīra’tthū’’ti ettha paṭhamāya. ‘‘Namo karohi nāgassā’’ti ettha dutiyāya.
anya-e0201n0:1790: Sayaṃsaddamhā ‘‘kusūlo sayameva bhijjate’’ti ettha paṭhamāya. ‘‘Sayaṃ kataṃ sukhadukkha’’nti dī. ni. 3.191, 193 ettha tatiyāya, iccādinā yathārahavibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:1791: Iti, evaṃsaddehi payogānurūpaṃ sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1793: Rūpasiddhiyaṃ pana ‘‘tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavatī’’ti rū. 131 (piṭṭhe) vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1794: Tattha ‘‘abhikkamati, abhidhammo’’ iccādīsu dhātuliṅgāni upecca tesaṃ atthaṃ nānāppakāraṃ karontā sajjanti saṅkharontīti upasaggā. Te hi kvaci tadatthaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ karonti ‘‘jānāti, pajānāti, sañjānāti, avajānāti, abhijānāti, parijānāti, susīlo, dussīlo, suvaṇṇo, dubbaṇṇo, surājā, durājā’’ iccādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:1795: Kvaci tadatthaṃ nānāppakāraṃ katvā vibhajjanti ‘‘gacchati, āgacchati, uggacchati, ogacchati’’iccādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:1796: Kvaci tadatthaṃ bādhetvā tappaṭiviruddhe vā tadaññasmiṃ vā atthe tāni yojenti.
anya-e0201n0:1798: Jeti, parājeti, omuñcati, paṭimuñcati, gilati, uggilati, nimmujjati, ummujjati, dhammo, uddhammoiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1800: Dadāti, ādadāti, dadhāti, vidheti, pidheti, nidheti, sandhiyati, saddahati, abhidhātiiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1801: Kvaci pana padasobhaṇaṃ katvā tadatthaṃ anuvattanti, ‘‘vijjati, saṃvijjati, labhati, paṭilabhati’’ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1802: Te vīsati honti-pa, ā, u, o, du, ni, vi, su, saṃ, ati, adhi, anu, apa, api, abhi, ava, upa, pati, parā, pari.
anya-e0201n0:1803: Kaccāyane pana osaddo avakāriyamattanti taṃ aggahetvā nīsaddaṃ gaṇhāti, idha pana nīsaddo nissa dīghamattanti taṃ aggahetvā osaddaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0201n0:1805: Pakāratthe-paññā. Ādikamme-vippakataṃ. Padhāne-paṇītaṃ. Issariye-pabhū. Antobhāve-pakkhittaṃ, passāso. Viyoge-pavāso. Tappare-pācariyo. Tadanubandhe-putto, paputto, nattā, panattā. Bhusatthe-pavaḍḍho. Sambhave-pabhavati. Tittiyaṃ-pahutaṃ annaṃ. Anāvile-pasanno. Patthanāyaṃ-paṇidhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1807: Abhimukhe-āgacchati. Uddhaṃkamme-ārohati. Mariyādāyaṃ-āpabbatā khettaṃ. Abhividhimhi-ābrahmalokā kittisaddo. Pattiyaṃ-āpanno. Icchāyaṃ-ākaṅkhā. Parissajane-āliṅgati. Ādikamme-ārambho. Gahaṇe-ādīyati. Nivāse-āvasatho. Samīpe-āsannaṃ. Avhāne-āmantanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1809: Uggate-uggacchati. Uddhaṃkamme-uṭṭhāti. Padhāne-uttaro. Viyoge-upavāso. Sambhave-ubbhūto. Atthalābhe-rūpassa uppādo. Sattiyaṃ-ussahati gantuṃ. Sarūpakhyāne-uddeso.
anya-e0201n0:1811: Antobhāve-ocarako, orodho. Adhokamme-okkhitto. Niggahe-ovādo. Antare, dese ca-okāso. Pātubhāve-opapātiko. Yesu atthesu avasaddo vattati, tesupi osaddo vattati.
anya-e0201n0:1813: Asobhaṇe-duggandho. Abhāve-dubbhikkhaṃ, dussīlo, duppañño. Kucchite-dukkaṭaṃ. Asamiddhiyaṃ-dusassaṃ. Kicche-dukkaraṃ. Virūpe-dubbaṇṇo, dummukho.
anya-e0201n0:1815: Nissese-nirutti. Niggate-niyyānaṃ. Nīharaṇe-niddhāraṇaṃ. Antopavesane-nikhāto. Abhāve-nimmakkhikaṃ. Nisedhe-nivāreti. Nikkhante-nibbānaṃ. Pātubhāve-nimmitaṃ. Avadhāraṇe-vinicchayo. Vibhajjane-niddeso. Upamāyaṃ-nidassanaṃ. Upadhāraṇe-nisāmeti. Avasāne-niṭṭhitaṃ. Cheke-nipuṇo.
anya-e0201n0:1817: Visese-vipassati. Vividhe-vicittaṃ. Viruddhe-vivādo. Vigate-vimalo. Viyoge-vippayutto. Virūpe-vippaṭisāro.
anya-e0201n0:1821: Samodhāne-sandhi. Sammā, samatthesu-samādhi, sampayutto. Samantabhāve-saṃkiṇṇo. Saṅgate-samāgamo, saṅkhepe-samāso. Bhusatthe-sāratto. Sahatthe-saṃvāso, sambhogo. Appatthe-samaggho. Pabhave-sambhavo. Abhimukhe-sammukhaṃ. Saṅgahe-saṅgayhati. Pidahane-saṃvuto. Punappunakamme-sandhāvati, saṃsarati. Samiddhiyaṃ-sampanno.
anya-e0201n0:1823: Atikkame-atirocati, accayo, atīto. Atikkante-accantaṃ. Atissaye-atikusalo. Bhusatthe-atikodho. Antokamme-mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā atiharitvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0201n0:1825: Adhike-adhisīlaṃ. Issare-adhipati, adhibrahmadatte pañcālā. Uparibhāve-adhiseti. Paribhavane-adhibhūto. Ajjhāyane-ajjheti, byākaraṇamadhīte. Adhiṭṭhāne-navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, iddhivikubbanaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Nicchaye-adhimuccati. Pāpuṇane-bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati, amataṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0201n0:1827: Anugate-anveti. Anuppacchinne-anusayo. Pacchāsaddatthe-anurathaṃ. Punappunabhāve-anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ, anusaṃvaccharaṃ. Yogyabhāve-anurūpaṃ.Kaniṭṭhabhāve-anubuddho, anuthero. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n0:1829: Apagate-apeti, apāyo. Garahe-apagabbho, apasaddo. Vajjane-apasālāya āyanti. Pūjāyaṃ-vuḍḍha-mapacāyanti. Padussane-aparajjhati.
anya-e0201n0:1831: Sambhāvane-apipabbataṃ bhindeyya, merumpi vinivijjheyya. Apekkhāyaṃ-ayampi dhammo aniyato. Samuccaye-itipi arahaṃ, chavimpi dahati, cammampi dahati, maṃsampi dahati. Garahāyaṃ-api amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka. Pucchāyaṃ-api bhante bhikkhaṃ labhittha, api nu tumhe sotukāmāttha.
anya-e0201n0:1833: Abhimukhe-abhikkanto. Visiṭṭhe-abhiññā. Adhike-abhidhammo. Uddhaṃkamme-abhirūhati. Kule-abhijāto. Sāruppe-abhirūpo. Vandane-abhivādeti. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n0:1835: Adhobhāge-avakkhitto. Viyoge-avakokilaṃ vanaṃ. Paribhave-avajānāti. Jānane-avagacchati. Suddhiyaṃ-vodāyati, vodānaṃ. Nicchaye-avadhāraṇaṃ. Dese-avakāso. Theyye-avahāro.
anya-e0201n0:1837: Upagame-upanisīdati. Samīpe-upacāro, upanagaraṃ. Upapattiyaṃ-saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. Sadise-upamāṇaṃ, upameyyaṃ. Adhike-upakhāriyaṃ doṇo. Uparibhāve – upasampanno, upacayo. Anasane-upavāso. Dosakkhāne-paraṃ upavadati. Saññāyaṃ-upadhā, upasaggo. Pubbakamme-upakkamo, upahāro. Pūjāyaṃ-buddhaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Gayhākāre-paccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Bhusatthe-upādānaṃ, upāyāso, upanissayo.
anya-e0201n0:1839: Patigate-paccakkhaṃ. Paṭilome-paṭisotaṃ. Paṭiyogimhi-paṭipuggalo. Nisedhe-paṭisedho. Nivatte-paṭikkamati. Sadise-paṭirūpakaṃ. Paṭikamme-rogassa paṭikāro. Ādāne-paṭiggaṇhāti. Paṭibodhe-paṭivedho. Paṭicce-paccayo. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n0:1843: Samantabhāve-parivuto, parikkhitto, parikkhāro. Paricchede-pariññeyyaṃ, parijānāti. Vajjane-pariharati. Parihāro. Āliṅgane-parissajati. Nivāsane-vatthaṃ paridahati. Pūjāyaṃ-pāricariyā. Bhojane-parivisati. Abhibhave-paribhavati. Dosakkhāne-paribhāsati. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n0:1844: Nīsaddo pana nīharaṇa, nīvaraṇādīsu vattati, nīharaṇaṃ, nīvaraṇaṃiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1847: Niccaṃ ekarūpena vākyapathe patantīti nipātā. Padānaṃ ādi, majjhā’vasānesu nipatantīti nipātātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:1848: Asatvavācakā cādisaddā nipātā nāma. Te pana vibhattiyuttā, ayuttā cāti duvidhā honti. Tattha vibhattiyuttā pubbe dassitā eva. Cādayo ayuttā nāma. Te pana anekasatappabhedā honti. Nighaṇṭusatthesu gahetabbāti.
anya-e0201n0:1850: Abyayataddhitapaccayantā nāma yathā, tathā, ekadhā, ekajjhaṃ, sabbaso, kathaṃ, itthaṃ iccādayo. Tehi tatiyālopo.
anya-e0201n0:1852: Tvādipaccayantā nāma katvā, katvāna, kātuna, kātuṃ, kātave, dakkhitāye, hetuye, ādāya, upādāya, viceyya, vineyya, sakkacca, āhacca, upasampajja, samecca, avecca, paṭicca, aticca, āgamma, ārabbhaiccādayo. Tesu tvā, tvānantehi paṭhamālopo. Tuṃ, tave, tāye, tuyepaccayantehi catutthīlopoti.
anya-e0201n0:1864: Ettha ca mattasaddena kattu, kammādike vibhatyatthe nivatteti. Tasmā atthamattanti liṅgatthoyeva vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:1865: Tattha anuccārite sati suṇantassa avidito attho līnattho nāma. Taṃ līnamatthaṃ gameti bodhetīti liṅgaṃ, uccāritapadaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1866: Taṃ pana pakatiliṅgaṃ, nipphannaliṅganti duvidhaṃ. Tattha vibhattirahitaṃ pakatiliṅgaṃ idhādhippetaṃ liṅga, vibhattīnaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vibhāgaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0201n0:1867: Līnaṃ aṅganti liṅgaṃ. Tattha ‘līna’nti apākaṭaṃ. ‘Aṅga’nti avayavo. Liṅgaṃ, nāmaṃ, pāṭipadikanti atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1868: Liṅgassa attho paramattho, paññattiatthoti duvidho. Tathā visesanattho, visesyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:1869: Tattha visesanattho nāma sakattho, tassa tassa saddassa paṭiniyato pāṭipuggalikatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Soyeva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe ādimhi sadduppattiyā cirakālañca saddapavattiyā nibaddhakāraṇattā nimittatthoti ca vuccati. So suti, jāti, guṇa, dabba, kriyā, nāma, sambandhavasena sattavidho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1870: Visesyattho nāma sāmaññattho, bahunimittānaṃ sādhāraṇatthoti vuttaṃ hoti, soyeva taṃtaṃnimittayogā nemittakatthoti ca vuccati, so jāti, guṇa, dabba, kriyā, nāmavasena pañcavidho. Go, sukko, daṇḍī, pācako, tissoti.
anya-e0201n0:1871: Tattha gosaddo yadā jātimattaṃ vadati go jātīti, tadā suti visesanaṃ. Yadā dabbaṃ vadati go gacchatīti, tadā suti ca jāti ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1872: Sukkasaddo yadā guṇamattaṃ vadati sukko guṇoti, tadā suti visesanaṃ. Yadā guṇavisesaṃ vadati gossa sukkoti, tadā suti ca guṇajāti ca visesanaṃ. Yadā guṇavantaṃ dabbaṃ vadati sukko goti, tadā suti ca guṇajāti ca guṇaviseso ca sambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1873: Daṇḍīsaddo yadā jātimattaṃ vadati daṇḍī jātīti, tadā suti ca dabbañca visesanaṃ. Yadā dabbavantaṃ dabbaṃ vadati daṇḍī purisoti, tadā suti ca dabbañca jāti ca sambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1874: Pācakasaddo yadā jātimattaṃ vadati pācako jātīti, tadā suti ca kriyā ca visesanaṃ. Yadā kriyānipphādakaṃ dabbaṃ vadati pācako purisoti, tadā suti ca kriyā ca jāti ca kriyākārakasambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1875: Tissasaddo yadā nāmamattaṃ vadati tisso nāmanti, tadā suti visesanaṃ. Yadā nāmavantaṃ dabbaṃ vadati, tisso bhikkhūti, tadā suti ca nāmajāti ca sambandho ca visesanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1876: Sabbattha yaṃ yaṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ visesyanti ca dabbanti ca veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca suti nāma saddasabhāvā eva hoti, saddapakkhikā eva. Sabbo saddo paṭhamaṃ sattābhidhāyakoti ca ñāse vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabbattha sutiṭṭhāne sattā eva yuttā vattunti. Sattāti ca tassa tassa atthassa vohāramattenapi loke vijjamānatā vuccati, taṃ taṃ saddaṃ suṇantassa ca ñāṇaṃ taṃtadatthassa atthitāmattaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ jānāti, tato paraṃ jātisadde jātiṃ jānāti. Guṇasadde guṇanti evamādi sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Liṅga, saṅkhyā, parimāṇānipi visesanatthe saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1877: Tattha liṅgaṃ nāma ye itthi, purisānaṃ liṅga, nimitta, kuttā’kappā nāma abhidhamme vuttā, ye ca napuṃsakānaṃ liṅga, nimitta, kuttā’kappā nāma avuttasiddhā, ye ca saddesu ceva atthesu ca visadā’visadākāra, majjhimākārā sandissanti, sabbametaṃ liṅgaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:1878: Evaṃ visesana, visesyavasena duvidho attho pubbe vuttassa saddaliṅgassa attho nāma, so saliṅgo, sasaṅkhyo, saparimāṇo cāti tividho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1879: Tattha saliṅgo yathā? Saññā, phasso, cittaṃ. Kaññā, puriso, kulaṃ. Mālā, rukkho, dhananti.
anya-e0201n0:1880: Sasaṅkhyo yathā? Eko, dve, tayo, bahū iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1881: Saparimāṇo yathā? Vidatthi, hattho, doṇo, āḷhakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1882: Api ca suddho, saṃsaṭṭhoti duvidho liṅgattho. Tattha kammādisaṃsaggarahito suddho nāma. So saliṅgo, sasaṅkhyo, saparimāṇo, upasaggattho, nipātattho, pāṭi-padikatthoti chabbidho. Atthi, sakkā, labbhāiccādi idha pāṭipadikaṃ nāma. Tuna, tvāna, tvā, tave, tuṃ, khattuṃpaccayantāpi nipātesu gayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:1883: Saṃsaṭṭho vuttasaṃsaṭṭho, avuttasaṃsaṭṭhoti duvidho. Tattha vuttasaṃsaṭṭho catubbidho samāsena vuttasaṃsaṭṭho, taddhitena, ākhyātena, kitenāti. Tattha samāsena vutto chakārakasambandhavasena sattavidho, bhāvena saddhiṃ aṭṭhavidho vā, tathā taddhitena vutto. Ākhyātena vutto kattu, kamma, bhāvavasena tividho. Kitena vutto chakāraka, bhāvavasena sattavidho. Sabbo suddho ceva vuttasaṃsaṭṭho ca paṭhamāya visayo.
anya-e0201n0:1884: Avuttasaṃsaṭṭhopi kattusaṃsaṭṭho, kammasaṃsaṭṭhotiādinā anekavidho. So dutiyādīnaṃ eva visayoti. Ettha ca vibhattiyā vinā kevalo saddo payogaṃ nārahatīti katvā payogārahatthameva chabbidhe suddhe catubbidhe ca vuttasaṃsaṭṭhe paṭhamā payujjati, na atthajotanatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1885: Kenaci vācakena avuttāni pana kammādīni vibhattīhi vinā viditāni na hontītikatvā atthajotanatthampi kammādīsu dutiyādayo payujjanti. Tasmā atthamatteti idha desantarāvacchedake visayamatte bhummaṃ. Kamme dutiyāiccādīsu pana nipphādetabbe payojane bhummanti evaṃ dvinnaṃ bhummānaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e0201n0:1886: 290. Āmantane ka. 285; rū. 70; nī. 578; caṃ. 2.1.94; pā. 2.3.47; āmantaṇe (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:1887: Pageva siddhassa vatthuno nāmena vā nipātena vā attano abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ āmantanaṃ nāma. Adhikāmantane atthamatte paṭhamā hoti. Ettha ca āmantanapadaṃ nāma kriyāpekkhaṃ na hoti, tasmā kārakasaññaṃ na labhati.
anya-e0201n0:1888: Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ sādarā’nādaravasena. Ehi samma, ehi jeti.
anya-e0201n0:1889: Tathā sajīva, nijjīvavasena, bho purisa, vadehi bho saṅkha, vadehi bho saṅkha dī. ni. 2.426. Ummujja bho puthusile, ummujja bho puthusileti saṃ. ni. 4.358.
anya-e0201n0:1890: Tathā paccakkhā’paccakkhavasena, bho purisa, kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakāti saṃ. ni. 2.63; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.2.
anya-e0201n0:1891: Tathā niyamā’niyamavasena, bho purisa, acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho dī. ni. 2.192. Yatra hi nāma saññī samānotiādi dī. ni. 2.192. Idaṃ āmantanaṃ nāma pageva siddhe eva hoti, na vidhātabbe, na hi pageva rājabhāvaṃ vā bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā appattaṃ janaṃ ‘‘bho rājā’’ti vā ‘‘bho bhikkhū’’ti vā āmantentīti.
anya-e0201n0:1896: Kammatthe dutiyā hoti. Kariyateti kammaṃ, taṃ nibbattikammaṃ, vikatikammaṃ, pattikammanti tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1897: Tattha nibbattikammaṃ yathā? Iddhimā hatthivaṇṇaṃ māpeti, rājā nagaraṃ māpeti, mātā puttaṃ vijāyati, bījaṃ rukkhaṃ janeti, kammaṃ vipākaṃ janeti, āhāro balaṃ janeti, jano puññaṃ karoti, pāpaṃ karoti, buddho dhammaṃ desesi, vinayaṃ paññapesi, bhikkhu jhānaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1898: Vikatikammaṃ yathā? Gehaṃ karoti, rathaṃ karoti, ghaṭaṃ karoti, paṭaṃ vāyati, odanaṃ pacati, bhattaṃ pacati, kaṭṭhaṃ aṅgāraṃ karoti, suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, gehaṃ jhāpeti, rukkhaṃ chindati, pākāraṃ bhindati, vihayo lunāti, pāṇaṃ hanati, bhattaṃ bhuñjati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1899: Pattikammaṃ yathā? Gāmaṃ gacchati, gehaṃ pavisati, rukkhaṃ ārohati, nadiṃ tarati, ādiccaṃ passati, dhammaṃ suṇāti, buddhaṃ vandati payirupāsati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1900: Pakatikammaṃ, vikatikammanti duvidhaṃ. Suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, kaṭṭhaṃ aṅgāraṃ karoti, purisaṃ ṭhitaṃ passati, purisaṃ gacchantaṃ passati, bhikkhuṃ passati sataṃ, sampajānaṃ, abhikkamantaṃ, paṭikkamantaṃ, ālokentaṃ, vilokentaṃ, samiñjentaṃ, pasārentaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1902: Dhātukammaṃ, kāritakammanti duvidhaṃ. Gāmaṃ gacchati, purisaṃ gāmaṃ gameti.
anya-e0201n0:1903: Dhātukammañca dvikammikadhātūnaṃ duvidhaṃ padhānakammaṃ, appadhānakammanti. Ajapālo ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, puriso bhāraṃ gāmaṃ vahati, harati, gāmaṃ sākhaṃ kaḍḍhati, gāviṃ khīraṃ dohati, brāhmaṇaṃ kambalaṃ yācati, brāhmaṇaṃ bhattaṃ bhikkhati, gāviyo vajaṃ avarundhati, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, rukkhaṃ phalāni ocināti, sissaṃ dhammaṃ bravīti, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca udā. 23 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ), sissaṃ dhammaṃ anusāsati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1904: Ettha ca ‘ajaṃ, khīraṃ’ iccādi padhānakammaṃ nāma kattārā pariggahetuṃ iṭṭhatarattā. ‘Gāmaṃ, gāviṃ’iccādi appadhānakammaṃ nāma tathā aniṭṭhatarattā.
anya-e0201n0:1905: Tattha padhānakammaṃ kathinakammaṃ nāma, kammabhāve thirakammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Appadhānakammaṃ akathinakammaṃ nāma, athirakammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tañhi kadāci sampadānaṃ hoti, kadāci apādānaṃ, kadāci sāmi, kadāci okāso. Yathā – so maṃ dakāya neti, gāvito khīraṃ dohati, gāviyā khīraṃ dohahi, gāviyaṃ khīraṃ dohati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1907: 292. Gatibodhāhārasaddatthā kammaka bhajjādīnaṃ payojje ka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṃ. 2.1.44; pā. 1.4.52.
anya-e0201n0:1908: Niccavidhisuttamidaṃ. Gamanatthānaṃ bodhanatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthānaṃ akammakānaṃ bhajjādīnañca dhātūnaṃ payojje kammani dutiyā hoti. Ettha ca payojjakammaṃ nāma kāritakammaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:1909: Puriso purisaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati, sāmiko ajapālaṃ ajaṃ gāmaṃ nayāpeti, ācariyo sissaṃ dhammaṃ bodheti, puriso purisaṃ bhattaṃ bhojeti, ācariyo sissaṃ dhammaṃ pāṭheti, puriso purisaṃ sayāpeti, acchāpeti, uṭṭhāpeti, puriso purisaṃ dhaññaṃ bhajjāpeti, koṭṭāpeti, uddharāpeti.
anya-e0201n0:1910: Etesamīti kiṃ? Puriso purisena odanaṃ pāceti.
anya-e0201n0:1911: Ettha ca gamanatthādīnaṃ payojje tatiyāpi rūpasiddhiyaṃ 141 piṭṭhe saddanītiyañca sutta-148 piṭṭhe vuttā. Saddanītiyaṃ tatiyāpayogepi kammatthameva icchati. Ñāsādīsu katvatthaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:1912: Yadā pana paṭhamaṃ payojakaṃ añño dutiyo payojeti, tadā paṭhamo payojjo nāma. Tasmiṃ tatiyāevāti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Attanā vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ parehi pariyosāpeti pārā. 363.
anya-e0201n0:1914: Harādīnaṃ payojje kammani vikappena dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1915: Sāmiko purisaṃ bhāraṃ hāreti purisena vā, purisaṃ āhāraṃ ajjhohāreti purisena vā, purisaṃ kammaṃ kāreti purisena vā, rājā purisaṃ attānaṃ dasseti purisena vā, purisaṃ buddhaṃ vandāpeti purisena vā.
anya-e0201n0:1917: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kammani na dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1918: Sāmiko purisena khajjaṃ khādāpeti, ada-bhakkhane, bhattaṃ ādeti, sāmiko dāsena purisaṃ avhāpeti, saddāyāpeti, kandayati, nādayati. Ettha ca ‘saddāyāpetī’ti saddaṃ kārāpeti, nāmadhātu cesā. Kanda, nadāpi saddatthāyeva.
anya-e0201n0:1919: 295. Vahissāniyantuke ka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṃ. 2.1.48; pā. 1.4.52.
anya-e0201n0:1920: Vahissāti dhātuniddeso i-kāro, niyāmeti payojetīti niyantā, natthi niyantā etassāti aniyantuko. Yassa aññena payojakena kiccaṃ natthi, sayameva ñatvā vahati, so aniyantuko nāma, vahadhātussa tādise aniyantuke payojje kammani dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1923: 296. Bhakkhissāhiṃsāyaṃ ka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṃ. 2.1.49; pā. 1.4.5.
anya-e0201n0:1924: Bhakkhituṃ icchantassa bhakkhāpanaṃ hiṃsā nāma na hoti, anicchantassa bhakkhāpanaṃ hiṃsā nāma, bhakkhadhātussa payojje kammani ahiṃsāvisaye dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1926: Ahiṃsāyanti kiṃ? Balībadde sassaṃ bhakkhāpeti. Ettha ‘sassa’nti thūlataraṃ sassanti vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:1927: Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘sabbesaṃ viññāpetvāna apa. thera 1.1.438, tosenti sabbapāṇinaṃ apa. thera 1.1.300. Therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo’’ iccādinā pārā. 615 payojje chaṭṭhīpi dissati.
anya-e0201n0:1929: Dhīiccādīhi nipātopasaggehi yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1930: Dhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ dha. pa. 389, dhīratthu’maṃ pūtikāyaṃ jā. 1.3.129, dhīratthu taṃ dhanalābhaṃ jā. 1.4.36, dhīratthu bahuke kāme. Tatiyāpi dissati, dhīratthu jīvitena me jā. 2.17.135. Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ dī. ni. 1.1, abhito gāmaṃ vasati, paritogāmaṃ vasati, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati su. ni. 427, etesu chaṭṭhyatthe dutiyā.
anya-e0201n0:1931: Tathā paṭibhāti maṃ bhagavā udā. 45; saṃ. ni. 1.217, apissu maṃ tisso upamāyo paṭibhaṃsu ma. ni. 1.374, paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsituṃ mahāva. 258. Paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā saṃ. ni. 3.79 – ‘ma’nti mama, ‘ta’nti tava, sampadānatthe dutiyā. ‘Ma’nti mamañāṇe, ‘ta’nti tavañāṇetipi vaṇṇesuṃ. Na upāyamantarena atthassa siddhi, natthi samādānamantarena sikkhāpaṭilābho, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena, esevanto dukkhassa ma. ni. 3.393; udā. 74. Tattha ‘antarenā’ti nipātapadametaṃ, vajjetvātyattho. Pubbena gāmaṃ, dakkhiṇena gāmaṃ, uttarena gāmaṃ, gāmassa pubbeti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1932: Upasaggapubbānaṃ akammakadhātūnaṃ payoge ādhāre dutiyā, pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāmaṃ adhitiṭṭhati, rukkhaṃ ajjhāvasati, mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā pāci. 130, gāmaṃ upavasati, gāmaṃ anuvasati, pabbataṃ adhivasati, gharaṃ āvasati, agāraṃ ajjhāvasati dī. ni. 1.258; pārā. 519, uposathaṃ upavasati, kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjati, rūpāvacaraṃ upapajjati, arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjati, sakkassa sahabyataṃ upapajjati, nipannaṃ vā upanipajjeyya dī. ni. 3.282, nisinnaṃ vā upanisīdeyya dī. ni. 3.282, ṭhitaṃ vā upatiṭṭheyya dī. ni. 3.282 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1933: Tappāna, cārepi dutiyā, nadiṃ pivati, samuddaṃ pivati, gāmaṃ carati, araññaṃ carati, nadiyaṃ, gāmeti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1934: Kāla, disāsupi ādhāre eva dutiyā, taṃ khaṇaṃ, taṃ muhuttaṃ, taṃ kālaṃ, ekamantaṃ khu. pā. 5.1, ekaṃ samayaṃ khu. pā. 5.1; dī. ni. 1.1, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ pārā. 16, sāyanhasamayaṃ, taṃ divasaṃ, imaṃ rattiṃ dī. ni. 3.285, dutiyampi, tatiyampi, catutthaṃ vā pañcamaṃ vā appeti, tato pubbaṃ, tato paraṃ, purimaṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, pacchimaṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, uttaraṃ disaṃ dī. ni. 2.336, imā dasa disāyo, katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā jā. 1.16.104, imāsu disāsu katamāya disāya tiṭṭhati chaddantanāgarājāti atthoiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:1935: 298. Lakkhaṇitthambhūtavicchāsvabhinā ka. 299; rū. 288; nī. 582, 586; caṃ. 2.1.54; pā. 1.4.90, 91; 2.3.8.
anya-e0201n0:1936: Lakkhaṇādīsu atthesu pavattena abhinā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1937: Lakkhīyati lakkhitabbaṃ anenāti lakkhaṇaṃ. Ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ, īdiso visesoti attho. Itthaṃ bhūto pattoti itthambhūto. Bhinne atthe byāpituṃ icchā vicchā.
anya-e0201n0:1939: Rukkhamabhi vijjotate vijju, rukkhaṃ abhi byāpetvā vijjotateti attho, vijjobhāsena byāpito rukkho vijjuppādassa lakkhaṇaṃ saññāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1941: Sādhu devadatto mātaramabhi, mātaraṃ abhi visiṭṭhaṃ katvā sādhūti attho, devadatto sakkaccaṃ mātupaṭṭhāne aggapurisoti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato pārā. 1. Ettha ca ‘abbhuggato’ti abhi visiṭṭhaṃ katvā uggatoti attho, ayaṃ kittisaddo bhoto gotamassa sakalalokaggabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā uggatoti vuttaṃ hoti, kittisaddasambandhe pana tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:1943: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ abhi vijjotate cando, byāpetvā vijjotatetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:1944: Ettha ca lakkhaṇādiatthā abhisaddena jotanīyā piṇḍatthā eva, na vacanīyatthā, byāpanādiatthā eva vacanīyatthāti.
anya-e0201n0:1945: 299. Patiparīhi bhāge ca ka. 299; rū. 288; nī. 582, 586; caṃ. 2.1.55; pā. 1.4.90.
anya-e0201n0:1946: Lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchāsu ca bhāge ca pavattehi pati, parīhi yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1948: Rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate vijju, rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate vijju. Tattha ‘patī’ti paṭicca, ‘parī’ti pharitvā.
anya-e0201n0:1950: Sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pari.
anya-e0201n0:1952: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate cando.
anya-e0201n0:1954: Taṃ dīyatu, yadettha maṃ pati siyā, taṃ dīyatu, yadettha maṃ pari siyā. Tattha ‘patī’ti paṭicca, ‘parī’ti paricca, uddissāti attho, ‘ṭhapita’nti pāṭhaseso. Ettha maṃ uddissa yaṃ vatthu ṭhapitaṃ siyā, taṃ me dīyatūtyattho, etesu bahūsu bhāgesu yo mama bhāgo, so mayhaṃ dīyatūti vuttaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0201n0:1956: Lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchāsu ca bhāge ca pavattena anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1958: Rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate vijju, rukkhaṃ anu pharitvāti attho. Caturāsītisahassāni, sambuddhamanupabbajuṃ bu. vaṃ. 21.5, ‘sambuddha’nti bodhisattaṃ, anu gantvā pabbajiṃsūti attho, vipassibodhisatte pabbajite sati tānipi caturāsītikulaputtasahassāni pabbajiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. Saccakriyamanu vuṭṭhi pāvassi, ‘anū’ti anvāya, paṭiccāti attho, saccakriyāya sati saccakriyahetu devo pāvassīti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Hetu ca lakkhaṇaṃ bhavatī’’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Saccakriyāya sahevātipi yujjati. ‘‘Saha sacce kate mayha’’nti cariyā. 3.82 hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:1960: Sādhu devadatto mātaramanu. Tattha ‘anū’ti anvāya paṭicca.
anya-e0201n0:1962: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate cando. Tattha ‘anū’ti anu pharitvā.
anya-e0201n0:1964: Yadettha maṃ anu siyā, taṃ dīyatu. Tattha ‘anū’ti anvāya. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0201n0:1966: Sahatthe anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1967: Pabbataṃ anu tiṭṭhati pabbatamanusenā tiṭṭhati (moggallānavuttiyaṃ). Nadiṃ anvāvasitā bārāṇasī. ‘Anū’ti anugantvā, nadiyā saha ābaddhā tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:1969: Hīne pavattena anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
