anya-e0201n0:2430: Saṅkhyāṭhāne pana ka. 392; rū. 418; nī. 831 dve satāni dvisataṃ. Evaṃ tisataṃ, catusataṃ, pañcasataṃ, chasataṃ, sattasataṃ, aṭṭhasataṃ, navasataṃ, dasasataṃ, dvisahassaṃ, tisahassaṃ, catusahassaṃ, pañcasahassaṃ, dasasahassaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2431: Dve satasahassāni dvisatasahassaṃ. Evaṃ ‘‘tisatasahassaṃ, catusatasahassaṃ, pañcasatasahassa’’nti vā ‘‘dvisatāni, dve satāni, tisatāni, tīṇi satāni, catusatāni, cattāri satāni, dvisahassāni, dve sahassāni, tisahassāni, tīṇi sahassāni, dvisatasahassāni, dve satasahassānī’’ti vā evaṃ vacanadvayañca vākyañca veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ satasahassepīti.
anya-e0201n0:2432: Ettha siyā – digu nāma saṅkhyāpubbameva siyā, imesu ca sabbaṃ saṅkhyāpadameva hotīti? Digumhi pubbaṃ saṅkhyāpadameva siyā, parapadaṃ pana saṅkhyāpadampi aññampi yujjatīti.
anya-e0201n0:2436: Bahavo vīhayo yasmiṃ dese soyaṃ bahubbīhi, tādiso gāmo vā deso vā janapado vā, bahubbīhisaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso bahubbīhīti vuccati. Yathā hi bahubbīhisaddo samāsapadatthe atikkamma gāma, desa, janapadaiccādīnaṃ aññesaṃ padānaṃ atthesu tiṭṭhati, tathā ayaṃ samāsopi. Aññapadatthapadhāno hi bahubbīhisamāso.
anya-e0201n0:2437: So saṅkhepena duvidho tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo cāti.
anya-e0201n0:2438: Tattha ‘guṇo’ti appadhānabhūto samāsapadānaṃ attho, so aññapadatthassa visesanabhūtattā tassa aññapadatthassa guṇoti atthena tagguṇoti vuccati, viññātabboti viññāṇo, aññapadattho, tagguṇaṃ amuñcitvā tagguṇena saheva viññāṇo aññapadattho yasminti tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, na tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, yattha samāsapadattho avayavabhāvena vā sahavidheyyabhāvena vā aññapadatthe antogadho hoti, so tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo. Yathā? Chinnahattho puriso, buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ deti, saputtadāro āgato, pādayo upasaggā nāmāti.
anya-e0201n0:2439: Ettha ca ‘buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ detī’ti bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhattaṃ deti, pamukhabhūtassa buddhassa ca bhattaṃ detīti attho. ‘Saputtadāro āgato’ti puttadārā ca āgatā, puriso ca āgatoti attho. ‘Pādayo upasaggā nāmā’ti pa-kāro ca upasaggo nāma, parādayo ca upasaggā nāmāti attho. Evaṃ yojanārahatā aññapadatthena saha samāsapadatthassa vidheyyatā nāmāti.
anya-e0201n0:2440: Atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo yathā? Dinnasuṅko rājā dānaṃ deti, pabbatādīni khettāni kassati iccādi. Imesu pana samāsapadattho avidheyyo, aññapadattho eva vidheyyo.
anya-e0201n0:2442: Paṭhamābahubbīhi, dutiyābahubbīhi, tatiyābahubbīhi, catutthībahubbīhi, pañcamībahubbīhi, chaṭṭhībahubbīhi, sattamībahubbīhi cāti sattavidho.
anya-e0201n0:2443: Tattha paṭhamābahubbīhi sahapubbapada, upamānapubbapada, saṅkhyobhayapada, disantarāḷattha, byatihāralakkhaṇavasena pañcavidho.
anya-e0201n0:2446: Anekaṃ syādyantapadaṃ aññapadassa atthe vikappena ekatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2447: Saha vitakkenāti savitakko, vitakkena saha yo vattatīti vā savitakko, samādhi.
anya-e0201n0:2448: Ettha ca ‘saha vitakkenā’ti ettha paṭhamāvibhattiyā atthabhūto aññapadattho vākyasāmatthiyena sijjhati. Na hi kriyākārakarahitaṃ vākyaṃ nāma sambhavati, iminā suttena sahapada, vitakkapadānaṃ samādhisaṅkhātena aññapadatthena ekatthībhāvo hoti, ekatthībhāve ca honte vākye ṭhitānaṃ aññapadānaṃ vibhattīnañca sabbe atthā ekatthabhūtena samāsena vuttā nāma honti, aññapadāni ca vibhattiyo ca vuttatthā nāma, vuttatthānañca attharahitattā payogakiccaṃ natthi, tasmā ‘ekatthatāya’nti suttena vibhattīnaṃ lopo, evaṃ sabbasamāsesu vākyedissamānānaṃ ya, ta, eta, ima, iti, eva, iva, viya, ca, vāiccādīnaṃ aññapadānaṃ mahāvuttisuttena lopo, vibhattīnañca lope sati sarantānaṃ byañjanantānañca samāsapadānaṃ sayameva pakatibhāvo, idha pana ‘sahassa soññatthe’ti suttena sahasaddassa sattaṃ, tato syādyuppatti, savitakko samādhi, savitakkā samādhayo, savitakkā paññā, savitakkā paññāyo, savitakkaṃ jhānaṃ, savitakkāni jhānāni iccādinā sabbaliṅga, vibhatti, vacanehi yojetvā payogasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0201n0:2449: Upamānapubbapado yathā? Kāyabyāmānaṃ samapamāṇattā nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo, nigrodho iva vā parimaṇḍalo yo hotīti so nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo, rājakumāro, saṅkho iva paṇḍaro saṅkhapaṇḍaro, kāko iva sūro kākasūro, sattānaṃ paññācakkhupaṭilābhakaraṇena tesaṃ cakkhu viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto, lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhakaraṇena tesaṃ dhammo viya bhūtoti dhammabhūto, niccasommahadayatāya brahmā viya bhūtoti brahmabhūto, andho viya bhūto ayanti andhabhūto iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2450: Saṅkhyobhayapado yathā? Dve vā tayo vā pattā dvittippattā, idha vāsaddāyeva aññapadāni nāma, aniyamabhūto tesaṃ attho aññapadattho nāma. Dvīhaṃ vā tīhaṃ vā dvīhatīhaṃ, cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā. Evaṃ sattaṭṭhamāsā, ekayojanadviyojanāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2451: Disantarāḷattho yathā? Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷaṃ hoti sā dakkhiṇapubbā. Evaṃ pubbuttarā, pacchimuttarā, aparadakkhiṇā, mahāvuttinā pubbapade rassattaṃ. Dakkhiṇā ca sā pubbā cāti dakkhiṇapubbā iccādinā kammadhārayopi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2453: 354. Tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2454: Sattamyantaṃ tatiyantañca samānarūpaṃ syādyantapadaṃ tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe aññapadatthe ekatthaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2456: Aññapadatthavisaye kriyābyatihāre gamyamāne padante ṅānubandho ipaccayo hoti, ettha ikāro rasso eva.
anya-e0201n0:2458: Vipaccayante uttarapade pare pubbapadantassa āttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2459: Kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti kesākesi, daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi. Evaṃ muṭṭhāmuṭṭhi, musalāmusali.
anya-e0201n0:2462: Āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ soyaṃ āgatasamaṇo, saṅghārāmo. Ettha ca samāsapadassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyattho cāti.
anya-e0201n0:2463: Tattha saṅghārāmassa samaṇehi pattabbabhāvasaṅkhātā kammasatti vāccattho nāma, sattimantabhūto saṅghārāmo abhidheyyattho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2464: Tattha āgatasamaṇasaddo vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ, āgatasamaṇoti sutvā samaṇehi pattabbabhāvamattaṃ jānāti, saṅghārāmadabbaṃ na jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā tassaṃ abhidheyyattho aññena saṅghārāmasaddena ācikkhiyati, vāccatthassa pana tena ujuṃ vuttattā puna vattabbābhāvato dutiyāvibhattiyā ācikkhanakiccaṃ natthi, tasmā saṅghārāmapade dutiyāvibhattisambhavo natthi, liṅgatthamattavisayā paṭhamāvibhatti eva pavattati, puna padantarasambandhe sati ‘‘saṅghārāmaṃ passati āgatasamaṇaṃ, saṅghārāmena gāmo sobhati āgatasamaṇena, saṅghārāmassa pūjeti āgatasamaṇassā’’tiādinā tato sabbā vibhattiyo pavattanti. Esa nayo sabbesu vācakapadesu netabboti.
anya-e0201n0:2465: Āgatasamaṇā sāvatthi, āgatasamaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ, āgacchanti samaṇā imanti vā āgatasamaṇo, vihāro. Ārūḷhā vānarā imaṃ rukkhanti ārūḷhavānaro, rukkho. Sampattā gāmikā yaṃ gāmanti sampattagāmiko. Evaṃ paviṭṭhagāmiko iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2468: Jitāni indriyāni yenāti jitindriyo, samaṇo. Diṭṭho catusaccadhammo yenāti diṭṭhadhammo. Evaṃ pattadhammo, viditadhammo, pariyogāḷhadhammo, katāni catumaggakiccāni yenāti katakicco, bahuvacane sati katāni kiccāni yehi te katakiccā, arahanto. Dhammena adhigatā bhogā yenāti dhammādhigatabhogo, puriso. Evaṃ adhammādhigatabhogo. Evaṃ kattari. Karaṇe pana chinno rukkho yenāti chinnarukkho, pharasu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2471: Dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṃ dinnasuṅko, upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ yassāti upanītabhojano, natthi tulo etassāti atulo, ‘ṭa nañssā’ti na-kārassa ṭattaṃ, natthi paṭipuggalo yassāti appaṭipuggalo, natthi sīlaṃ assāti dussīlo, natthi paṭisandhipaññā assāti duppañño, ‘ghapassantassāppadhānassā’ti suttena ghasaññassa āssa rassattaṃ. Natthi sīlaṃ assāti nissīlo, nippañño, apañño, virūpaṃ mukhaṃ assāti dummukho. Evaṃ dummano, dubbaṇṇo, natthi attano uttaro adhiko yassāti anuttaro, ‘ana sare’ti suttena nassa ana.
anya-e0201n0:2472: Idha bāhiratthabahubbīhi nāma vuccati, sattāhaṃ parinibbutassa assāti sattāhaparinibbuto, aciraṃ parinibbutassa assāti aciraparinibbuto, māso jātassa assāti māsajāto, dvemāsajāto, eko māso abhisittassa assa raññoti ekamāsābhisitto, ekāhaṃ matassa assāti ekāhamataṃ. Evaṃ dvīhamataṃ, tīhamataṃ, ekāhaṃ paṭicchannāya assāti ekāhappaṭicchannā. Evaṃ dvīhappaṭicchannā, āpatti. Yojanaṃ gatassa assāti yojanagato, dviyojanagato iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2475: Niggatā janā asmā gāmāti niggatajano, apagataṃ kāḷakaṃ itoti apagatakāḷako, paṭo. Apagatakāḷakaṃ, vatthaṃ. Apetaṃ viññāṇaṃ yamhāti apetaviññāṇaṃ, matasarīraṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2478: Chinno hattho yassa soti chinnahattho, hatthacchinno, jāto chando yassāti jātachando, chandajāto, sañjātaṃ pītisomanassaṃ yassāti sañjātapītisomanasso, pītisomanassasañjāto, visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ yassāti visuddhasīlo, sīlavisuddho, mahanto kāyo yassāti mahākāyo.
anya-e0201n0:2479: Idha upamānapubbapado nāma vuccati, suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, brahmuno viya saro yassāti brahmassaro, nāgassa viya gati assāti nāgagati. Evaṃ sīhagati, nāgavikkamo, sīhavikkamo, sīhassa viya hanu assāti sīhahanu, eṇissa viya jaṅghā yassāti eṇijaṅgho, usabhassa viya assa khandhoti usabhakkhandho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2480: Rūpaṃ vuccati sabhāvo, yādisaṃ rūpaṃ assāti yathārūpaṃ. Evaṃ tathārūpaṃ, evaṃ rūpaṃ assāti evarūpaṃ, bindulopo. Evaṃ ādi assāti evamādi. Tathā iccādi, iccevamādi, īdisaṃ nāmaṃ yassāti itthannāmo, evaṃnāmo, kīdisaṃ nāmaṃ yassāti kinnāmo, ‘konāmo’ti ettha mahāvuttinā kiṃsaddassa kottaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2481: Ko samudayo yassa dhammassāti kiṃsamudayo, kā jāti yassāti kiṃjātiko, kiṃnidānaṃ yassāti kiṃnidāno, kati vassāni yassāti kativasso, ko attho assāti kimatthaṃ, vacanaṃ. ‘Kvattho’ti mahāvuttinā kiṃsaddassa kottaṃ, yādiso attho assāti yadattho, tādiso attho assāti tadattho, ediso attho yassa vinayassāti etadattho, vinayo. Etadatthā, vinayakathā. Etadatthaṃ, sotāvadhānaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2484: Sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ sampannasasso, sulabhā bhikkhā yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ subhikkho, dullabhā bhikkhā yasminti dubbhikkho, bahavo gāmā asmiṃ janapadeti bahugāmo. Evaṃ bahujano, gāmo. Natthi gāmakhettaṃ yasmiṃ araññe tayidaṃ agāmakaṃ, samāsante ko. Saṃvijjanti manussā yasmiṃ gāme samanusso, na vijjanti manussā yasmiṃ gāme amanusso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2487: Bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi nāma vuccati, ekarattiṃ vāso assāti ekarattivāso, samānena janena saddhiṃ vāso assāti samānavāso, ubhato kammato uppannaṃ byañjanadvayaṃ assāti ubhatobyañjano, aluttasamāso. Evaṃ kaṇṭhasmiṃ kāḷo assāti kaṇṭhekāḷo, urasmiṃ lomāni assāti urasilomo, yassa hatthe patto atthīti pattahattho. Evaṃ asihattho, daṇḍahattho, chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. Evaṃ satthapāṇi, daṇḍapāṇi, vajirapāṇi, dāne ajjhāsayo assāti dānajjhāsayo, dānādhimuttiko, buddhesu bhatti assāti buddhabhattiko, buddhe gāravo assāti buddhagāravo, dhammagāravo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2489: Tipadabahubbīhi nāma vuccati, parakkamena adhigatā sampadā yehi te parakkamādhigatasampadā, dhammena adhigatā bhogā yehi te dhammādhigatabhogā, oṇīto pattamhā pāṇi yena so oṇītapattapāṇi, sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo, mattā bahavo mātaṅgā yasmiṃ vaneti mattabahumātaṅgaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2493: Dve ca dve ca padāni dvandā, dve ca dve ca atthā vā dvandā, mahāvuttinā dvinnaṃ dvisaddānaṃ dvandādeso. Dvandasaddasadisattā sabbo cāyaṃ samāso dvandoti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2494: Atha vā dve avayavā andiyanti bandhiyanti etthāti dvando, yugaḷassetaṃ nāmaṃ ‘‘pādadvandaṃ munindassa, vandāmi sirasāmaha’’nti ettha viya, idha pana padayugaḷaṃ atthayugaḷañca gayhati. Ubhayapadatthapadhāno hi dvando.
anya-e0201n0:2495: Ettha siyā – yadi ubhayapadatthappadhāno dvando, evañca sati dvande kathaṃ ekatthībhāvalakkhaṇaṃ siyāti? Vuccate – abhinnavidheyyatthattā. Vacanapathañhi patvā kattubhāvakammabhāvādiko vidheyyattho eva padānaṃ accantappadhānattho hoti vacanavākyasampattiyā padhānaṅgattā, so ca vidheyyattho dvandepi abhinno eva hoti. Tathā hi ‘‘sāriputtamoggallānā gacchanti, sāriputtamoggallāne passati’’ iccādīsu dve atthā ekavibhattiyā visayā hutvā ekakattu, ekakammādibhāvena ekattaṃ gacchanti, evaṃ dvandepi dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bahunnaṃ vā padānaṃ ekatthībhāvalakkhaṇaṃ labbhatiyevāti.
anya-e0201n0:2497: Anekaṃ syādyantapadaṃ casaddassa atthe ekatthaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2498: Ettha ca samuccayo, anvācayo, itarītarayogo, samāhāroti cattāro casaddatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2499: Tattha samuccayo yathā? Cīvarañca piṇḍapātañca senāsanañca detīti. Anvācayo yathā? Dānañca deti, sīlañca rakkhatīti. Ime dve casaddatthā vākyadvande eva labbhanti, na samāsadvande padānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nirapekkhattāti vadanti. Taṃ anvācaye yujjati nānākriyāpekkhattā, samuccaye pana ‘‘cīvarañca piṇḍapātañca senāsanañca detī’’ti vā ‘‘cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanāni detī’’ti vā evaṃ dvidhāpi yojetuṃ yujjatiyeva ‘‘lābhī hoti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna’’nti ma. ni. 1.65 pāḷidassanato. Anvācayopi vā samāsadvande no na labbhati ‘‘mālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā’’ti dī. ni. 1.10 pāḷidassanato. Evaṃ pana yujjeyya – casaddattho ekakriya, nānākriyāpekkhanabhedena duvidho hoti samuccayo, anvācayo cāti, tesu ca ekeko avayavappadhāna, samudāyappadhānabhedena duvidho hoti itarītarayogo, samāhāro cāti. Tattha itarītarayoge avayavappadhānattā sabbavibhattīsu bahuvacanameva yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2500: Dvande paṇītataraṃ pubbe nipatati. Sāriputto ca moggallāno ca sāriputtamoggallānā, sāriputtamoggallāne, sāriputtamoggallānehi iccādi. Evaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇā, brāhmaṇagahapatikā, khattiyabrāhmaṇā, devamanussā, candimasūriyā.
anya-e0201n0:2501: Appakkhara, bahvakkharesu appakkharaṃ kvaci pubbaṃ hoti, gāmanigamā, gāmajanapadā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2502: Kvaci ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇantā pubbe honti, aggi ca dhūmo ca aggidhūmā, rattidivā, dhātuliṅgāni.
anya-e0201n0:2503: Avaṇṇantesu sarādipadaṃ pubbaṃ hoti, attho ca dhammo ca atthadhammā, dhammatthā vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2504: Ayañca niyamo dvipadadvandesu yebhuyyena labbhati, bahupadadvandesu na labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:2507: Catthe samāhāre ekatthapadaṃ napuṃsakaṃ hoti, ekavacanantattaṃ pana samāhāravacaneneva siddhaṃ, ayañca samāhāro pāṇyaṅgādīnaṃ dvandesu niccaṃ labbhati, rukkhatiṇādīnaṃ dvandesu vikappena labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:2509: Cakkhu ca sotañca cakkhusotaṃ, mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṃ, ‘syādīsu rasso’ti rassattaṃ. Hanu ca gīvā ca hanugīvaṃ. Evaṃ kaṇṇanāsaṃ, chavi ca maṃsañca lohitañca chavimaṃsalohitaṃ, nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpaṃ, jarā ca maraṇañca jarāmaraṇaṃ. Bahulādhikārā kvaci vikapparūpampi dissati, hatthā ca pādā ca hatthapādaṃ, hatthapādā vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2511: Naccañca gītañca vāditañca naccagītavāditaṃ. Evaṃ sammatāḷaṃ, ‘samma’nti kaṃsatāḷaṃ, ‘tāḷa’nti hatthatāḷaṃ, saṅkho ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2513: Phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2515: Hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṃ. Evaṃ rathapattikaṃ, asi ca cammañca asicammaṃ. ‘Camma’nti saraparittāṇaphalakaṃ, dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2517: Ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ. Evaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ su. ni. 607, kīṭapaṭaṅgaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2519: Ahi ca nakulo ca ahinakulaṃ, biḷāro ca mūsikā ca biḷāramūsikaṃ, rassattaṃ. Kākolūkaṃ, sappamaṇḍūkaṃ, nāgasupaṇṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2521: Sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṃ, vijjā ca caraṇañca vijjācaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ satisampajaññaṃ, hiriottappaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2523: Kusalākusalaṃ, sāvajjānavajjaṃ, kaṇhasukkaṃ, hīnapaṇītaṃ, chekabālaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2525: Dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ, aṅguttarasaṃyuttakaṃ, khandhakavibhaṅgaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2529: Orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṃ. Evaṃ sākuṇikamāgavikaṃ, sapākacaṇḍālaṃ, venarathakāraṃ, pukkusachavaḍāhakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2533: Pubbā ca aparā ca pubbāparaṃ. Evaṃ dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, pubbadakkhiṇaṃ, pubbuttaraṃ, aparadakkhiṇaṃ, aparuttaraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2535: Gaṅgāyamunaṃ, mahisarabhu, sabbattha napuṃsakattā ante dīghānaṃ rassattaṃ sattasu vibhattīsu ekavacanantañca.
anya-e0201n0:2538: Usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ, usīrabīraṇā. Evaṃ muñjapabbajaṃ, muñjapabbajā, kāsakusaṃ, kāsakusā.
anya-e0201n0:2540: Khadiro ca palāso ca khadirapalāsaṃ, khadirapalāsā, dhavo ca assakaṇṇo ca dhavassakaṇṇaṃ, dhavassakaṇṇā, pilakkhanigrodhaṃ, pilakkhanigrodhā, assatthakapītanaṃ kapitthanaṃ (katthaci), assatthakapītanā, sākasālaṃ, sākasālā.
anya-e0201n0:2542: Gajā ca gavajā ca gajagavajaṃ, gajagavajā, gomahisaṃ, gomahisā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ, eṇeyyavarāhā, ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ, kukkuṭasūkarā, hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ, hatthigavassavaḷavā.
anya-e0201n0:2544: Haṃsabilavaṃ, haṃsabilavā, kāraṇḍavacakkavākaṃ, kāraṇḍavacakkavākā, bakabalākaṃ, bakabalākā.
anya-e0201n0:2546: Hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇā, maṇi ca saṅkho ca muttā ca veḷuriyañca maṇisaṅkhamuttaveḷuriyaṃ, maṇisaṅkhamuttaveḷuriyā, jātarūparajataṃ, jātarūparajatā.
anya-e0201n0:2548: Sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā, tilamuggamāsaṃ, tilamuggamāsā, nipphāvakulatthaṃ, nipphāvakulatthā.
anya-e0201n0:2550: Macchamaṃsaṃ, macchamaṃsā, sākasūpaṃ, sākasūpā, gabyamāhisaṃ, gabyamāhisā, eṇeyyavārāhaṃ, eṇeyyavārāhā, migamāyūraṃ, migamāyūrā.
anya-e0201n0:2552: Kāsikosalaṃ, kāsikosalā, vajjimallaṃ, vajjimallā, cetavaṃsaṃ, cetavaṃsā, majjhañca sūrasenañca majjhasūrasenaṃ, majjhasūrasenā, kurupañcālaṃ, kurupañcālā.
anya-e0201n0:2556: Idāni pubbe vuttāni avuttāni ca chasu samāsesu visesavidhānāni vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:2557: Napuṃsakekattaṃ, samāsantarasso, pumbhāvātideso, samāsante ka, samāsante a, nānādeso, abyayo, saṅkhyā.
anya-e0201n0:2559: Tattha sabbo abyayībhāvo napuṃsakaliṅgo eva, samāhārabhūtā digu, dvandā napuṃsakā ca ekattasaṅkhyā ca.
anya-e0201n0:2560: 359. Kvacekattañca chaṭṭhiyā ka. 327; rū. 351; nī. 704; caṃ. 2.2.69-73; pā. 2.4.22-25.
anya-e0201n0:2562: Chāyā, sabhāsvevāyaṃ vidhi, salabhānaṃ chāyā salabhacchāyaṃ …sabhacchāyaṃ (mūlapāṭhe). Evaṃ sakaṭacchāyaṃ, gharacchāyaṃ. Idha na hoti, rukkhacchāyā, pabbatacchāyā. Sabhāsadde amanussasabhāsvevāyaṃ vidhi, brahmūnaṃ sabhā brahmasabhaṃ. Evaṃ devasabhaṃ, indasabhaṃ, yakkhasabhaṃ, rakkhasasataṃ. Manussasabhāsu natthi, khattiyasabhā, rājasabhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2566: ‘Syādīsu rasso’ti suttena abyayībhāva, samāhāradigu, dvandānaṃ kassaci tappurisassa ca syādīsu rasso.
anya-e0201n0:2575: 360. Ghapassantassāppadhānassa ka. 403; rū. 354; nī. 858; caṃ. 2.2.86; pā. 1.2.48.
anya-e0201n0:2576: Syādīsu antabhūtassa appadhānabhūtassa ca ghapassa rasso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2578: Bahukañño, poso, bahuitthi, kulaṃ, bahuvadhu, kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2584: Syādīsu antabhūtassa appadhānabhūtassa ca gossa u hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2590: 362. Itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumitthī pumāvekatthe ka. 331; rū. 353; nī. 714; caṃ. 5.2.29; pā. 6.3.34.
anya-e0201n0:2591: ‘Ekatthe’ti tulyādhikaraṇe, itthiyaṃ vattamāne ekatthe uttarapade pare kadāci bhāsitapumo itthiliṅgasaddo pumā iva hoti. Caturaṅgamidaṃ vidhānaṃ, pubbapadaṃ itthiliṅgañca bhāsitapumañca siyā, parapadaṃ niyatitthiliṅgañca pubbapadena ekatthañca siyāti.
anya-e0201n0:2592: Dīghā jaṅghā yassa so dīghajaṅgho, puriso, dīghajaṅghā, itthī, dīghajaṅghaṃ, kulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2593: Ettha ca ye saddā katthaci pulliṅgarūpā honti, katthaci itthipaccayayuttā itthiliṅgarūpā, te bhāsitapumā nāma. Dīgho maggo, dīghā ratti, gato puriso, gatā itthī, kumāro, kumārī, brāhmaṇo, brāhmaṇī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2594: Ye pana itthipaccayayuttā niccaṃ itthiliṅgarūpā honti, te bhāsitapumā nāma na honti, kaññā, paññā, saddhā, nadī, itthī, pathavī iccādi. Tathā sabhāvaitthiliṅgāpi niyatapunnapuṃsakaliṅgāpi bhāsitapumā na honti, devatā, ratti, dhenu, vadhū, sakko, devo, brahmā, ratanaṃ, saraṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2595: Idha pana dīghasaddo ‘‘dīgho bālāna saṃsāro’’ti dha. pa. 60 ādīsu bhāsitapumo, so visesyaliṅgānugatavasena idha itthipaccayayutto itthiliṅgasaddo nāma. Iminā suttena pumbhāvātidese kate tattha āpaccayo antaradhāyati, ‘ghapassantassāppadhānassā’ti suttena samāsantassa ākārassa rassattaṃ, kumārī bhariyā yassa so kumārabhariyo, īpaccayanivatti. Yuvati jāyā yassa so yuvajāyo, tipaccayanivatti. Brahmabandhū bhariyā yassa so brahmabandhubhariyo, ūpaccayanivatti.
anya-e0201n0:2596: Itthiyanti kiṃ? Kumārī ratanaṃ yassa so kumārīratano, puriso, idha parapadaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ na hoti, tasmā pumbhāvātideso na kātabbo, yadi kareyya, kumāro ratanaṃ yassa kumāraratanoti evaṃ aniṭṭhattho bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:2597: Ekattheti kiṃ? Kumārīsu bhatti yassa so kumārībhattiko. Evaṃ samaṇībhattiko, brāhmaṇībhattiko, samāsante ko, idha parapadaṃ pubbapadena ekatthaṃ na hoti, tasmā pumbhāvātideso na kātabbo, yadi kareyya, kumāresu bhatti yassa so kumārabhattikoti evaṃ aniṭṭhattho bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:2598: Itthīti kiṃ? Daṭṭhabbaṭṭhena diṭṭhi, gāmaṇikulaṃ diṭṭhi yena so gāmaṇidiṭṭhi, idha gāmaṇisaddo bhāsitapumo hoti, idha pana kulavācakattā napuṃsakaliṅge tiṭṭhati, itthipaccayo natthi, tasmā pumbhāvātidesakiccaṃ natthi.
anya-e0201n0:2599: Bhāsitapumoti kiṃ? Saddhā pakati yassa so saddhāpakatiko. Evaṃ paññāpakatiko, idha pubbapadaṃ niyatitthiliṅgattā bhāsitapumaṃ na hotīti. Saddhādhano, paññādhano, saddhādhuro paññādhuro iccatra duvaṅgavekallaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2600: Kammadhārayamhi ka. 332; rū. 343; nī. 716 pana ‘ekatthe’ti padaṃ visuṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ na hoti anekatthassa idha asambhavato. Dīghā ca sā jaṅghā cāti dīghajaṅghā, kumārī ca sā bhariyā cāti kumārabhariyā. Evaṃ khattiyakaññā, brāhmaṇakaññā, yuvati ca sā bhariyā cāti yuvabhariyā, brahmabandhū ca sā bhariyā cāti brahmabandhubhariyā.
anya-e0201n0:2601: Itthiyanti kiṃ? Kumārī ca sā ratanañcāti kumārīratanaṃ. Evaṃ samaṇīpadumaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2602: Itthīti kiṃ? Gāmaṇikulañca taṃ diṭṭhi cāti gāmaṇidiṭṭhi.
anya-e0201n0:2603: Bhāsitapumoti kiṃ? Saddhāpakati, gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu.
anya-e0201n0:2604: Saññāsaddesu pana caturaṅgayuttepi vidhānaṃ na hoti, nandādevī, nandāpokkharaṇī, kāyagatāsati, paṭhamāvibhatti, dutiyāvibhatti, pañcamīvibhatti, chaṭṭhīvibhatti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2606: Paccaye pare kadāci bhāsitapumo itthiliṅgasaddo kvaci pumāva hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2607: Byattatarā, byattatamā, ettha ca byattānaṃ itthīnaṃ atisayena byattāti byattatarā, byattatamāti attho. Evaṃ paṇḍitatarā, paṇḍitatamā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2608: 364. Sabbādayo vuttimatte ka. 331; rū. 353; nī. 714; caṃ. 5.2.41; pā. 6.3.35.
anya-e0201n0:2609: Vuttimatte ṭhāne sabbādināmakā sabbanāmasaddā pumāva honti.
anya-e0201n0:2610: Sā pamukhā yassa so tappamukho. Evaṃ tappadhāno, tāya tāhi vā sampayutto taṃsampayutto. Sā eva pamukhā tappamukhā. Evaṃ tappadhānā, tassā mukhaṃ tammukhaṃ, tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ tāsu gāthāsu vā tatra, tāya gāthato tāhi vā gāthāhi tato, tassaṃ velāyaṃ tadā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2611: Ettha ca vutti nāma samāsa, taddhitā’ yādidhātupaccayanta, vibhattipaccayantānaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2615: Aññapadatthavisaye kattuiccādīhi ltupaccayantehi itthiyaṃ ī, ūkārantehi ca bahulaṃ kapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2616: Bahavo kattāro yasmiṃ dese so bahukattuko. Evaṃ bahuvattuko, bahukā nadiyo yasmiṃ dese so bahunadiko. Evaṃ bahuitthiko, gāmo, bahuitthikā, sabhā, bahuitthikaṃ, kulaṃ. Evaṃ bahukumārikaṃ, bahubrahmabandhuko.
anya-e0201n0:2617: Ettha ca ‘brahmabandhū’ti rassapadaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadati, dīghapadaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ vadati, kapaccaye pare dīghānaṃ mahāvuttinā rassattaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:2620: Aññapadatthavisaye ltitthiyūhi aññato avaṇṇivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi bahulaṃ kapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2622: Agāmakaṃ, araññaṃ, bahugāmako, janapado, sasotako, asotako, salomako, sapakkhako, bahumālako, bahumālo, bahumāyako, bahumāyo.
anya-e0201n0:2624: Sundarā diṭṭhi yassa so sammādiṭṭhiko, sammādiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhiko, micchādiṭṭhi, matapatikā, itthī, saddhāpakatiko, paññāpakatiko, bahuhatthiko, bahudaṇḍiko.
anya-e0201n0:2626: Sahetuko, ahetuko, sacakkhuko, acakkhuko, sabhikkhuko, abhikkhuko, dīghāyuko, appāyuko, bahudhenuko, vajo, bahurattaññuko, bhikkhusaṅgho.
anya-e0201n0:2627: Itthiliṅge kamhi pare akārassa mahāvuttinā vā ‘adhātussa ke…’ti suttena vā bahulaṃ ikārattaṃ hoti, bahuputtikā, itthī, bahuputtakā vā, ekaputtikā, ekaputtakā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2630: 367. Samāsanta ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.52; pā. 5.4.68; ‘tva’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2631: ‘Samāsanto+a’ iti dvipadamidaṃ, samāsanto hutvā apaccayo hotīti attho. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2632: 368. Pāpādīhi bhūmiyā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.72; …pe… 5.4.75; ‘godāvarīnaṃ’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2633: Pāpādīhi parāya bhūmiyā samāsanto ahoti, ‘bhūmisaddassā’ti vattabbe niyatitthiliṅgadassanatthaṃ ‘bhūmiyā’ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ aññatthapi.
anya-e0201n0:2634: Pāpānaṃ bhūmi pāpabhūmaṃ, pāpānaṃ uppattibhūmityattho, jātiyā bhūmi jātibhūmaṃ, satthujātaraṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ pacchābhūmaṃ, majjhimadese pacchābhāgaraṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2636: Saṅkhyāhi parāya bhūmiyā samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2637: Dve bhūmiyo etthāti dvibhūmo, dvibhūmako, pāsādo, dvibhūmiko vā, tisso bhūmiyo etesanti vā tīsu bhūmisu pariyāpannāti vā tebhūmakā, dhammā, catubhūmakā, dhammā, tebhūmikā, catubhūmikā vā. Digumhi-dve bhūmiyo dvibhūmaṃ, tisso bhūmiyo tibhūmaṃ, catasso bhūmiyo catubhūmaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2638: 370. Nadīgodhāvarīnaṃ ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.73; pā. 5.4.75.
anya-e0201n0:2639: Saṅkhyāhi parāsaṃ nadī, godhāvarīnaṃ samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2640: Pañca nadiyo pañcanadaṃ, pañca vā nadiyo yasmiṃ padese so pañcanado, satta godhāvariyo sattagodhāvaraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2641: 371. Asaṅkhyehi caṅgulyānaññāsaṅkhyatthesu ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.74; pā. 5.4.86.
anya-e0201n0:2642: Aññattho ca asaṅkhyattho ca aññāsaṅkhyatthā. Tattha ‘aññattho’ti aññapadattho bahubbīhisamāso, ‘asaṅkhyattho’ti asaṅkhyatthasamāso abyayībhāvasamāsoti vuttaṃ hoti, na aññāsaṅkhyatthā anaññāsaṅkhyatthā, aññāsaṅkhyatthavajjitesu samāsesu asaṅkhyehi upasaggehi ca saṅkhyāhi ca parāya aṅguliyā samāsanto a hoti. Casaddena ‘‘sugataṅgulena, pamāṇaṅgulena’’ iccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2643: Aṅgulīhi niggataṃ niraṅgulaṃ, aṅguliyo atikkantaṃ accaṅgulaṃ, ime dve amādisamāsā, dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭāti dvaṅgulaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2644: Anaññāsaṅkhyatthesūti kiṃ? Pañca aṅguliyo asminti pañcaṅguli, hattho. Aṅguliyā samīpaṃ upaṅguli. ‘‘Caturaṅgulaṃ kaṇṇaṃ osāretvā mahāva. 66, aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ, dvaṅgulaparamaṃ, caturaṅgulaparamaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgulaparama’’ntiādīsu ‘aṅgula’nti akārantaṃ pamāṇavācīsaddantaraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2645: 372. Dārumhaṅgulyā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.97; pā. 5.4.114; ‘dārumyaṅgulyā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2646: Dārusaṅkhāte aññapadatthe pavattāya aṅguliyā samāsanto ahoti.
anya-e0201n0:2647: Pañca aṅguliyo assāti pañcaṅgulaṃ, dāru. Ettha ca aṅgulipamāṇāvayavo dhaññādīnaṃ mānaviseso ‘dārū’ti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:2648: 373. Dīghāhovassekadesehi ca ratyā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.75; pā. 5.4.87.
anya-e0201n0:2649: Dīgho ca aho ca vasso ca ekadeso cāti dvando, ekadeso nāma pubba, parādi, anaññāsaṅkhyatthesu dīghādīhi ca asaṅkhyehi ca saṅkhyāhi ca parāya rattiyā samāsanto a hoti. Casaddena ‘‘ciraratta’’nti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:2650: Dīghā rattiyo dīgharattaṃ, dīghā rattidivaparaṃparātyattho. Aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, vassena temitā ratti vassarattaṃ, rattiyā pubbaṃ pubbarattaṃ, rattiyā paraṃ pararattaṃ, rattiyā aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍharattaṃ, rattiṃ atikkanto atiratto, dve rattiyo dvirattaṃ. Evaṃ tirattaṃ, caturattaṃ, pañcarattaṃ, chārattaṃ, vādhikārattā ‘‘ekarattaṃ, ekarattī’’ti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:2651: Anaññāsaṅkhyatthesūti kiṃ? Dīghā ratti etthāti dīgharatti, hemanto. Rattiyā samīpaṃ uparatti.
anya-e0201n0:2652: 374. Go tvacatthe cālope ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.77; pā. 5.4.92.
anya-e0201n0:2653: Acatthe ca anaññā’saṅkhyatthesu ca pavattā gosaddamhā alopaṭṭhāne samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2654: Rañño go rājagavo, attano go sagavo, paresaṃ go paragavo, pañcagavo, pañcagavaṃ. Evaṃ dasagavaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2655: Alopeti kiṃ? Pañcahi gohi kīto pañcagu. Ettha ca tena kītoti etasmiṃ atthe taddhitapaccayassa lopo, tena ayaṃ apaccayo na hoti, ‘gossū’ti ossuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2656: Acattheti kiṃ? Gavajā ca gāvo ca gavajagavo, yomhi gossa gavattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2658: 375. Rattidiva dāragava caturassā ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.62; pā. 5.4.77.
anya-e0201n0:2660: Ratti ca divā ca rattidivaṃ, dārā ca gāvo ca dāragavaṃ, catasso assiyo yassa so caturasso, apaccayo, assissa issa attaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2665: 377. Akkhismāññatthe ka. 337; rū. 350; nī. 722; caṃ. 4.4.96; pā. 5.4.113.
anya-e0201n0:2666: Aññapadatthe pavattā akkhimhā samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2667: Visālāni akkhīni yassa so visālakkho, virūpāni akkhīni yassa so virūpakkho, anekasahassāni akkhīni yassa so sahassakkho, lohitāni akkhīni yassa so lohitakkho. Evaṃ nīlakkho, nīlakkhi vā. Bahulādhikārā anaññatthepi, akkhīnaṃ paṭimukhaṃ paccakkhaṃ, akkhīnaṃ parabhāgo parokkhaṃ, akkhīnaṃ tirobhāgo tirokkhaṃ. Akkhisaddena cettha pañcindriyāni gayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2668: Mahāvuttinā kvaci samāsanto a, ā, ipaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2670: Vāyuno sakhā vāyusakho, vāyusaṅkhāto sakhā assāti vā vāyusakho, aggi, sabbesaṃ piyā’piyamajjhattānaṃ sakhāti sabbasakho, sabbe vā sakhāyo assāti sabbasakho, mettāvihārī. ‘‘Sabbamitto sabbasakho’’ti theragā. 648 pāḷi. Pāpānaṃ sakhāti pāpasakho, pāpā sakhāro yassāti vā pāpasakho. ‘‘Pāpamitto pāpasakho’’ti dī. ni. 3.253 pāḷi. Pahito pesito attā yenāti pahitatto, majjhimo attā sabhāvo yassāti majjhatto, chātaṃ ajjhattasantānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ (mūlapāṭhe) yassāti chātajjhatto, suhito attā yassāti suhitatto, yato saṃyato attā yassāti yatatto, ṭhito attā assāti ṭhitattoiccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2672: Paccakkho dhammo yassāti paccakkhadhammā, chādetīti chado, moho, vivaṭo chado yasminti vivaṭacchadā, sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0201n0:2674: Sundaro gandho yassāti sugandhi, kucchito gandho yassāti duggandhi, pūtino gandho yassāti pūtigandhi, surabhino gandho surabhigandhi. ‘‘Sarīrassa sugandhino, guṇagandhiyutto aha’’nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2678: Uttarapade pare pubbapade vidhi hotīti attho. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2679: ‘‘Abrāhmaṇo, anariyo, abhikkhuko, ananto’’iccādīsu samāse uttarapade pare na-kārassa a, ana honti.
anya-e0201n0:2682: Nā’ssa khamatthīti nakho, ‘kha’nti sukhaṃ, dukkhañca, nā’ssa kulamatthīti nakulo, evaṃnāmako brāhmaṇo, pumassa sakaṃ puṃsakaṃ natthi puṃsakaṃ etasminti napuṃsako, khañjanaṃ vekallagamanaṃ khattaṃ, natthi khattaṃ etassāti nakkhattaṃ, kaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, tabbiruddhattā akaṃ vuccati dukkhaṃ, natthi akaṃ etasminti nāko, saggo, na muñcatīti namuci, māro. Na galati na cavatīti nagaraṃ, gehe vattabbe ‘agāra’nti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:2683: 380. Nago vā pāṇini ka. 333-334; rū. 344-345; nī. 717-718; caṃ. 5.2.96; pā. 6.3.77; ‘nago vāppāṇini’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2685: Na gacchantīti nagā, rukkhā. Nagā, pabbatā. Agā, rukkhā, agā, pabbatā.
anya-e0201n0:2686: Apāṇinīti kiṃ? Ago vasalo kiṃ tena. Ettha ‘ago’ti duggatajano, ‘vasalo’ti lāmako, ‘kiṃ tenā’ti nindāvacanaṃ, ‘‘sītenā’’tipi pāṭho. Evaṃ neke, aneke, nekāni, anekāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2688: 381. Sahassa soññatthe ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.97; pā. 6.3.82.
anya-e0201n0:2689: Aññapadatthe samāse uttarapade pare sahassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2690: Puttena saha yo vattatīti saputto, sahaputto.
anya-e0201n0:2691: Aññattheti kiṃ? Saha katvā, saha yujjhitvā.
anya-e0201n0:2693: Saññāyaṃ uttarapade pare sahassa so hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2694: Saha āyattaṃ sāyattaṃ, saha palāsaṃ sapalāsaṃ, agarukārassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2696: Apaccakkhe gamyamāne uttarapade pare sahassa so hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2697: Oḍḍiyati etāyāti oḍḍi, pāso. Oḍḍiyā saha yo vattatīti soḍḍi, kapoto. Idha ‘oḍḍi’ apaccakkhā. ‘‘Sāggi kapoto’’tipi pāṭho, picunā saha vattatīti sapicukā, vātamaṇḍalikā, sā ca apaccakkhā, uggantvā ākāse paribbhamantaṃ picusaṅghāṭaṃ disvā ñātabbā. ‘‘Sapisācā vātamaṇḍalikā’’tipi pāṭho. Evaṃ sarajā, vātā, sarakkhasī, ratti.
anya-e0201n0:2698: 384. Akāle sakatthassa ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.110; pā. 6.3.81.
anya-e0201n0:2699: Sakatthappadhānassa sahasaddassa so hoti akāle uttarapade pare.
anya-e0201n0:2701: Akāleti kiṃ? Saha pubbaṇhaṃ, saha paraṇhaṃ, sunakkhattena saha pavattaṃ pubbaṇhaṃ, paraṇhanti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2702: 385. Ganthantādhikye ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.101; pā. 6.3.79.
anya-e0201n0:2703: Ganthassa anto ganthanto. Yathā taṃ kaccāyanaganthassa anto uṇādikappo, adhikabhāvo ādhikyaṃ, ganthante ca ādhikye ca vattamānassa sahasaddassa so hoti uttarapade pare.
anya-e0201n0:2704: Saha uṇādinā’ yaṃ adhiyateti taṃ soṇādi, sakalaṃ kaccāyanaṃ adhītetyattho. Saha muhuttena sakalaṃ jotiṃ adhīte samuhuttaṃ, jotīti nakkhattasatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2705: Ādhikye – sadoṇā, khārī, sakahāpaṇaṃ, nikkhaṃ, samāsakaṃ, kahāpaṇaṃ. Niccatthamidaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2706: 386. Samānassa pakkhādīsu vā ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859; caṃ. 5.2.103-4; pā. 6.3.84-86.
anya-e0201n0:2707: Pakkhādīsu uttarapadesu samānassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2708: Samāno pakkho sahāyo sapakkho, samāno pakkho yassāti vā sapakkho, samānapakkho vā. Evaṃ sajāti, samānajāti, sajanapado, saratti.
anya-e0201n0:2709: Samāno pati yassā sā sapati. Evaṃ sanābhi, sabandhu, sabrahmacārī, sanāmo. Avhayaṃ vuccati nāmaṃ, candena samānaṃ avhayaṃ yassa so candasavhayo, sagotto, indena samānaṃ gottaṃ yassa so indasagotto, sarūpaṃ, saṭṭhānaṃ. Hari vuccati suvaṇṇaṃ, harinā samāno vaṇṇo yassa so harissavaṇṇo, sassa dvittaṃ. Evaṃ siṅgīnikkhasavaṇṇo, savayo, sadhano, sadhammo, sajātiyo.
anya-e0201n0:2712: Iyayutte udare pare samānassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2715: Aññesupi samānassa so hoti, candena samānā sirī yassa taṃ candassasirīkaṃ, mukhaṃ. Evaṃ padumassasirīkaṃ, vadanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2716: Mahāvuttinā santādīnañca so hoti, saṃvijjati lomaṃ assāti salomako. Evaṃ sapakkhako, saṃvijjanti āsavā etesanti sāsavā, saṃvijjanti paccayā etesanti sappaccayā, saṃvijjanti attano uttaritarā dhammā etesanti sauttarā, santo puriso sappuriso. Tathā sajjano, saddhammo, santassa bhāvo sabbhāvo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2720: Ayaṃ attho etassāti idamatthī, samāsante ī, idamatthino bhāvo idamatthitā. Ayaṃ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā, idappaccayānaṃ bhāvo idappaccayatā. ‘‘Imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā’’tipi yojenti. ‘Ida’nti nipātapadampi atthi, ‘‘rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissā, vedanā ca hidaṃ. Saññā ca hidaṃ. Saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissaṃsu’’ iccādi mahāva. 20.
anya-e0201n0:2722: Uttarapade pare pumassa puṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2723: Pumassa liṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo, pumā ca so kokilo cāti puṅkokilo, pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo, ‘go tvacatthe…’ti apaccayo, napuṃsako.
anya-e0201n0:2726: Uttarapade pare nta, ntūnaṃ ṭa hoti vā kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:2727: Bhavaṃ patiṭṭho yesaṃ te bhavaṃpatiṭṭhā, bindāgamo. Bhagavā mūlaṃ yesaṃ te bhagavaṃmūlakā, dhammā. Evaṃ bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā, dhammā.
anya-e0201n0:2728: Bahulādhikārā tarādīsu ca paresu, mahantīnaṃ atisayena mahāti mahattarī, rattaññūnaṃ mahantassa bhāvo rattaññumahattaṃ. Evaṃ jātimahattaṃ, guṇamahattaṃ, puññamahattaṃ, arahantassa bhāvo arahattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2730: Uttarapade pare nta, ntūnaṃ a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2733: Rī, rikkha, kapaccayantesu paresu samānassa so hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2734: Niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, saṃvijjatīti samāno, paccakkhe viya citte upalabbhatīti attho. Samāno viya so dissatīti sadī, sadikkho, sadiso, samānā viya te dissantīti sadisā.
anya-e0201n0:2736: Tesu paresu ntapaccayantassa ca kiṃ, imasaddānañca kamena ṭā, kī, ṭī honti.
anya-e0201n0:2737: Bhavaṃ viya so dissatīti bhavādī, bhavādikkho, bhavādiso, ko viya so dissatīti kīdī, kīdikkho, kīdiso, ayaṃ viya so dissatīti īdī, īdikkho, īdiso.
anya-e0201n0:2739: Tesu paresu sabbādināmakānaṃ ya, ta, eta, añña, amha, tumhasaddānaṃ anto ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2740: Yādī, yādikkho, yādiso, tādī, tādikkho, tādiso, etādī, etādikkho, etādiso.
anya-e0201n0:2742: Tesu paresu etassa eṭa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2743: Edī, edikkho, ediso, aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso, amhādī, amhādikkho, amhādiso, tumhādī, tumhādikkho, tumhādiso.
anya-e0201n0:2745: Tesu paresu ekavacane pavattānaṃ tumha’ mhasaddānaṃ tā, mā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2746: Ahaṃ viya so dissatīti mādī, mādikkho, mādiso, tvaṃ viya so dissatīti tādī, tādikkho, tādiso.
anya-e0201n0:2747: Ekasminti kiṃ? Amhe viya te dissantīti amhādino, amhādikkhā, amhādisā, tumhe viya te dissantīti tumhādino, tumhādikkhā, tumhādisā. Ettha ca upamānatthasseva ekattaṃ icchīyati, tasmā ahaṃ viya te dissantīti mādisā tvaṃ viya te dissantīti tādino, tādisātipi yujjanti. ‘‘Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhaya’’nti mahāva. 11 pāḷi, imāni padāni upari kitakaṇḍepi āgamissanti.
anya-e0201n0:2749: Rī, rikkha, kapaccayehi aññasmiṃ uttarapade pare tumha’mhānaṃ taṃ, maṃādesā honti kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:2750: Tvaṃ leṇaṃ yesaṃ te taṃleṇā, ahaṃ leṇaṃ yesaṃ te maṃleṇā saṃ. ni. 4.359. Evaṃ taṃdīpā, maṃdīpā saṃ. ni. 4.359, taṃpaṭisaraṇā, maṃpaṭisaraṇā.
anya-e0201n0:2751: 398. Manādyāpādīnamo maye ca ka. 183; rū. 386; nī. 375.
anya-e0201n0:2752: Uttarapade mayapaccaye ca pare manādīnaṃ āpādīnañca o hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2753: Manoseṭṭhā, manomayā, rajojallaṃ, rajomayaṃ, sabbo manogaṇo idha vattabbo, āpodhātu, āpomayaṃ. Anuyanti disodisaṃ dī. ni. 3.281, jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ jā. 1.2.9.
anya-e0201n0:2756: Parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, paropaṇṇāsa dhammā, idha parasaddo ‘‘indriyaparopariyatta’’nti ettha viya adhikatthavācisaddantaraṃ, na sabbanāmaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2759: Ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ janoti puthujjano. Api ca pāḷinaye puthusaddoyeva bahulaṃ dissati, puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāsatthārānaṃ mukhaṃ ullokentīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantīti puthujjanā mahāni. 51, 94, saññānānāttaputhuttapabhedaṃ paṭicca taṇhānānāttaputhuttapabhedo hoti dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, iṅgha aññepi pucchassu, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe saṃ. ni. 1.246. Gāmā gāmaṃ vicarissaṃ, sāvake vinayaṃ puthū, āyatāni puthūni ca, puthunā vijjuvaṇṇinā jā. 2.22.968, puthukāyā puthubhūtā iccādi. Tasmā ‘‘puthageva, puthakkaraṇe’’ iccādīsu thussa ukārassa akāro akāroti? yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2760: 401. So chassāhāyatanesu vā ka. 374; rū. 408; nī. 804.
anya-e0201n0:2761: Ahe ca āyatane ca pare chassa so hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2762: Cha ahāni sāhaṃ. Atthi sāhassa jīvitaṃ jā. 2.22.314, ‘sāhassā’ti sāhaṃ+assāti chedo. Saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2763: Vāti kiṃ? Chāhappaṭicchannā āpatti cūḷava. 134, cha āyatanāni.
anya-e0201n0:2764: 402. Ltupitādīnamāraṅraṅa ka. 200; rū. 159; nī. 415; caṃ. 5.2.20; pā. 6.3.32.
anya-e0201n0:2765: Samāsuttarapade pare ltupaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañca kamena āraṅa, raṅa honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2766: Satthuno dassanaṃ satthāradassanaṃ. Evaṃ kattāraniddeso. Mātā ca pitā ca mātarapitaro, mātāpitūsu saṃvaḍḍho mātāpitarasaṃvaḍḍho.
anya-e0201n0:2767: Vāti kiṃ? Satthudassanaṃ, kattu niddeso, mātāpitaro.
anya-e0201n0:2768: 403. Vijjāyonisambandhīnamā tatra catthe ka. 199; rū. 158; nī. 736; caṃ. 5.2.21; pā. 6.3.25.
anya-e0201n0:2769: Catthasamāse vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnañca ltupitādīnaṃ ā hoti tesveva paresu.
anya-e0201n0:2772: Ettha ca vijjāsippāni sikkhāpentā ācariyā sissānaṃ vijjāsambandhī mātāpitaro nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2774: Catte putte pare vijjāyonisambandhīnaṃ ltupitādīnaṃ ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2775: Mātāputtā gacchanti, pitāputtā gacchanti. Mahāvuttinā tesañca i hoti, mātipakkho, pitipakkho. Mātigho labhate dukhaṃ jā. 2.19.118, pitigho labhate dukhaṃ, māttikaṃ dhanaṃ, pettikaṃ dhanaṃ pārā. 34. Ettha ca mātuyā santakaṃ māttikaṃ, pituno santakaṃ pettikaṃ, dvittaṃ vuddhi ca. Mātito, pitito, bhātā eva bhātiko, bhātikarājā.
anya-e0201n0:2776: 405. Jāyāya jāyaṃ patimhi ka. 339; rū. 358; nī. 731; ‘…jayaṃ patimhi’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2778: Puttaṃ janetīti jāyā, jāyā ca pati ca jāyampatī jayampatī (bahūsu). Atha vā ‘‘jāyampatī’’ti idaṃ sandhividhināva siddhaṃ, tasmā ‘‘jampatī’’tipāṭho siyā yathā ‘‘devarājā sujampatī’ saṃ. ni. 1.264’ti, yathā ca sakkataganthesu ‘‘dāro ca pati ca dampatī’’ti. Idha pana mahāvuttinā patimhi sujātāya sujaṃ hoti, dārassa ca daṃ hoti, tathā jāyā ca pati ca jampatīti niṭṭhaṃ gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2779: Yañca vuttiyaṃ ‘‘jānipatīti pakatyantarena siddhaṃ, tathā dampatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha puttaṃ janetīti jānī. Jānī ca pati ca jānīpatīti yujjati. ‘‘Tudampatī’’ti pāṭho. Kaccāyane ca ‘jāyāya tu daṃjāni patimhī’ti. Tattha tusaddo padapūraṇamatte yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2780: 406. Saññāyamudodakassa ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 257; caṃ. 5.2.65; pā. 6.3.57.
anya-e0201n0:2781: Saññāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ uttarapade pare udakassa udo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2782: Udakaṃ dhāretīti udadhi, mahantaṃ udakaṃ dhāretīti mahodadhi, udakaṃ pivanti etthāti udapānaṃ, udakaṃ pivanti etāyāti udapāti.
anya-e0201n0:2784: Kumbhādīsu paresu udakassa udo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2785: Udakassa kumbho udakumbho, udakakumbho. Evaṃ udapatto, udakapatto, udabindu, udakabindu. Mahāvuttinā syādīsupi, ‘‘nīlodā pokkharaṇī’’ti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2787: Sotādīsu paresu udakassa ussa lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2788: Udakassa sotaṃ dakasotaṃ, udake rakkhaso dakarakkhaso, udakaṃ āsayo yesaṃ te dakāsayā, pāṇā. Mahāvuttinā syādīsupi, ‘‘dake dakāsayā sentī’’ti saṃ. ni. 3.78 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ) pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:2791: Pubbaṇho, aparaṇho, ajjaṇho, sāyaṇho sāyanho, majjhaṇho.
anya-e0201n0:2794: 410. Kupādayo niccamasyādividhimhi ka. 324; rū. 339; caṃ. 2.2.24; pā. 2.2.18.
anya-e0201n0:2795: Syādividhito aññattha kuādayo pādayo ca saddā syādyantena saha niccaṃ ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2796: Kucchito brāhmaṇo kubrāhmaṇo, īsakaṃ uṇhaṃ kaduṇhaṃ, pākaṭo hutvā bhavatīti pātubhūto, āvī ‘āvi’pi dissati hutvā bhavatīti āvībhūto, tuṇhī bhavatīti tuṇhībhūto, pamukho nāyako panāyako, pakārena karitvā pakaritvā pakārena kataṃ pakataṃ, paṭhamaṃ vā kataṃ pakataṃ, virūpo puriso duppuriso. Evaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, sobhaṇo puriso supuriso. Evaṃ sukataṃ, abhidhammo, abhitthuto, bhusaṃ kaḷāro ākaḷāro, bhusaṃ bandho ābandho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2797: Pādayo pakatādyatthe paṭhamāya ekatthā honti, pakato ācariyo pācariyo. Evaṃ payyako, paro antevāsī pantevāsī, paro putto paputto, paro nattā panattā.
anya-e0201n0:2798: Atyādayo atikkantādyatthe dutiyāya, mañcaṃ atikkanto atimañco. Evaṃ atibālo, ativelā.
anya-e0201n0:2799: Avādayo kuṭṭhādyatthe tatiyāya, kokilāya avakuṭṭhaṃ vanaṃ avakokilaṃ, ‘avakuṭṭha’nti chaḍḍitanti vadanti. Evaṃ avamayūraṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2800: Pariyādayo gilānādyatthe catutthiyā, ajjhāyituṃ gilāno pariyajjheno.
anya-e0201n0:2801: Nyādayo nikkhantādyatthe pañcamiyā, kosambiyā nikkhanto nikkosambi, vānato nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2804: Cīpaccayanto saddo kriyatthehi saddehi saha ekattho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2805: Balasā kiriya balīkiriya, pākaṭīkiriya, pākaṭībhuyya, pākaṭībhaviya.
anya-e0201n0:2807: Alamādayo saddā bhūsanādīsu atthesu etehi kriyatthehi saha ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2808: Bhūsanaṃ akāsīti alaṃkiriya, samaṃ ādaraṃ akāsīti sakkacca, asamaṃ anādaraṃ akāsīti asakkacca, binduno pararūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2809: Bhūsanādīsūti kiṃ? Alaṃ bhutvā gato, ‘ala’nti pariyattaṃ, sakkatvā gato, sobhaṇaṃ katvātyattho. ‘‘Kacca, kiriya’’ iccādinā saṃkhittarūpehi upapadena saha siddhehi eva ekatthasaññā, na ‘‘katvā’’ iccādinā asaṃkhittarūpehi visuṃ siddhehīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n0:2811: Aññe ca saddā kriyatthehi syādyantehi saha bahulaṃ ekatthā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2812: Atirekaṃ abhavīti parobhuyya. Evaṃ tirobhuyya, parokiriya, tirokiriya, urasikiriya, manasikiriya, majjhekiriya, tuṇhībhuyya.
anya-e0201n0:2813: Tyādisaddāpi saññābhāvaṃ pattā nipātarūpā honti, syādirūpā ca. Tasmā tepi imasmiṃ sutte saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2814: Atthikhīrā gāvī, nasantiputtā itthī, atthi hutvā paccayo atthipaccayo. Evaṃ natthipaccayo, ahosi eva kammaṃ ahosikammaṃ, ehi ca passa ca ehipassa, ehipassa iti vidhānaṃ arahatīti ehipassiko, ayaṃ taddhitantasamāso nāma. Evaṃ parattha.
anya-e0201n0:2815: Ehi bhaddanteti vuttopi na etīti naehibhaddantiko dī. ni. 1.394, tiṭṭha bhaddanteti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti natiṭṭhabhaddantiko, ehi svāgataṃ tuyhanti vadanasīlo ehisvāgatiko, ehisvāgatavādī pārā. 432 vā, ehi bhikkhūti vacanena siddhā upasampadā ehibhikkhūpasampadā, evaṃ porāṇā āhaṃsu vā, evaṃ pure āsiṃsu vāti evaṃ pavattaṃ vidhānaṃ ettha atthīti itihāso dī. ni. 1.256, purāṇagantho, yaṃ pubbe anaññātaṃ, taṃ idāni ñassāmi iti pavattassa indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, asuko iti āha asuko iti āha, asukasmiṃvā ganthe iti āha asukasmiṃ ganthe iti āhāti evaṃ pavattavacanaṃ itihitihaṃ, aññāsi iti byākato koṇḍañño aññāsikoṇḍañño mahāva. 8 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2816: Keci pana ‘‘sacchikaroti, manasikaroti, pākaṭīkaroti, āvīkaroti, pātukaroti, alaṅkaroti, sakkaroti, pabhavati, parābhavati’’ iccādīnampi ekatthībhāvaṃ vadanti. Tumantatvantādikāpi ettha saṅgayhanti, gantuṃ kāmetīti gantukāmo, kattukāmo, daṭṭhukāmo, gantuṃ mano etassāti gantumano, saṃvidhāya avahāro saṃvidhāvahāro, yalopo. Evaṃ upādāya uppannaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, anupādāya vimutto anupādāvimutto, paṭiccasamuppādo, āhaccabhāsito, upahaccaparinibbāyī pu. pa. 37, aveccappasādo, chakkhattuparamaṃ, sattakkhattuparamo pu. pa. 31 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2820: 414. Vidhādīsu dvissa du ka. 386; rū. 410; nī. 811.
anya-e0201n0:2822: Dve vidhā pakārā yassāti duvidho, dve paṭṭāni yassāti dupaṭṭaṃ, cīvaraṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ, jhānaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2825: Dve guṇā paṭalā yassāti diguṇā, saṅghāṭi, dve gāvo digu, dve rattiyo dirattaṃ, dvirattaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:2828: Dve vā tayo vā vārā dvattikkhattuṃ, dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā.
anya-e0201n0:2829: 417. Ā saṅkhyāyāsatādonaññatthe ka. 383; rū. 253; nī. 815; caṃ. 5.2.52; pā. 6.3.47.
anya-e0201n0:2830: Aññapadatthavajjite samāse satādito aññasmiṃ saṅkhyāpade pare dvissa ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2831: Dve ca dasa ca dvādasa, dvīhi vā adhikā dasa dvādasa, dvāvīsati, dvattiṃsa, rassattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2833: Anaññattheti kiṃ? Dve dasa yasminti dvidasa.
anya-e0201n0:2835: Anaññatthe asatādo saṅkhyāpade pare tissa e hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2836: Tayo ca dasa ca terasa, tīhi vā adhikā dasa terasa. Evaṃ tevīsati, tettiṃsa.
anya-e0201n0:2837: 419. Cattālīsādo vā ka. 404; rū. 370; caṃ. 5.2.54; pā. 6.3.49.
anya-e0201n0:2838: Cattālīsādīsu paresu tissa e hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2839: Tecattālīsaṃ, ticattālīsaṃ, tepaññāsaṃ, tipaññāsaṃ, tesaṭṭhi, tisaṭṭhi, tesattati, tisattati, teasīti, tiasīti, tenavuti, tinavuti.
anya-e0201n0:2841: Cattālīsādo dvissa e hoti vā ā ca.
anya-e0201n0:2842: Dvecattālīsaṃ, dvācattālīsaṃ, dvicattālīsaṃ, dvepaññāsaṃ, dvipaññāsaṃ, dvāsaṭṭhi, dvesaṭṭhi, dvāsattati, dvesattati, dvāsīti, dvānavuti, dvenavuti. Vāsaddena paññāsamhi āttaṃ, asītimhi ettañca natthi.
anya-e0201n0:2844: Acattālīsādo pare dvissa bā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2845: Bārasa, dvādasa, bāvīsati, dvāvīsati, bāttiṃsa, dvattiṃsa.
anya-e0201n0:2847: 422. Catussa cuco dase ka. 390; rū. 256; nī. 826.
anya-e0201n0:2848: Dase pare catussa cu, co honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2850: 423. Vīsatidasesu pañcassa paṇṇapannā ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 814.
anya-e0201n0:2851: Esu pañcassa paṇṇa, pannā honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2857: Dase pare eka, aṭṭhānaṃ ā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2859: 426. Ra saṅkhyāto vā ka. 381; rū. 254; nī. 812.
anya-e0201n0:2860: Ekādisaṅkhyamhā parassa dasassa ra hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2861: Ekārasa, ekādasa, bārasa, dvādasa, pannarasa, pañcadasa, sattarasa, sattadasa, aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa, bādese pannādese ca niccaṃ. Idha na hoti, catuddasa.
anya-e0201n0:2862: 427. Chatīhi ḷo ca ka. 379; rū. 258; nī. 809.
anya-e0201n0:2863: Cha, tīhi parassa dassa ḷo hoti ro ca.
anya-e0201n0:2866: ‘Aḍḍhuḍḍhatiyā’ti aḍḍhā+uḍḍhatiyāti chedo, aḍḍhamhā paresaṃ catuttha, tatiyānaṃ uḍḍha, tiyā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2867: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0201n0:2869: 429. Dutiyassa saha diyaḍḍhadivaḍḍhā ka. 387; rū. 411; nī. 819.
anya-e0201n0:2870: Aḍḍhamhā parassa dutiyassa saha aḍḍhena diyaḍḍha, divaḍḍhā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2872: Yathā ca eka, dvi,ti, catu, pañca, cha, satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasasaddā paccekaṃ attano atthesu nipatanti, tathā vīsati, tiṃsati, cattālīsa, paññāsa, saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti, navutisaddā paccekaṃ attano atthesu nipatanti, dasasaddassa kāriyā na honti, evaṃ satasahassasaddāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2873: Tato paraṃ pana dasa sahassāni dasasahassaṃ, idaṃ ‘nahuta’nti ca vuccati, sataṃ sahassāni satasahassaṃ, idaṃ ‘lakkha’nti ca vuccati, dasa satasahassāni dasasatasahassanti evaṃ digusamāsavasena etāni padāni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2874: Dve satāni dvisataṃ, tīṇi satāni tisataṃ, dve sahassāni dvisahassaṃ, tīṇi sahassāni tisahassaṃ iccādīni digumhi vuttāneva.
anya-e0201n0:2875: Gaṇanapathe pana ekaṭṭhānaṃ, dasaṭṭhānaṃ, sataṭṭhānaṃ, sahassaṭṭhānaṃ, dasasahassaṭṭhānaṃ, satasahassaṭṭhānaṃ, dasasatasahassaṭṭhānanti imāni satta ṭhānāni kamena dasaguṇitāni honti. Tattha ekaṭṭhānaṃ nāma ekaṃ, dve, tīṇi iccādi. Dasaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dasa, vīsaṃ, tiṃsaṃ iccādi. Sataṭṭhānaṃ nāma sataṃ, dvisataṃ, tisataṃ iccādi. Sahassaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sahassaṃ, dvisahassaṃ, tisahassaṃ iccādi. Evaṃ uparipi. Ekamekasmiñca ṭhāne nava padāni ca nava antaranavantāni ca honti. Ayaṃ mūlabhūmi nāma.
anya-e0201n0:2876: Taduttari koṭibhūmi nāma. Tatthapi ekaṭṭhānaṃ, dasaṭṭhānaṃ, sataṭṭhānaṃiccādīni satta ṭhānāni honti. Tattha mūlabhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā dasaguṇite kate koṭibhūmiyaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, idhapi satta ṭhānāni kamena dasaguṇitāniyeva, idha dasakoṭisatasahassaṃ antimaṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:2877: Taduttari pakoṭibhūmi nāma. Etthapi satta ṭhānāni honti. Tattha koṭibhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā dasaguṇite kate pakoṭibhūmiyaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, idhapi satta ṭhānāni dasaguṇitāniyeva, dasapakoṭisatasahassaṃ antimaṭṭhānaṃ, iminā nayena sabbabhūmīsu uparūpari bhūmisaṅkanti ca ṭhānabhedo ca veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2878: Ayaṃ panettha bhūmikkamo-mūlabhūmi, koṭibhūmi, pakoṭibhūmi, koṭipakoṭibhūmi, nahutabhūmi, ninnahutabhūmi, akkhobhiṇībhūmi bhinī, bhanītipi dissanti, bindubhūmi, abbudabhūmi, nirabbudabhūmi, ahahabhūmi, abababhūmi, aṭaṭabhūmi, sogandhikabhūmi, uppalabhūmi, kumudabhūmi, puṇḍarīkabhūmi, padumabhūmi, kathānabhūmi, mahākathānabhūmi, asaṅkhyeyyabhūmīti ekavīsati bhūmiyo sattacattālīsasataṃ ṭhānāni ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:2879: Nirayabhūmīnaṃ kamena pana abbudabhūmi, nirabbudabhūmi, abababhūmi, aṭaṭabhūmi, ahahabhūmi, kumudabhūmi, sogandhikabhūmi, uppalabhūmi, puṇḍarīkabhūmi, padumabhūmīti vattabbo. Ettha ca yasmā pāḷibhāsāyaṃ dasasatasahassaṃ nāma sattamaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, cha ṭhānāni eva atthi, tasmā garū aṭṭhakathāsu saṃ. ni. 1.181 āgatanayena sattamaṭṭhānaṃ ullaṅghetvā chaṭṭhaṭṭhānato upari bhūmisaṅkantiṃ kathentā sataguṇitaṃ katvā kathenti, satasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭi, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2880: Tattha satasahassānaṃ sataṃ nāma dasasatasahassānaṃ dasakameva hoti, tasmā tathā kathentāpi bhūmīnaṃ sabbaṭṭhānānañca dasaguṇasiddhimeva kathentīti veditabbaṃ. Yasmā ca gaṇanabhūmisaṅkhāto gaṇanapatho nāma nānādesavāsīnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti, tasmā dīpavaṃse akkhobhiṇī, bindu, kathāna, mahākathānāni vajjetvā pāḷinayena sattarasa bhūmiyova vuttā. Kaccāyane ka. 394, 395; rū. 416, 417 pubbe dassitā ekavīsati bhūmiyo, sakkataganthesu tato sādhikabhūmiyo, katthaci pana mahābalakkhandhapariyantā saṭṭhi bhūmiyoti āgatā.
anya-e0201n0:2881: Tattha sakasakabhūmito atirekavatthūni gaṇanapathavītivattāni nāma honti, yesaṃ pana mūlabhūmimattaṃ atthi, tesaṃ koṭimattānipi vatthūni gaṇanapathātikkantāni eva.
anya-e0201n0:2882: Api ca ‘gaṇanapathavītivatta’nti ca ‘gaṇanapathātikkanta’nti ca ‘asaṅkhyeyya’nti ca atthato ekaṃ. Tasmā idhapi vīsati bhūmiyo eva anukkamena dasaguṇitā gaṇanapathā nāma honti. Asaṅkhyeyyanti pana dasaguṇavinimuttā gaṇanapathātikkantabhūmi eva vuccati. Mahākathānabhūmātikkantato paṭṭhāya hi anantamahāpathaviyā sabbapaṃsucuṇṇānipi idha asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyaṃ saṅgayhanti. Itarathā asaṅkhyeyyanti ca gaṇanapathabhūmīti ca viruddhametanti.
anya-e0201n0:2883: Dīpavaṃse ca ‘‘tato upari abhūmi, asaṅkhyeyyanti vuccatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘abhūmī’ti vacanena gaṇanapathabhūmi eva paṭisiddhā, na tu gaṇanapathātikkantā visuṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhūmi nāma. Cariyāpiṭakasaṃvaṇṇanāyampi cariyā. aṭṭha. nidānakathā ayamattho vutto. Asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyampi asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ cūḷa, mahādivasena anekappabhedo dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttena ma. ni. 3.370 dīpetabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2884: Saddanītiyaṃ nī. 833 pana pāḷinayaṃ gahetvā ‘‘vīsati abbudāni ekaṃ nirabbudaṃ nāma. Vīsati nirabbudāni ekaṃ ababaṃ nāma’’ iccādinā nirabbudādīnaṃ saṅkhyānampi vīsatimattaguṇaṃ nāma vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati. Nirayesu hi vīsatimattaguṇena abbuda, nirabbudādīnaṃ dasannaṃ nirayānaṃ tāni nāmāni siddhāni bhavanti. Garū pana tāni nāmāni gahetvā dasaguṇasiddhesu gaṇanapathesu pakkhipiṃsu, tasmā nāmamattena sadisāni bhavanti, guṇavidhi pana visadisoeva.
anya-e0201n0:2885: Evañcakatvā pāḷiyampi bakabrahmāsutte saṃ. ni. 1.175 ‘‘sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānaṃ, āyuṃ pajānāmi tavāhaṃ brahme’’ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yadi gaṇanabhūmipathepi nirabbudānaṃ vīsatimattena abababhūmi bhaveyya, evaṃ sati nirabbudānaṃ satasahassaṃ nāma na vucceyya. Jātakaṭṭhakathāyañca jā. aṭṭha. 3.7.69 ‘‘nirabbudasatasahassānaṃ ekaṃ ahahaṃ nāma, ettakaṃ bakassa brahmuno tasmiṃbhave avasiṭṭhaṃ āyū’’ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā imaṃ gaṇanabhūmipathaṃ patvā vīsatiguṇaṃ nāma natthīti siddhaṃ hoti. Akkhobhiṇī, bindu, kathāna, mahākathānānipi aññato gahetvā pakkhittāni siyuṃ. Evaṃ pakkhittānañca cuddasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ kaccāyane kamokkamatā pana pacchājātā siyāti.
anya-e0201n0:2890: Taddhitavutti nāma vicitrā hoti, sātisayena vicitrañāṇahitaṃ vahati, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ hitanti taddhitaṃ, imasmiṃ kaṇḍe sabbavidhānassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ pana aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti apaccaṃ, anekatthaṃ, assatthi, bhāvakammaṃ, parimāṇaṃ, saṅkhyā, khuddakaṃ, nānāttanti.
anya-e0201n0:2892: 430. Ṇo vāpacce ka. 344; rū. 361; nī. 752; caṃ. 2.4.16; pā. 4.1.92; ‘sarānamādissā…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2893: Chaṭṭhyantā nāmamhā tassa apaccanti atthe vikappena ṇapaccayo hoti. Vāsaddo vākya, samāsānaṃ vikappanattho, ito paraṃ anuvattate, tena sabbattha vikappavidhi sijjhati. Ṇānubandho vuddhyattho, so payogaappayogī. Vasiṭṭhassa apaccanti atthe iminā suttena vasiṭṭhamhā ṇapaccayo, so sāmyatthañca apaccatthañca ubhayaṃ vadati, chaṭṭhī ca apaccapadañca tena vuttatthā nāma honti, vasiṭṭhapadaṃ paccayena saha ekatthaṃ hoti, ubhayaṃ ekato hutvā puttassa nāmaṃ hotīti attho. Tato ‘ekatthatāya’nti chaṭṭhiyā lopo, apaccapadaṃ pana vuttatthamattena luppati. Tañhi sutte padhānabhāvena niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti, na chaṭṭhīti, mahāvuttinā vā padānaṃ lopo. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0201n0:2895: Padānaṃ ādibhūtassa akārassa ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇassa ca ā, e, o vuddhiyo honti ṇānubandhe paccaye pareti padādia-kārassa āvuddhi, syādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n0:2896: Vāsiṭṭho, puriso, vāsiṭṭhī, itthī, vāsiṭṭhaṃ, kulaṃ, vasiṭṭhassa putto vāsiṭṭho, vasiṭṭhassa dhītā vāsiṭṭhī, vasiṭṭhassa kulaṃ vāsiṭṭhanti evampi yojetuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2897: Tattha ‘vasiṭṭhassā’ti etena gottasseva pitubhūtaṃ ādipurisaṃ vadati. Kasmā? Gottasaddattā. Evañhi sati tasmiṃ gotte paccājātā sabbepi janā tassa apaccā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:2899: Majjhe pavattānaṃ a, yuvaṇṇānaṃ ā, e, ovuddhiyo honti vā kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:2900: Vāseṭṭho, vāseṭṭhī, vāseṭṭhaṃ. Vāsaddena ‘‘vasiṭṭhassa putto dhītā kula’’nti vākyaṃ vā ‘‘vasiṭṭhaputto vasiṭṭhadhītā vasiṭṭhakula’’nti samāsaṃ vā vikappeti. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0201n0:2901: Bharadvājassa apaccaṃ bhāradvājo, visāmittassa bhāradvājassa… vesāmittassa… (rū.) apaccaṃ vesāmitto, gotamassa apaccaṃ gotamo, kassapassa apaccaṃ kassapo, vasudevassa apaccaṃ vāsudevo. Evaṃ bāladevo.
anya-e0201n0:2902: Upagussa apaccanti ettha ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ti ṇānubandhe paccaye pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hoti. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ, manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, bhagguno apaccaṃ bhaggavo, paṇḍuno apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, upavindussa apaccaṃ opavindavo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2903: 433. Vacchādito ṇānaṇāyanā ka. 345; rū. 366; nī. 754; pā. 4.1.93, 94, 162, 163.
anya-e0201n0:2904: Chaṭṭhuntehi vacchādīhi gottasaddagaṇehi tassa apaccanti atthe ṇānubandhā āna, āyanapaccayā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2905: Vacchassa apaccaṃ vacchāno, vacchāyano, vacchānī, vacchāyanī, vacchānaṃ, vacchāyanaṃ. Evaṃ kaccāno, kaccāyano, kātiyāno, kātiyāyano, sākaṭāno, sākaṭāyano, kaṇhāno, kaṇhāyano, moggallāno, moggallāyano, aggivessāno aggivessanotipi dissati dī. ni. 1.176; ma. ni. 1.353 ādayo, aggivessāyano, muñcāno, muñcāyano, kuñcāno, kuñcāyano iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2906: 434. Kattikāvidhavādīhi ṇeyyaṇerā ka. 346; rū. 367; nī. 755; pā. 4.1.120, 123, 126, 127, 128, 129, 131.
anya-e0201n0:2907: Chaṭṭhyantehi kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca tassa apaccanti atthe kamena ṇānubandhā eyya, erapaccayā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2908: Ṇeyye – kattikāya nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ kattikeyyo, vinatāya nāma deviyā apaccaṃ venateyyo, rohiṇiyā nāma deviyā apaccaṃ rohiṇeyyo, bhaginiyā apaccaṃ bhāgineyyo, nadiyā nāma itthiyā apaccaṃ nādeyyo. Evaṃ anteyyo, āheyyo, kāmeyyo, suciyā apaccaṃ soceyyo, bālāya apaccaṃ bāleyyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2909: Ṇere – vidhavāya apaccaṃ vedhavero, vidhavā nāma matapatikā itthī. Bandhukiyā apaccaṃ bandhukero, nāḷikiyā nāma itthiyā putto nāḷikero, samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto sāmaṇero, samaṇiyā pavattiniyā dhītā sāmaṇerī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2910: 435. Ṇya diccādīhi ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 2.4.2; pā. 4.1.85.
anya-e0201n0:2911: Chaṭṭhuntehi ditiiccādīhi tassa apaccanti atthe ṇānubandho yapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2913: Ye pare avaṇṇassa ivaṇṇassa ca lopo hotīti ṇyamhi pare avaṇṇi’vaṇṇānaṃ lopo.
anya-e0201n0:2914: Ditiyā nāma devadhītāya apaccaṃ decco, aditiyā apaccaṃ ādicco.
anya-e0201n0:2915: Tattha ivaṇṇalope ‘tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi pare tavaggassa cavaggattaṃ, puna ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, kuṇḍaniyā apaccaṃ koṇḍañño.
anya-e0201n0:2917: Sare pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hotīti uvaṇṇassa avattaṃ. ‘Tavaggavaraṇāna…’nti suttena vassa battaṃ, puna ‘vaggalasehi te’ti suttena yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo.
anya-e0201n0:2919: Rassā’kārantato apaccatthe ṇānubandho rassi’paccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2920: Dakkhassa apaccaṃ dakkhi. Evaṃ doṇi, vāsavi, sakyaputti, nāṭaputti, dāsaputti, dāruno apaccaṃ dāravi vicāretabbamidaṃ, varuṇassa apaccaṃ vāruṇi. Evaṃ kaṇḍi, bāladevi, pāvaki, jinadattassa apaccaṃ jenadatti, suddhodani, anuruddhi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2921: 439. Rājato ño jātiyaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 2.4.70; pā. 4.1.137.
anya-e0201n0:2922: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ rājasaddamhā apaccatthe ñapaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:2923: Rañño apaccaṃ rājañño, rājakulassa puttoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:2926: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ khattasaddamhā apaccatthe ya, iyapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2930: Jātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ manusaddamhā apaccatthe ssa, saṇapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2931: Manuno apaccaṃ manusso, mānuso, manu nāma kappe ādikhattiyo mahāsammatarājā, itthiyaṃ manussī, mānusī,
anya-e0201n0:2933: 442. Janapadanāmasmā janakhattiyā raññe ca ṇo ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 2.4.96; pā. 4.1.168; ‘‘janapadanāmasmā khattiyā…’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2934: Janavācinā ca khattiyavācinā ca janapadanāmamhā raññe ca apacce ca ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2935: Pañcālānaṃ janānaṃ rājā pañcālo, pañcālassa khattiyassa apaccaṃ pañcālo. Evaṃ kosalo, māgadho, okkāko dī. ni. 1.267.
anya-e0201n0:2936: Janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ? Dasaratharañño putto dāsarathi dāsaraṭṭhi.
anya-e0201n0:2937: Janakhattiyāti kiṃ? Pañcālassa brāhmaṇassa apaccaṃ pañcāli.
anya-e0201n0:2939: Kuru, sivisaddehi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2940: Kururañño apaccaṃ korabyo jā. 1.14.228, 232, 236, kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ rājā korabyo, korabbo, pubbarūpattaṃ, sivirañño apaccaṃ sebyo, siviraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ rājā sebyo.
anya-e0201n0:2943: 444. Ṇa rāgā tena rattaṃ ka. 347; rū. 368; nī. 756; caṃ. 3.1.1 …pe… 4.2.1.
anya-e0201n0:2944: Rajjanti vatthaṃ etenāti rāgo, rajanavatthu, rāgavācimhā tena rattanti atthe ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2945: Kasāvena rattaṃ vatthaṃ kāsāvaṃ dha. pa. 9, kāsāyaṃ vā. Evaṃ kosumbhaṃ, haliddiyā rattaṃ hāliddaṃ, pāṭaṅgena rattaṃ pāṭaṅgaṃ, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2946: ‘‘Nīlaṃ vatthaṃ, pītaṃ vattha’’ntiādīsu pana nīla, pītādisaddā guṇasaddattā paccayena vinā guṇanissayaṃ dabbaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ sabbesu guṇasadda, jātisadda, nāmasaddesu.
anya-e0201n0:2947: 445. Nakkhatteninduyuttena kāle ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.5; pā. 4.2.3.
anya-e0201n0:2948: Induyuttena nakkhattena lakkhite kāle tannakkhattavācīhi ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2949: Puṇṇacandayuttena phussanakkhattena lakkhitā phussā, ratti, phusso, aho. Evaṃ māgho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:2953: 446. Sāssa devatā puṇṇamāsī ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.18, 19 …pe… 4.2.21-24.
anya-e0201n0:2954: Sā assa devatā, sā assa puṇṇamāsīti atthe paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2955: Buddho assa devatāti buddho, yo buddhaṃ attano ārakkhadevataṃ viya garuṃ katvā vicarati, nirantaraṃ vā ‘‘buddho buddho’’ti vācaṃ nicchāreti, tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sugato assa devatāti sogato, mahindadevo assa devatāti māhindo. Evaṃ yāmo, somo, vāruṇo.
anya-e0201n0:2956: Phussī assa puṇṇamāsīti phusso, māso. Evaṃ māgho, phagguno, citto, vesākho, jeṭṭhamūlo, āsaḷho, sāvaṇo, poṭṭhapādo, assayujo, kattiko, māgasiro.
anya-e0201n0:2957: Puṇṇamāsīti kiṃ? Phussī assa pañcamī tithī.
anya-e0201n0:2958: 447. Tamadhīte taṃ jānāti kaṇikā ca ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.1.37 …pe… 4.2.59.
anya-e0201n0:2959: Etesu atthesu dutiyantā ṇo ca ko ca ṇiko cāti ete paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2960: Ṇamhi – byākaraṇaṃ adhīte jānāti vā veyyākaraṇo dī. ni. 1.256. Pakkhe ‘‘veyyākaraṇiko, byañjanaṃ adhīte jānāti vā veyyañjaniko’’ti imāni ṇikena sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:2961: Kamhi-chandaṃ adhīte jānāti vā chando. Evaṃ padako dī. ni. 1.256, nāmako.
anya-e0201n0:2962: Ṇikamhi-vinayaṃ adhīte jānāti vā venayiko, suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.
anya-e0201n0:2963: Ettha ca ‘veyyākaraṇo’ti pade viyyākaraṇaṃ adhīteti vākyaṃ, ‘veyañjaniko’ti pade viyañjanaṃ adhīteti. Upari ‘dovāriko, sovaggika’nti padesupi ‘duvāre niyutto, suvaggāya saṃvattatī’ti vākyaṃ, atthaṃ kathentena pana duvāra, suvaggasaddānaṃ taddhitabhāve eva siddhattā dvāreti ca saggāyāti ca kathetabbo.
anya-e0201n0:2964: 448. Tassa visaye dese ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 365; caṃ. 3.1.61; pā. 4.2.52, 53.
anya-e0201n0:2965: Tassa desarūpe visaye chaṭṭhuntā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2966: Thūyamigā vasātino nāma, vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto. Idha adesarūpattā ṇo na hoti, cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2967: 449. Nivāse tannāme ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 365; caṃ. 3.1.64; pā. 4.2.69.
anya-e0201n0:2969: Sivīnaṃ nivāso deso sebyo. Vasaṃ adenti bhakkhantīti vasādā, byagghā sīhā vā, vasādānaṃ nivāso deso vāsādo.
anya-e0201n0:2971: Samīpe bhavaṃ anubhavaṃ, ‘‘adūrabhave’’tipi pāṭho, tannāme anubhave dese chaṭṭhyantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2972: Vidisāya anubhavaṃ vedisaṃ, nagaraṃ, udumbarassa anubhavaṃ odumbaraṃ, vimānaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:2974: Tannāme tena nibbatte dese tatiyantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2975: Kusambena nāma isinā nibbattā kosambī, itthiyaṃ ī, nagarī. Evaṃ kākandī, mākandī, sahassena dhanena nibbattā sāhassī, parikhā, ayañca tatiyā hetumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2977: Taṃ idha atthīti atthe tannāme dese paṭhamantā ṇo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2978: Udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, badarā asmiṃ dese santīti bādaro. Evaṃ pabbajo.
anya-e0201n0:2981: Udake bhavo odako, maccho, urasi bhavo oraso, putto, sāgamo. Nagare bhavo nāgaro. Evaṃ jānapado, māgadho, kapilavatthumhi bhavo kāpilavatthavo, ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ti ussa avattaṃ. Kosambiyaṃ bhavo kosambo, mitte bhavā mettā, pure bhavā porī dī. ni. 1.9, vācā, manasmiṃ bhavo mānaso. Ettha pana –
anya-e0201n0:2983: Ṇānubandhe paccaye pare manādīnaṃ ante sāgamo hotīti sabbattha manogaṇādīnaṃ ante sāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:2984: Mānaso, rāgo, mānasā, taṇhā, mānasaṃ, sukhaṃ. Evaṃ cetaso, cetasā, cetasaṃ. Kvaci mano eva mānasaṃ, ceto eva cetasotipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:2985: 455. Ajjādīhi tano ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.15; pā. 4.2.105.
anya-e0201n0:2986: Tatra bhavoti atthe ajjādīhi tano hoti.
anya-e0201n0:2987: Ajja bhavo ajjatano, attho, ajjattanī, vibhatti, dvittaṃ, ajjatanaṃ, hitaṃ, sve bhavo svātano, mahāvuttinā essa āttaṃ. Hiyyo bhavo hiyyattano, hiyyattano, hiyyattanaṃ, ossa attaṃ dvittañca.
anya-e0201n0:2988: 456. Purāto ṇo ca ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n0:2989: Tatra bhavoti atthe purāsaddamhā ṇo ca tano ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:2990: Pure bhavo purāṇo, idha ṇo anubandho na hoti, porāṇo vā, purātano.
anya-e0201n0:2993: Rājakiccesu raññā saha bhavatīti amacco dī. ni. ṭī. 1.339.
anya-e0201n0:2994: 458. Majjhādīhimo ka. 353; rū. 378; nī. 767; caṃ. 3.2.82; pā. 4.3.8, 22; ‘majjhāditvimo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:2996: Majjhe bhavo majjhimo. Evaṃ antimo, heṭṭhimo, uparimo, orimo, pacchimo, abbhantarimo, paccantimo, puratthimo.
anya-e0201n0:2998: Bhavatthe sattamyantā ete pañca paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:2999: Kaṇa-kusinārāyaṃ bhavo kosinārako, magadhesu bhavo māgadhako, āraññako, vihāro.
anya-e0201n0:3000: Ṇeyya-gaṅgāyaṃ bhavo gaṅgeyyo, pabbateyyo, vane bhavo vāneyyo.
anya-e0201n0:3001: Ṇeyyaka-kosaleyyako, bārāṇaseyyako, campeyyako, mithileyyako, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3002: Ya-gāme bhavo gammo, dive bhavo dibbo,
anya-e0201n0:3003: Iya-gāmiyo, gāmiko, yassa kattaṃ, udare bhavo odariyo, odariko, dive bhavo diviyo, pañcāliyo, bodhipakkhiyo, lokiyo.
anya-e0201n0:3006: Sāradiko, divaso, sāradikā, ratti, sāradikaṃ, pupphaṃ. Bhavasaddena cettha aññepi atthe upalakkheti, pabbatato pakkhandā nadī pabbateyyā, kimīnaṃ kose jātaṃ koseyyaṃ, vatthaṃ. Evaṃ siveyyaṃ, bārāṇaseyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3007: 461. Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.4.49-66 …pe… 4.4.47-65.
anya-e0201n0:3008: Tamassa sippaṃ, tamassa sīlaṃ, tamassa paṇyaṃ, tamassa paharaṇaṃ, tamassa payojananti atthesu paṭhamantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3009: Sippe – vīṇāvādanamassa sippaṃ veṇiko. Ettha ca vīṇāsaddena vīṇāvādanaṃ vuccati. Ekatthībhāvasāmatthiyañhetaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha. Evaṃ modiṅgiko, pāṇaviko, vaṃsiko.
anya-e0201n0:3010: Sīle-paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ assa sīlaṃ paṃsukūliko, paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ sīlamassāti vā paṃsukūliko. Sīlasaddena cettha vata, dhamma, sādhukārāpi gayhanti, paṃsukūlaṃ dhāreti sīlenāti paṃsukūlikotipi yujjati. Evaṃ tecīvariko, piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ patatīti piṇḍapāto, piṇḍācārena laddhabhojanaṃ, piṇḍapātayāpanaṃ assa sīlanti piṇḍapātiko, piṇḍapātena yāpetuṃ sīlañca vatañca dhammo ca garukāro ca assāti piṇḍapātiko.
anya-e0201n0:3011: ‘Paṇya’nti vikkeyyavatthu vuccati, gandho paṇyaṃ assāti gandhiko. Evaṃ teliko, goḷiko.
anya-e0201n0:3012: Paharanti etenāti paharaṇaṃ, āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ, cāpo paharaṇamassāti cāpiko. Evaṃ tomariko, muggariko.
anya-e0201n0:3013: Payojanaṃ vuccati phalaṃ, upadhi payojanamassāti opadhikaṃ a. ni. 8.59, puññaṃ, sataṃ payojanamassāti sātikaṃ. Evaṃ sāhassikaṃ jā. 2.21.415.
anya-e0201n0:3014: 462. Taṃ hantārahati gacchatuñchati carati ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 3.4.27-43; pā. 4.4.28-46.
anya-e0201n0:3015: Taṃ hanti, taṃ arahati, taṃ gacchati, taṃ uñchati, taṃ caratīti atthesu dutiyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3016: Pakkhīhi pakkhino hantīti pakkhiko. Evaṃ sākuṇiko a. ni. 2.263 (sākunikotipi dissati), māyūriko, macchehi macche hanatīti macchiko. Evaṃ dhenuko, magehi mage hanatīti māgaviko, majjhe vāgamo. Evaṃ hāriṇiko, ‘hariṇo’ti mago eva. Sūkariko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3018: Paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, paradāriko vā. Evaṃ pathiko, maggiko.
anya-e0201n0:3019: Badare uñchati gavesatīti bādariko. Evaṃ āmalakiko.
anya-e0201n0:3021: 463. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ bandhaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati ka. 350; rū. 373; nī. 364; caṃ. 3.4.1-26; pā. 4.4.1-27.
anya-e0201n0:3022: Tena kataṃ, tena kītaṃ…pe… tena jīvati iccatthesu tatiyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3023: Kāyena kataṃ kāyikaṃ. Evaṃ vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ, vātena kato vātiko, ābādho.
anya-e0201n0:3024: Satena mūlena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sātikaṃ. Evaṃ sāhassikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3025: Varattāya yottāya bandhito vārattiko, ayasā bandhito āyasiko, sāgamo. Evaṃ pāsiko.
anya-e0201n0:3026: Ghatena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ. Evaṃ goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3028: Jālena hantīti jāliko, jālakevaṭṭo. Evaṃ bāḷisiko saṃ. ni. 2.158.
anya-e0201n0:3029: Akkhehi jitaṃ dhanaṃ akkhikaṃ. Evaṃ sālākikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3031: Khaṇittiyā khaṇatīti khāṇittiko. Evaṃ kuddāliko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3032: Uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, uḷumpiko vā. Evaṃ nāviko jā. 2.20.149, gopucchiko.
anya-e0201n0:3033: Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Evaṃ rathiko, yāniko, daṇḍiko,
anya-e0201n0:3034: Khandhena vahatīti khandhiko. Evaṃ aṃsiko, sīsiko, idha na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3035: Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko. Evaṃ bhatiko, kasiko, kayiko, vikkayiko, bhatikādīsu na vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3037: Tassa saṃvattatīti atthe catutthyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3038: Puna bhavāya saṃvattatīti ponobbhaviko, punassa ottaṃ, bhassa dvittaṃ, ponobbhavikā mahāva. 14, taṇhā, lokāya saṃvattatīti lokiko, suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, saggāya saṃvattatīti sovaggikaṃ dī. ni. 1.163, puññaṃ. Evaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, samparāyikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3039: 465. Tato sambhūtamāgataṃ ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.3.49-51; …pe… 4.3.77-79.
anya-e0201n0:3040: Tato sambhūtaṃ, tato āgataṃ iccatthesu pañcamyantā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3041: Mātito sambhūtaṃ āgataṃ vā mattikaṃ pārā. 34, dvittaṃ rasso ca. Evaṃ pettikaṃ. Ṇya, ṇiyāpi dissanti, surabhito sambhūtaṃ sorabhyaṃ, thanato sambhūtaṃ thaññaṃ, pitito sambhūto pettiyo. Evaṃ mattiyo. Ṇyamhi-macco.
anya-e0201n0:3042: 466. Tattha vasati vidito bhatto niyutto ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.4.70-75 …pe… 4.4.69-74.
anya-e0201n0:3044: Rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko. Evaṃ āraññiko, sosāniko.
anya-e0201n0:3045: Ettha ca vasatīti sāmaññavacanepi tassīla, tabbata, taddhamma, tassādhukāritānaṃ vasena attho veditabbo taddhitapaccayānaṃ pasiddhatthadīpakattā. Na hi rukkhamūle muhuttamattaṃ vasanto rukkhamūlikoti voharīyati.
anya-e0201n0:3048: Dvāre niyutto dovāriko. Evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, navakammiko, idha na vuddhi. ‘‘Jātikiyo, andhakiyo’’ iccādīsu mahāvuttinā kiyo.
anya-e0201n0:3050: Tassa idanti atthe chaṭṭhuntā ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3051: Saṅghassa ayaṃ saṅghiko, vihāro, saṅghikā, bhūmi, saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, bhaṇḍaṃ. Evaṃ puggalikaṃ, gaṇikaṃ, mahājanikaṃ, sakyaputtassa esoti sakyaputtiko. Evaṃ nāṭaputtiko, dāsaputtiko.
anya-e0201n0:3057: Kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ, byākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sogataṃ, sāsanaṃ, māhiṃsaṃ, maṃsādi.
anya-e0201n0:3060: 471. Yamhi gossa ca ka. 78; rū. 31; nī. 229.
anya-e0201n0:3061: Yavante paccaye pare gossa ca uvaṇṇānañca avaṅa hotīti avādeso. ‘Tavaggavaraṇāna…’nti suttena vassa battaṃ, gunnaṃ idaṃ gabyaṃ, maṃsādi, du vuccati rukkho, tassa idaṃ dabyaṃ, dabbaṃ, mūlādi.
anya-e0201n0:3064: 472. Tametthassatthīti mantu ka. 369; rū. 403; nī. 793; caṃ. 4.2.98; pā. 5.2.94.
anya-e0201n0:3065: Taṃ ettha atthi, taṃ assa atthīti atthesu paṭhamantā mantupaccayo hoti, ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇo’kārehi mantu. Tattha ivaṇṇantehi niccaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati etasmiṃ atthi, etassa vā atthīti satimā. Evaṃ gatimā, matimā, dhitimā saṃ. ni. 1.1952; jā. 2.22.1451, atthadassimā jā. 2.22.1451, sirīmā jā. aṭṭha. 1.avidūrenidānakathā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3069: Dīghaṃ āyu asmiṃ atthi, assa vā atthīti āyasmā mahāni. 49. Evaṃ cakkhumā, bandhumā, bhāṇumā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3070: Bahū gāvo asmiṃ santi, assa vā santīti gomā. Candimā, pāpimāpadesu ca mahāvuttinā imantupaccayaṃ icchanti. Tattha candasaṅkhātaṃ vimānaṃ assa atthīti candimā dha. pa. 387, devaputto, upacārena pana vimānampi candimāti vuccati, devaputtopi candoti vuccati. Ati viya pāpo ajjhāsayo assa atthīti pāpimā saṃ. ni. 1.137, māro. Na hi appakena pāpena pāpimāti vuccati pahūtādivasena pasiddhe eva mantādīnaṃ pavattanato. Vuttañhi vuttiyaṃ –
anya-e0201n0:3072: Niccayoge ca saṃsagge, hontime mantuādayo’’ti moga. 78.
anya-e0201n0:3079: Tathā vijjamānehi eva satiādīhi satimā iccādayo vuccanti, na atītehi anāgatehi ca avijjamānehi, kasmā? Atthisaddena paccuppannena niddiṭṭhattā. Evaṃ pana sati kathaṃ pubbepi tvaṃ satimā āsi, anāgatepi satimā bhavissasīti idaṃ siddhanti? Tadapi tadā vijjamānāya eva satiyā siddhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3080: Go, asso, manusso iccādīsu jātisaddesu tesaṃ dabbābhidhānasamatthattā mantādayo na honti, tathā nīlo paṭo, sukko paṭoiccādīsu guṇasaddesu tisso, phussoiccādīsu nāmasaddesu ca. Yesaṃ pana dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ natthi, tesveva honti, buddhimā, paññavā, rūpavā, vaṇṇavā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3083: Bahavo puttā assa asmiṃ vā santīti puttimo, patthaṭā kitti assa asmiṃ vā atthīti kittimo. Evaṃ phalimo, khandhimo, rukkho, puttiyo, kappimo, kappiyo, jaṭimo, jaṭiyo, thiraṃ guṇajātaṃ assa asmiṃ vā atthīti theriyo, hānabhāgo assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti hānabhāgiyo. Evaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyo, visesabhāgiyo, nibbedhabhāgiyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3084: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ candimā, puttimāsaddānaṃ simhi rājādigaṇarūpaṃ dissati, rattimābhāti candimā dha. pa. 387, puttehi nandati puttimāti saṃ. ni. 1.12. Kittimāsaddassa pana kittimassa kittimatoti rūpanti.
anya-e0201n0:3087: Niccasīlavasena visuddhaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti sīlavā, pasattho guṇo assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti guṇavā.
anya-e0201n0:3088: Evaṃ sabbattha padatthānurūpaṃ mantvatthaviseso vattabbo, paṭisandhisahagatā paññā assa atthīti paññavā, paccaye pare dīghānaṃ kvaci rassattaṃ. Vidati etenāti vido, ñāṇaṃ, vido etassa atthi, etasmiṃ vā vijjatīti vidvā, byañjane pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0201n0:3090: Bahulādhikārā rasmivā, lakkhivā, yasassivā, bhayadassivā, massuvā, gāṇḍīvadhanvātipi sijjhanti. Tattha gāṇḍīvadhanu assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti gāṇḍīvadhanvā, byañjane pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0201n0:3092: Tehi mantvatthe ika, ī honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3093: Niccaṃ gahito daṇḍo assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍavā. Evaṃ gandhiko, gandhī, gandhavā, rūpiko, rūpī, rūpavā. Iṇasāmike vattabbe dhanā iko, dhaniko, aññatra dhanī, dhanavā, atthiko, atthī, atthavā.
anya-e0201n0:3094: Ettha ca asannihitena atthena attho assa atthīti atthiko, mahagghena atthiko mahagghatthiko. Evaṃ dhanatthiko, puññatthiko, seyyatthiko, ayaṃ attho etassāti idamatthī, pāṭavena attho assāti pāṭavatthī. Evaṃ chekatthī, kusalatthīiccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3095: Vaṇṇasaddantā pana īyeva hoti, brahmuno vaṇṇo saṇṭhānaṃ assa atthīti brahmavaṇṇī. Atha vā brahmuno vaṇṇo brahmavaṇṇo, brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa so brahmavaṇṇī. Evaṃ brahmavacchasī, ‘vacchasa’nti sīsaṃ, taddhitantasamāsapadaṃ nāmetaṃ. Evaṃ devavaṇṇī.
anya-e0201n0:3096: Hattha, dantādīhi jātiyaṃ ī, hatthī, dantī, gajo, dāṭhī, kesarī, sīho, aññatra hatthavā, dantavā. Brahmacārimhi vattabbe vaṇṇato īyeva, vaṇṇī, aññatra vaṇṇavā. Pokkharādīhi dese īyeva, pokkharaṃ vuccati kamalaṃ, pokkharaṇī, puna itthiyaṃ nī, pubbaī-kārassa attaṃ, uppalinī, kumudinī, bhisinī, muḷālinī, sālukinī, padumaṃ ettha dese atthīti padumī, tato itthiyaṃ nī, paduminī, pubbaī-kārassa rassattaṃ, sabbaṃ kamalākarassa vā kamalagacchassa vā nāmaṃ, aññatra pokkharavā hatthī, idha soṇḍā pokkharaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3097: Sikhī, sikhāvā, mālī, mālāvā, sīlī, sīlavā, balī, balavā. Samāsantepi ī, niddāsīlī, sabhāsīlī, bāhubalī, ūrubalī. Sukha, dukkhehi īyeva, sukhī, dukkhī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3098: 477. Tapādīhi sī ka. 365; rū. 399; nī. 789; caṃ. 4.2.106; pā. 5.2.102; ‘… ssī’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3100: Tapo assa asmiṃ vā vijjatīti tapassī, dvittaṃ. Evaṃ yasassī, tejassī, mano assa atthīti manassī.
anya-e0201n0:3104: Tapo assa atthīti tāpaso, itthiyaṃ tāpasī.
anya-e0201n0:3107: Asaṃyataṃ mukhaṃ assa atthīti mukharo, susi assa atthīti susiro, rukkho, ūso khāro yasmiṃ atthīti ūsaro, khārabhūmippadeso, madhu raso assa atthīti madhuro, guḷo, nagā ettha santīti nagaro, bahupabbatappadeso, ‘‘nagara’’ntipi pāṭho, kuñjo vuccati hanu, kuñjaro, hatthī, uṇṇatā dantā assa santīti danturo, hatthīyeva, mahāvuttinā assa uttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3110: Tundi vuccati vuddhā nābhi, tundibho, valiyo etasmiṃ atthīti valibho.
anya-e0201n0:3112: 481. Saddhāditva ka. 370; rū. 405; nī. 795; caṃ. 4.2.105; pā. 5.2.101 (saddādivha?).
anya-e0201n0:3114: Saddhā assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti saddho. Evaṃ pañño, sato.
anya-e0201n0:3116: 482. Ālvābhijjhādīhi ka. 359; rū. 384; nī. 779; caṃ. 4.2.157; pā. 3.2.158.
anya-e0201n0:3118: Abhijjhā adhikā assa atthīti abhijjhālu, sītaladukkhaṃ adhikaṃ assa atthīti sītālu, dhajā bahulā asmiṃ rathe santīti dhajālu, dayā bahulā assāti dayālu, purisacittaṃ bahulaṃ assāti purisālu, purisalolā itthī.
anya-e0201n0:3122: Picchaṃ tūlaṃ assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti picchilo, picchavā, tūlarukkho, picchilā sippali sippalī, sīmbalī, semmalītipi dissati, phenilo pheṇilotipi dissati, phenavā, addāriṭṭhako, jaṭilo, jaṭāvā, tāpaso, tuṇḍilo, tuṇḍavā, adhikā vācā assa atthīti vācālo, mahāvuttinā ilopo.
anya-e0201n0:3125: Niccarakkhitasīlaṃ assa atthi, asmiṃ vā vijjatīti sīlavo, puriso, sīlavā, itthī, kesā atidīghā asmiṃ santīti kesavo, kesavā, aparimāṇā aṇṇā udakā asmiṃ santīti aṇṇavo, mahantaṃ balaṃ assa atthīti balavo, balavā, balavaṃ. Gāṇḍī vuccati sandhi, bahavo gāṇḍī asmiṃ atthīti gāṇḍīvaṃ, dhanu gaṇḍassa gaṇḍamigasiṅgassa ayaṃ gāṇḍī, so assa atthīti gāṇḍīti gāṇḍīvo. (pañcakāṭīkā). gāṇḍīmeṇḍasiṅgamassa atthīti gāṇḍīvaṃ, dhanu. (payogasiddhi). gāṇḍī ganthi, so atthi assa asmiṃ vā gāṇḍīvo ajjunadhanu, (mugdhabodhaṭīkā), bahukā rājī assa atthīti rājīvaṃ, paṅkajaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3129: 486. Issare āmyuvāmī ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; caṃ. 4.2.143; pā. 5.2.126; ‘‘sissare…’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3131: Issariyaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṃ assa atthīti sāmī, suvāmī su. ni. 671, itthiyaṃ sāminī, suvāminī, bindulopo, kāgame sāmiko.
anya-e0201n0:3132: 487. Lakkhyā ṇo a ca ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; pā. 5.2.100.
anya-e0201n0:3133: Lakkhīmhā mantvatthe ṇo hoti, īkārassa attañca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3135: 488. Aṅgā no kalyāṇe ka. 364; rū. 398; nī. 787; pā. 5.2.100.
anya-e0201n0:3136: Kalyāṇe vattabbe aṅgamhā mantvatthe no hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3137: Kalyāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etissā itthiyā atthīti aṅganā.
anya-e0201n0:3140: Bahūni lomāni assa santīti lomaso. Ettha ‘so’ti suttavibhāgena ‘‘sumedhaso, bhūrimedhaso’’ iccādīnipi sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3143: 490. Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyyaṇiya ṇa iyā ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780; caṃ. 4.1.136-153; pā. 5.1.119-136.
anya-e0201n0:3144: Tassa bhāvo, tassa kammanti atthe chaṭṭhuntā ete aṭṭha paccayā bahulaṃ bhavanti.
anya-e0201n0:3145: Tattha bhavanti buddhi, saddā etasmāti bhāvo, saddānaṃ attano atthesu ādimhi uppattikāraṇaṃ, cirakālaṃ pavattikāraṇañca. Tattha ādimhi pavattikāraṇaṃ byappattinimittaṃ nāma. Cirakālaṃ pavattikāraṇaṃ pavattinimittaṃ nāma. Tadubhayampi jāti, dabba, guṇa, kriyā, nāmavasena pañcavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3146: Tattha ‘‘gossa bhāvo gotta’’nti ettha gojāti bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3147: ‘‘Daṇḍino bhāvo daṇḍitta’’nti ettha daṇḍadabbaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3148: ‘‘Nīlassa paṭassa bhāvo nīlatta’’nti ettha nīlaguṇo bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3149: ‘‘Pācakassa bhāvo pācakatta’’nti ettha pacanakriyā bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3150: ‘‘Tissanāmassa janassa bhāvo tissatta’’nti ettha tissanāmaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3151: Tattha gossa bhāvoti gosaddaṃ sutvā godabbe gobuddhiyā vā godabbaṃ disvā tasmiṃ dabbe govohārassa vā pavattikāraṇanti attho. Evaṃ sesesupi yathānurūpaṃ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:3155: Ṇyamhi-alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, brāhmaṇassa bhāvo brāhmaññaṃ, sīlasamādhipaññāguṇo sāmaññañca brāhmaññañca nāma. Tāpasassa bhāvo tāpasyaṃ, nipuṇassa bhāvo nepuññaṃ, vipulassa bhāvo vepullaṃ, rañño bhāvo rajjaṃ, āpabbatassa khettassa bhāvo āpabbatyaṃ, dāyādassa bhāvo dāyajjaṃ, visamassa bhāvo vesammaṃ, sakhino bhāvo sakhyaṃ, vāṇijānaṃ bhāvo vāṇijjaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3156: Ṇeyyamhi – sucissa bhāvo soceyyaṃ. Evaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3157: Ṇiyamhi-ālasiyaṃ, madabhāvo madiyaṃ. Evaṃ dakkhiyaṃ, purohitabhāvo porohitiyaṃ, byattassa bhāvo veyyattiyaṃ, byāvaṭassa bhāvo veyyāvaṭiyaṃ, imāni dve pubbe veyyākaraṇapadaṃ viya siddhāni.
anya-e0201n0:3158: Ṇamhi-garuno bhāvo gāravo, paṭubhāvo pāṭavaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3159: Iyamhi-adhipatibhāvo adhipatiyaṃ, paṇḍitabhāvo paṇḍitiyaṃ, bahussutabhāvo bahussutiyaṃ, naggassa bhāvo naggiyaṃ, sūrabhāvo sūriyaṃ, vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3160: Kammatthe kammaṃ nāma kriyā, alasassa kammaṃ alasattaṃ, alasatā, alasattanaṃ, ālasyaṃ, ālaseyyaṃ, ālasiyaṃ, ālasaṃ, alasiyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3161: 491. Bya vaddhadāsā vā ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780.
anya-e0201n0:3162: Bhāva, kammesu vaddha, dāsehi byo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3163: Vaddhassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā vaddhabyaṃ, vaddhatā, dāsabyaṃ, dāsatā, ‘vaddhava’nti idha ṇe pare vāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:3164: 492. Naṇa yuvā bo ca vaye ka. 361; rū. 388; nī. 781; caṃ. 4.1.146; pā. 5.1.130; ‘…vassa’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3165: Vaye gamyamāne bhāva, kammesu yuvato naṇa hoti vā bāgamo ca.
anya-e0201n0:3168: 493. Aṇvādīhimo ka. 360; rū. 387; nī. 780; caṃ. 4.1.139; pā. 5.1.122; ‘aṇvāditvimo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3170: Aṇuno bhāvo aṇimā, laghuno bhāvo laghimā.
anya-e0201n0:3172: Imapaccaye pare kassa, mahantasaddānaṃ kamena kasa, mahā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3173: Kassakassa kammaṃ kasimā (kisamahatamime kasamahā. imapaccaye pare kisa, mahanthasaddānaṃ kamena kasa, mahā honthi. kisassa bhāvo kasimā, moga. 4-133), mahantassa bhāvo mahimā.
