Sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, ṇyamhi sāgamo, ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pararūpattaṃ. Evaṃ domanassaṃ, sundaraṃ vaco etasminti suvaco, suvacassa bhāvo sovacassaṃ. Evaṃ dovacassaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3174: ‘‘Ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ, uyyānarāmaṇeyyakaṃ, bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ’’ iccādīsu ramitabbanti ramaṇaṃ, ramaṇaṃ ettha atthīti rāmaṇo, ārāmo, ārāmarāmaṇassa bhāvo ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ, ṇeyyo, sakatthe ca ko kathaṃ rāmaṇiyakatthi? sakatthe kanthā ṇena siddhaṃ, (moga. 4-59), ārāmasampatti, ārāmasirīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n0:3177: 495. Tamassa parimāṇaṃ ṇiko ca ka. 351; rū. 374; nī. 764; caṃ. 4.1.62; pā. 5.1.57, 58.
anya-e0201n0:3178: Taṃ assa parimāṇanti atthe paṭhamantā ṇiko hoti ko ca. Parimīyate anenāti parimāṇaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3179: Doṇo parimāṇamassāti doṇiko. Evaṃ khāriko, kumbhiko, asītivassāni parimāṇamassāti āsītiko, vayo. Evaṃ nāvutiko, upaḍḍhakāyo parimāṇamassāti upaḍḍhakāyikaṃ, bimbohanaṃ, dve parimāṇamassāti dukaṃ. Evaṃ tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ, dvittaṃ. Dasakaṃ, satakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3180: 496. Yatetehi ttako ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; pā. 5.1.22, 23
anya-e0201n0:3181: Tamassa parimāṇanti atthe ya, ta, etasaddehi sadisadvibhūto ttako hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3185: Etaṃ parimāṇamassāti ettakaṃ, yāva parimāṇamassāti yāvattakaṃ. Evaṃ tāvattakaṃ, etāvattakaṃ. ‘Yatetehī’ti vacanena yāva, tāva, etāvāpi gayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3186: 498. Sabbā ca ṭāvantu ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; caṃ. 4.2.43; pā. 5.2.39; ‘sabbā cacavantu’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3187: Tamassa parimāṇanti atthe ya, te’tehi ca sabbato ca ṭāvantu hoti, etassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3188: Sabbaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti sabbāvantaṃ, sabbāvā, attho, sabbāvanto, sabbāvantā, atthā, sabbāvati, atthe, sabbāvantesu, atthesu, itthiyaṃ sabbāvatī, sabbāvantī, parisā. Evaṃ yāvā, yāvantā, yāvanto, tāvā, tāvantā, tāvanto, ettāvā, ettāvantā, ettāvanto iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3189: Kvaci mahāvuttinā ekassa ta-kārassa lopo, yāvatako kāyo, tāvatako byāmo dī. ni. 3.200, yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi.
anya-e0201n0:3190: 499. Kiṃmhā rati rīva rīvataka rittakā ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; caṃ. 4.2.45; pā. 5.2.41.
anya-e0201n0:3191: Taṃ assa parimāṇanti atthe kiṃsaddato ete cattāro paccayā bhavanti.
anya-e0201n0:3193: Rānubandhe paccaye pare padantasarādissa lopo hoti. Ādisaddena padantabyañjanaṃ gayhati, suttavibhattena rīvantu, rittāvantupaccayā ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:3194: Kiṃ parimāṇamassāti kati. Pañcakkhandhā kati kusalā, kati akusalā vibha. 151, kativassosi tvaṃ bhikkhu, ekavasso ahaṃ bhagavā mahāva. 78, kiṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti kīvaṃ, kiṃva dūro ito gāmo. Evaṃ kīvatakaṃ, kittakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3195: Rīvantumhi – kīvanto hontu yācakā jā. 2.20.103 ti.
anya-e0201n0:3196: Rittāvantumhi – kittāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti saṃ. ni. 3.82, kittāvatā nu kho bhante rūpanti vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho bhante māroti vuccati saṃ. ni. 3.161.
anya-e0201n0:3197: Pubbasuttena ṭāvantumhi – ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti, ettāvatā rūpanti vuccati, ettāvatā māroti vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:3199: Mīyate etenāti mānaṃ, taṃ ummānaṃ, parimāṇanti duvidhaṃ, uddhaṃ mānaṃ ummānaṃ, tadaññaṃ mānaṃ parimāṇaṃ, imasmiṃ sutte pana sāmaññavacanattā duvidhampi labbhati, duvidhe māne pavattā hatthādisaddamhā tamassa parimāṇanti atthe mattapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3200: Hattho parimāṇaṃ assāti hatthamattaṃ, dve hatthā parimāṇaṃ assāti dvihatthamattaṃ, dve aṅguliyo parimāṇaṃ assāti dvaṅgulamattaṃ. Evaṃ caturaṅgulamattaṃ, vidatthimattaṃ, yojanamattaṃ, tīṇi yojanāni parimāṇaṃ assāti tiyojanamattaṃ, nāḷimattaṃ, patthamattaṃ, doṇamattaṃ, palaṃ vuccati ummānasaṅkhāto pātiviseso, palaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti palamattaṃ, pañcamattaṃ, pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ pārā. 1, tiṃsamattaṃ, saṭṭhimattaṃ, satamattaṃ, sahassamattaṃ, koṭimattaṃ, kumbhamattaṃ, cāṭimattaṃ, hatthimattaṃ, pabbatamattaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3201: ‘Mattā’ti vā parimāṇavācisaddantaraṃ, hattho mattā etassāti hatthamattaṃ. Evaṃ dvihatthamattaṃ, iccādinā samāsopi yujjati. Abhedūpacārena pana hatthaparimāṇaṃ hatthoti katvā ‘‘dvihatthaṃ vatthaṃ, doṇo vīhi, doṇo māso’’ti sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3202: 502. Taggho cuddhaṃ ka. 328; rū. 352; nī. 708; caṃ. 4.2.39; pā. 5.2.37.
anya-e0201n0:3203: Uddhaṃmāne pavattā saddā tamassa parimāṇanti atthe tagghapaccayo hoti matto ca.
anya-e0201n0:3206: Uddhaṃmāne pavattā purisamhā ṇo ca hoti taggho ca matto ca.
anya-e0201n0:3207: Catuhattho puriso parimāṇamassāti porisaṃ, tiporisaṃ, sataporisaṃ, gambhīraṃ. Evaṃ purisatagghaṃ, purisamattaṃ, uddhaṃ pasāritahatthena saddhiṃ pañcahatthaṃ purisapamāṇaṃ porisanti vadanti, ‘‘ekūnatīso vayasā’’ti dī. ni. 2.214 (ekūnatiṃso) ettha ekūnatīsa vassāni āyuparimāṇaṃ assāti ekūnatīso. Evaṃ vīso, tīso, cattālīso, paññāso, sahasso brahmā, dvisahasso brahmā, dasasahasso brahmā. Ettha ca ‘‘sahassaparimāṇaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ assāti sahasso’’-iccādinā ṇapaccayena sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3210: 504. Ekā kākyasahāye ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 835; caṃ. 4.2.67; pā. 5.3.52.
anya-e0201n0:3211: Asahāyatthe ekamhā ka, ākī honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3212: Asahāyo eko, ekako, ekākī, eko vā.
anya-e0201n0:3213: Itthiyaṃ ekikā, ekākinī, ekā vā, ‘adhātussa ke’ti suttena itthiyaṃ kamhi pare assa ittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3214: 505. Dviti catūhi tīyatthā ka. 385; rū. 409; nī. 817; tisatthā?.
anya-e0201n0:3215: Tehi tassa pūraṇanti atthe tīyo ca ttho ca honti.
anya-e0201n0:3216: 506. Dvitīnaṃ dutā tīye ka. 386, 410; nī. 818; tiye?.
anya-e0201n0:3217: Tīye pare dvi, tisaddānaṃ du, tādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3218: Dvinnaṃ pūraṇo dutīyo chaṭṭhasaṃgīti pāṭhesu dutiyotyādinā dissanti, dvinnaṃ pūraṇī dutīyā, dvinnaṃ pūraṇaṃ dutīyaṃ. Evaṃ tatīyo, tatīyā, tatīyaṃ. Catunnaṃ pūraṇo catuttho, catutthī, catutthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3219: 507. Ma pañcādikatihi ka. 373; rū. 406; nī. 802; caṃ. 4.2.55; pā. 5.2.49.
anya-e0201n0:3220: Pañcādīhi ca katimhā ca tassa pūraṇanti atthe mo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3221: Pañcamo, pañcamī, pañcamaṃ. Evaṃ sattama, aṭṭhama, navama, dasama, ekādasamādi. Katinnaṃ pūraṇo katimo, katimī, tithī.
anya-e0201n0:3222: 508. Tassa pūraṇekādasādito vā ka. 374; rū. 412; nī. 805; caṃ. 4.2.51; pā. 5.2.48.
anya-e0201n0:3223: Pūrate anenāti pūraṇaṃ, ekādasādito tassa pūraṇanti atthe ṭānubandho apaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3224: Ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo ekādaso, ekādasī, ekādasaṃ, ekādasamo vā. Evaṃ dvādaso, dvādasamo, teraso, terasamo, cuddaso, cuddasamo, pañcadaso, pañcadasamo, pannaraso, pannarasamo, soḷaso, soḷasamo, sattaraso, sattarasamo, aṭṭhāraso, aṭṭhārasamo.
anya-e0201n0:3225: 509. Ṭe satissa tissa ka. 389; rū. 413; nī. 824.
anya-e0201n0:3226: Ṭe pare satissa ti-kārassa lopo hotīti vīsati, tīsatīnaṃ tissa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:3227: Ekūnavīso, ekūnavīsatimo, vīso, vīsatimo, tīso, tīsatimo, cattālīso, cattālīsamo, paññāso, paññāsamo. Saṭṭhyādito purimasuttena mo, saṭṭhimo, sattatimo, asītimo, navutimo.
anya-e0201n0:3229: Satādito tassa pūraṇatthe mo hoti, satādīnaṃ antassa ittañca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3230: Satassa pūraṇo satimo, dvisatimo, tisatimo, sahassimo.
anya-e0201n0:3232: Chamhā tassa pūraṇanti atthe ṭṭha, ṭṭhamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3233: Chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhaṃ, chaṭṭhamo, chaṭṭhamī, chaṭṭhamaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3234: 512. Saṅkhyāya saccutīsāsadasantāyādhikāsmiṃ satasahasse ṭa ka. 328; rū. 352; nī. 701; caṃ. 4.2.50 …pe… 5.2.45, 46; ‘…ḍo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3235: Sati, uti, īsa, āsa, dasantāhi saṅkhyāhi te adhikā asmiṃ satasahasseti atthe ṭānubandho apaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3236: Ettha ca ‘satasahasse’ti sate vā sahasse vāti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3237: Tattha sahassasaddena sahassaṃ dasasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dasasatasahassañca gayhati.
anya-e0201n0:3238: Dasanta, satyanta, īsanta, āsanta, utyantāti evaṃ anukkamo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:3239: Tattha dasa, ekādasato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhārasā navasaṅkhyā dasantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3240: Vīsati, ekavīsatito paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhavīsatiyā navasaṅkhyā ca tīsati, ekatīsatito paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhatīsatiyā navasaṅkhyā ca satyantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3241: Cattālīsa, ekacattālīsato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhacattālīsāya navasaṅkhyā īsantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3242: Paññāsa, ekapaññāsato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhapaññāsāya navasaṅkhyā āsantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3243: Navuti, ekanavutito paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhanavutiyā nava saṅkhyā utyantā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3244: Sesā ṭṭhunta, tyantāpi idha saṅgayhanti. Ṭṭhuntā nāma saṭṭhi,-ekasaṭṭhyādikā navasaṅkhyā. Tyantā nāma sattati, ekasattatyādikā navasaṅkhyā ca asīti, ekāsītyādikā navasaṅkhyā ca.
anya-e0201n0:3245: Dasantāsu tāva – dasa adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ dasasataṃ. Evaṃ dasasahassaṃ, dasasatasahassaṃ, ekādasa adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ ekādasasataṃ. Evaṃ ekādasasahassaṃ, ekādasasatasahassaṃ. Evaṃ dvādasasatamiccādīni.
anya-e0201n0:3246: Satyantāsu – ṭamhi ti-kāralopo, vīsati adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ vīsasataṃ. Evaṃ ekavīsasataṃ, dvāvīsasataṃ iccādi, tīsati adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ tīsasataṃ. Evaṃ ekatīsasataṃ, dvattīsasataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3247: Īsantāsu – cattālīsaṃ adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ cattālīsasataṃ. Evaṃ ekacattālīsasataṃ, dvecattālīsasataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3248: Āsantāsu – paññāsaṃ adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ paññāsasataṃ. Evaṃ ekapaññāsasataṃ, dvepaññāsasataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3249: Ṭṭhuntāsu – saṭṭhi adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ saṭṭhisataṃ. Evaṃ ekasaṭṭhisataṃ, dvāsaṭṭhisataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3250: Tyantāsu – sattati adhikā, ekasattati adhikā, asīti adhikā, ekāsīti adhikā iccādinā vattabbā.
anya-e0201n0:3251: Utyantāsu – navuti adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ navutisataṃ. Evaṃ ekanavutisataṃ, dvenavutisataṃ iccādi. Esa nayo sahassepi.
anya-e0201n0:3252: Atha vā dasantā nāma ekato paṭṭhāya dasasaṅkhyā.
anya-e0201n0:3257: Eko adhiko yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ ekasataṃ, ‘‘athetthekasataṃ khatyā, anuyantā yasassino’’ti jā. 2.22.594 pāḷi. ‘‘Dve adhikā yasmiṃ sate tayidaṃ dvisataṃ’’ iccādinā sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ, suvicittamidaṃ vidhānanti.
anya-e0201n0:3258: Yathā pana ‘‘eko ca dasa ca ekādasa, ekādhikā vā dasa ekādasā’’ti sijjhati, tathā idhapi ‘‘dasa ca satañca dasasataṃ, dasādhikaṃ vā sataṃ dasasata’’ntiādinā vutte sabbaṃ taṃ vidhānaṃ samāsavasena sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3259: Tattha pana ‘‘dve satāni dvisataṃ, tīṇi satāni tisata’’miccādīni ca ‘‘dve sahassāni dvisahassaṃ, tīṇi sahassāni tisahassa’’miccādīni ca ‘‘dve satasahassāni dvisatasahassaṃ, tīṇi satasahassāni tisatasahassa’’miccādīni ca digusamāse sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3260: 513. Vārasaṅkhyāyakkhattuṃ ka. 646; rū. 419; nī. 1282; caṃ. 4.4.5; pā. 5.4.17.
anya-e0201n0:3262: Dve vārā dvikkhattuṃ. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ, catukkhattuṃ, pañcakkhattuṃ, dasakkhattuṃ, satakkhattuṃ, sahassakkhattuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3264: Vārasambandhibhūtā katisaddā kkhattuṃ hoti. Kati vārā katikkhattuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3265: 515. Bahumhā dhā ca paccāsattiyā ka. 646; rū. 419; nī. 1282; ‘paccāsattiyaṃ’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3266: Vārasambandhibhūtā bahusaddā paccāsattiyā sati dhā ca hoti kkhattuñca.
anya-e0201n0:3267: Bahuvārā bahukkhattuṃ, bahusaddena anekavāraṃ upalakkheti, anekavārā anekakkhattuṃ. Evaṃ bahuvārā bahudhā, anekavārā anekadhā. Paccāsatti nāma vārānaṃ accāsannatā vuccati, divasassa bahukkhattuṃ bhuñjati, bahudhā bhuñjati, vārānaṃ dūrabhāve sati te paccayā na honti, māsassa bahuvāre bhuñjati.
anya-e0201n0:3276: Dvīhi pakārehi dvidhā. Evaṃ tidhā, catudhā, pañcadhā, dasadhā, satadhā, sahassadhā, bahudhā, ekadhā, anekadhā.
anya-e0201n0:3283: 520. Sabbādīhi pakāre thā ka. 398; rū. 421; nī. 844; caṃ. 4.3.26; pā. 5.3.69.
anya-e0201n0:3284: Bahubhedo vā sāmaññassa bhedako viseso vā pakāro, sabbādīhi pakāre thā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3285: Sabbena pakārena sabbathā, sabbehi pakārehi sabbathā, yādisena pakārena yathā, yādisehi pakārehi yathā. Evaṃ tathā, aññathā, ubhayathā, itarathā.
anya-e0201n0:3288: Kena pakārena kathaṃ, iminā pakārena itthaṃ. Iminā suttena kiṃ, imasaddehi thaṃ, tthaṃpaccaye katvā kiṃssa kattaṃ, imassa ittañca kariyati.
anya-e0201n0:3289: 522. Tabbati jātiyo ka. 398; rū. 421; nī. 844; caṃ. 4.3.26; pā. 5.3.69.
anya-e0201n0:3290: So pakāro assa atthīti tabbā, tasmiṃ tabbati, pakāravante dabbeti attho. Taṃsāmaññavācimhā tabbati jātiyapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3291: Visesena paṭurūpo paṇḍito paṭujātiyo. Visesena mudurūpaṃ vatthu mudujātiyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3292: 523. So vīcchāppakāresu ka. 397; rū. 420; nī. 836; caṃ. 4.4.2 …pe… 5.4.43.
anya-e0201n0:3295: Padaṃ padaṃ vāceti padaso vāceti. Khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ karoti khaṇḍaso karoti, bilaṃ bilaṃ vibhajjati bilaso vibhajjati iccādi. Ettha ca ‘padaṃ padaṃ’ iccādīsu kriyāvisesane dutiyā.
anya-e0201n0:3297: Bahūhi pakārehi puthuso, sabbehi pakārehi sabbaso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3298: ‘‘Yoniso upāyaso, ṭhānaso, hetuso, atthaso, dhammaso, suttaso, anubyañjanaso’’ iccādīsu pana mahāvuttinā tatiyekavacanassa sottaṃ. Tathā dīghaso, oraso iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3301: 524. Pitito bhātari reyyaṇa ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n0:3302: Pitusaddamhā tassa bhātāti atthe reyyaṇa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3303: Pitu bhātā petteyyo a. ni. 6.44. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti ussa lopo, tassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3304: 525. Mātito ca bhaginiyaṃ cho ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765.
anya-e0201n0:3305: Mātito pitito ca bhaginiyaṃ cho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3306: Mātu bhaginī mātucchā udā. 22, pitu bhaginī pitucchā saṃ. ni. 2.243.
anya-e0201n0:3307: 526. Mātāpitūsvāmaho ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.1.60; pā. 4.2.36.
anya-e0201n0:3309: Mātu mātā mātāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho ma. ni. 2.411, pitu mātā pitāmahī, pitu pitā pitāmaho.
anya-e0201n0:3314: Mātu hito metteyyo, pitu hito petteyyo. Mātāpitūsu suppaṭipanno.
anya-e0201n0:3317: Upādānānaṃ hitaṃ upādāniyaṃ. Evaṃ oghaniyaṃ, yoganiyaṃ, ganthaniyaṃ, nīvaraṇiyaṃ, suttavibhattiyā aññatthesupi iyo, samānodare sayito sodariyo.
anya-e0201n0:3319: Tassa hitanti atthe cakkhvādīhi sso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3320: Cakkhussa hitaṃ cakkhussaṃ a. ni. 5.208, subharūpaṃ cakkhubhesajjañca. Āyuno hitaṃ āyussaṃ a. ni. 5.231, āyuvaḍḍhanavidhi.
anya-e0201n0:3323: Sabhāyaṃ sādhu sabbho, ‘sādhū’ti kusalo yogyo hito vā. Mittānaṃ hitaṃ mettaṃ. Suttavibhāgā aññatrapi ṇyo, rathaṃ vahatīti racchā, rathavīthi.
anya-e0201n0:3325: Tasmiṃ sādhūti atthe kammamhā niya, ññā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3328: Tattha sādhūti atthe kathādīhi iko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3329: Kathāyaṃ sādhu kathiko, dhammakathāyaṃ sādhu dhammakathiko, saṅgāme sādhu saṅgāmiko, gāmavāse sādhu gāmavāsiko, upavāse sādhu upavāsiko.
anya-e0201n0:3330: 533. Pathādīhi ṇeyyo ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 3.4.105; pā. 4.4.104.
anya-e0201n0:3331: Tattha sādhūti atthe pathādīhi ṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3332: Pathe sādhu pātheyyaṃ, saṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, tassa pati sapati, sapatimhi sādhu sāpateyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3333: 534. Dakkhiṇāyārahe ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; caṃ. 4.1.80; pā. 5.1.69.
anya-e0201n0:3336: 535. Āyo tumantā ka. 352; rū. 376; nī. 765; ‘rāyo tumantā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3338: Ghātetuṃ arahatīti ghātetāyo, jāpetuṃ arahatīti jāpetāyo, ‘jāpetu’nti hāpetuṃ, pabbājetuṃ arahatīti pabbājetāyo, mahāvuttinā āyamhi sabinduno ussa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:3341: 536. Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyyamayā ka. 352, 351, 372; rū. 376, 374, 385; nī. 765, 764, 798; caṃ. 3.3.103; pā. 4.3.134.
anya-e0201n0:3342: Tassa vikāro, tassa avayavoti atthesu ṇādayo honti, pakatiyā uttari avatthantarāpatti vikāro.
anya-e0201n0:3343: Udumbarassa vikati odumbaraṃ, bhasmā, udumbarassa avayavo odumbaraṃ, paṇṇādi. Kapotāvayavo kāpotaṃ, maṃsalohitapattādi.
anya-e0201n0:3345: Ṇeyyamhi-eṇissa avayavo eṇeyyaṃ, maṃsaṃ. Kosakimīnaṃ vikati koseyyaṃ, suttaṃ vatthañca.
anya-e0201n0:3346: Mayamhi-tiṇānaṃ vikati tiṇamayaṃ. Evaṃ dārumayaṃ, naḷamayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ, gunnaṃ vikati gomayaṃ, karīsaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3347: 537. Jatuto mayaṇa vā ka. 372; rū. 385; nī. 798; caṃ. 3.3.108; pā. 4.3.138; jatuto saṇa vā (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3348: Tassa vikārāvayavesu jatuto mayaṇa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3352: 538. Taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye ka. 363; rū. 390; nī. 786; caṃ. 4.3.45; pā. 5.3.55, 57.
anya-e0201n0:3354: Pāpānaṃ atisayena pāpoti pāpataro, pāpatamo, pāpissiko, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho, itthiyaṃ pāpatarā, atisayatopi atisayapaccayo hoti, atisayena pāpiṭṭho pāpiṭṭhataro.
anya-e0201n0:3355: 539. Vacchādīhi tanutte taro ka. 363; rū. 390; nī. 786; caṃ. 4.3.74; pā. 5.3.91.
anya-e0201n0:3357: Atitaruṇo vaccho vacchataro, itthiyaṃ vacchatarī. Yobbanassa tanutte yobbanapattānaṃ susuttassa tanutte atitaruṇo usabho ukkhataro, assabhāvassa tanutte taruṇaasso assataro, itthiyaṃ assatarī. Sāmatthiyassa tanutte taruṇausabho usabhataro.
anya-e0201n0:3358: 540. Kiṃmhā niddhāraṇe taratamā ka. 363; rū. 390; nī. 786; caṃ. 4.3.77; pā. 5.3.92, 93; ‘…ratara ratamā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3359: Kiṃsaddā niddhāraṇe gamyamāne tara, tamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3360: Kataro bhavataṃ devadatto, kataro bhavataṃ yaññadatto, katamo bhavataṃ devadatto, katamo bhavataṃ yaññadatto, ‘kissa ko’ti suttena tara, tamesu kissa kattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3364: Tassa samūhoti atthe kaṇa, ṇa, ṇikā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3365: Gottapaccayantehi tāva – rājaññānaṃ samūho rājaññakaṃ, mānussakaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3366: Ukkhādīhi-ukkhānaṃ usabhānaṃ samūho okkhakaṃ, oṭṭhānaṃ samūho oṭṭhakaṃ, urabbhānaṃ samūho orabbhakaṃ. Evaṃ rājakaṃ, rājaputtakaṃ, hatthikaṃ, dhenukaṃ, sasaṃ adenti bhakkhantīti sasādakā, tesaṃ samūho sasādakakaṃ. Ikkhaṇikaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3368: Ṇikamhi-apūpānaṃ samūho āpūpikaṃ, sakuṇānaṃ samūho sākuṇiko saṃkulānaṃ samūho saṃkulikaṃ?.
anya-e0201n0:3371: Janatā, rājatā, bandhutā, gāmatā, sahāyatā, nagaravāsīnaṃ samūho nāgaratā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3373: Ubha, dvi, tīhi tassa aṃsatthe ayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3374: Ubho aṃsā bhāgā assāti ubhayaṃ, dve aṃsā assāti dvayaṃ, tayo aṃsā assāti tayaṃ, vatthuttayaṃ, ratanattayaṃ, dve vā tayo vā aṃsā assāti dvattayaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3378: Tena dattoti atthe la, iyā honti. Mahāvuttinā dinnasaddassa dattattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3379: Devena dattoti devalo jā. 1.8.65. ‘Devilo’tipi devīlo? pāḷi. Deviyo, devadatto vā.
anya-e0201n0:3380: Evaṃ brahmalo, brahmiyo, brahmadatto, sivena bissanudevarājena datto sīvalo, sīviyo, itthiyaṃ sīvali, sīviyi, sissa dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:3381: 545. Tena nibbatte ka. 353; rū. 378; nī. 767; ‘tena nibbatte imo’?.
anya-e0201n0:3383: Pākena nibbattaṃ pākimaṃ, pheṇena nibbattaṃ pheṇimaṃ, veṭhanena nibbattaṃ veṭhimaṃ. Evaṃ vedhimaṃ, gopphanena nibbattaṃ gopphimaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 2.431, pupphadāmaṃ, karaṇena nibbattaṃ kittimaṃ, kuttimaṃ vā, mahāvuttinā karaṇassa kittaṃ kuttañca. Suttavibhattena saṃhārimaṃ, āhārimaṃ iccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3388: Vedaṃ ñāṇaṃ nissitaṃ vedallaṃ, lassa dvittaṃ, duṭṭhu nissitaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ. ‘‘Madanīyaṃ, bandhanīyaṃ, mucchanīyaṃ, rajanīyaṃ, gamanīyaṃ, dassanīyaṃ’’ iccādīni karaṇe vā adhikaraṇe vā anīyapaccayena sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3389: ‘Dhūmāyitatta’ntiādīsu dhūmo viya attānaṃ ācaratīti dhūmāyitaṃ, gaganaṃ, dhūmāyitaṃ eva dhūmāyitattaṃ, sakatthe tta. Evaṃ timirāyitattaṃ, nāmadhātuto saṃ. ni. 3.87 āyapaccayena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3390: 547. Sañjātā tārakādvitvito ka. 555; rū. 612; nī. 1142; caṃ. 4.2.37 …pe… 5.2.36; ‘sañjātaṃ…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3391: Tārakādīhi te assa sañjātāti atthe ito hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3392: Tārakā sañjātā assāti tārakitaṃ, gaganaṃ. Pupphāni sañjātāni assāti pupphito. Evaṃ phalito, rukkho. Pallavāni sañjātāni assāti pallavitā, latā. Dukkhaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti dukkhito, sukhaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti sukhito.
anya-e0201n0:3393: Paṇḍā vuccati paññā, paṇḍā sañjātā assāti paṇḍito, daṇḍo sañjāto assāti daṇḍito. Mahāvuttinā tassa natte malaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti malinaṃ. Tathā pipāsā sañjātā assāti pipāsito, jighacchā sañjātā assāti jighacchito, bubhukkhā sañjātā assāti bubhukkhito, mucchā sañjātā assāti mucchito, visaññā sañjātā assāti visaññito, nindā sañjātā assāti nindito.
anya-e0201n0:3394: Evaṃ gabba-thambhe gabbito. Dabba-pāṭave dabbito. Antaraṃ sañjātaṃ assāti antarito, vaccaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti vaccito.
anya-e0201n0:3395: 548. Nindāññātappapaṭibhāgarassadayāsaññāsu ko ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 835; caṃ. 4.3.62, 63, 64; pā. 5.3.73-79, 96, 97.
anya-e0201n0:3397: Nindāyaṃ – kucchito samaṇo samaṇako. Evaṃ muṇḍako, assako, uddhumātakaṃ, vinīlakaṃ, vipubbakaṃ, aṭṭhikaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3398: Aññāte – aññāto asso assako, kassa ayaṃ assoti vā assako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3399: Appatthe – appakaṃ telaṃ telakaṃ. Evaṃ ghatakaṃ, khuddakaṃ dhanu dhanukaṃ, rathakaṃ, gāmakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3400: Paṭibhāgatthe – hatthirūpakaṃ hatthikaṃ. Evaṃ assakaṃ, balībaddako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3401: Rasse-rasso manusso manussako. Evaṃ rukkhako, pilakkhako iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3402: Dayāyaṃ-anukampito putto puttako. Evaṃ vacchako, itthikā, ambakā, kumārikā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3406: 549. Abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārācī ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 835; caṃ. 4.4.35; pā. 5.4.50.
anya-e0201n0:3407: Pubbe tassa abhūtassa vatthuno kadāci tathā bhavanaṃ abhūtatabbhāvo, tasmiṃ abhūtatabbhāve jotaniye sati karā’sa, bhūdhātūnaṃ yoge vikāravācimhā nāmasmā cānubandho īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3408: Adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti dhavalīkaroti, adhavalo dhavalo siyā dhavalīsiyā, adhavalo dhavalo bhavati dhavalībhavati. Evaṃ dhavalīkāro, dhavalībhūto.
anya-e0201n0:3409: Abhūtatabbhāveti kiṃ? Ghaṭaṃ karoti, ghaṭo atthi, ghaṭo bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3411: Vikārāti kiṃ? Pakatiyā mā hotu, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ karoti, suvaṇṇassa kuṇḍalakaraṇaṃ nāma loke pakatirūpanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ siyā, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0201n0:3415: Sakatthepi paccayā dissanti. ‘Sakattho’ti sakapadattho, pakatiliṅgapadatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3416: Hīno eva hīnako, poto eva potako, devo eva devatā, yathābhūtameva yathābhuccaṃ, karuṇā eva kāruññaṃ, pattakālameva pattakallaṃ, ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ, pāguññameva pāguññatā, kammaññameva kammaññatā, dānaṃ eva dānamayaṃ, sīlaṃ eva sīlamayaṃ. Evaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3417: Yathā ca amaccaputtā eva ‘amaccaputtiyā’ti vuccanti, evaṃ ‘‘sakyaputto eva sakyaputtiyo, asamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo pārā. 55, evaṃ nāṭaputtiyo, dāsaputtiyo’’tipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:3418: ‘Bhayadassivā, atthadassimā’ti vantu, mantupaccayāsakatthepi yujjanti. ‘Brahmavaṇṇī, devavaṇṇī’ti ettha brahmuno vaṇṇo brahmavaṇṇo, brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo assa atthīti atthe sati īpaccayo paccayattho eva hoti, na sakattho. Brahmavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soyaṃ brahmavaṇṇīti atthe sati sakatthoyeva. Api ca ekasmiṃ aññapadatthe dve samāsa, taddhitā vattantītipi yujjati, tathā ‘paguṇassa bhāvo pāguññatā’tiādīsu dve taddhitapaccayā bhāvattheti.
anya-e0201n0:3422: Pubbe niddiṭṭhā ṇādayo paccayā niddiṭṭhatthato aññesupi atthesu dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3423: Magadhesu jāto māgadho, magadhesu saṃvaḍḍhito māgadho, magadhesu nivuttho māgadho, magadhānaṃ magadhesu vā issaro māgadho iccādi, ṇo.
anya-e0201n0:3424: Kāsiṃ agghatīti kāsiyo cūḷava. 376, ‘kāsī’ti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā vuccati, iyo.
anya-e0201n0:3427: Pubbe niddiṭṭhapaccayehi aññepi paccayā niddiṭṭhesu aniddiṭṭhesu ca atthesu dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3428: Visadisā vividhā (moga.) mātaro vimātaro, tāsaṃ puttā vemātikā netti 95, ikaṇa.
anya-e0201n0:3429: Pathe gacchantīti pathāvino ma. ni. 2.347, aghaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpaṃ vā gacchatīti aghāvī, āvī.
anya-e0201n0:3430: Issā assa atthīti issukī jā. 1.6.43, ukī.
anya-e0201n0:3431: Dhuraṃ vahantīti dhorayhā a. ni. 3.58, yhaṇa.
anya-e0201n0:3432: Lobhassa hitā lobhaneyyā. Evaṃ dosaneyyā, mohaneyyā, aneyyo.
anya-e0201n0:3433: Dassanaṃ arahatīti dassaneyyo. Evaṃ vandaneyyo, pūjaneyyo, namassaneyyo, eyyo.
anya-e0201n0:3434: Oghānaṃ hitā oghaniyā, yoganiyā, ganthaniyā, kammaniyaṃ, attaniyaṃ, dassaniyaṃ, pūjaniyo, namassaniyo iccādi, aniyo.
anya-e0201n0:3435: Yaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti yāvaṃ, yāvantassa bhāvo yāvatvaṃ. Evaṃ tāvatvaṃ, tva.
anya-e0201n0:3436: Paramānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃ vā pāramī, samaggānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃ vā sāmaggī, ṇī.
anya-e0201n0:3437: ‘‘Nāgavatā, sīhavatā, ājaññavatā’’ iccādīsu bhāve vantupaccayaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:3441: ‘Padānamādissāyuvaṇṇassāeo ṇānubandhe’ti padādibhūtānaṃ akāra, ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ ā, e, ovuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3442: Ādicco, vāsiṭṭho, venateyyo, meniko, pettikaṃ, odumbaraṃ, oḷumpiko, odagyaṃ, dobhaggaṃ, sobhaggaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3444: ‘Majjhe’ti suttena padamajjhepi vuddhi, vāseṭṭho, aḍḍhateyyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3445: 553. Saṃyogepi kvaci ka. 405; rū. 365; nī. 864; ‘pi’ (bahūsu natthi).
anya-e0201n0:3446: Ṇānubandhe paccaye pare saṃyogepi kvaci vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3447: Petteyyo, pettikaṃ, decco, pamukhe sādhu pāmokkhaṃ, pamuditassa bhāvo pāmojjaṃ, vattabbanti vākyaṃ, bhajitabbanti bhāgyaṃ, bhoggaṃ, yoggaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3451: Tattha avaṇṇe-paṇḍiccaṃ, tacchaṃ, dāyajjaṃ, dvidhā bhāvo dvejjhaṃ, karuṇāyeva kāruññaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3452: Ivaṇṇe-adhipatissa bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ. Evaṃ ādicco, koṇḍañño iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3453: ‘Uvaṇṇassāvaṅa sare’ti sare pare uvaṇṇassa avaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3454: Ṇamhi-lahuno bhāvo lāghavaṃ, rāghavaṃ, jamburukkhe bhavaṃ jambavaṃ. Tathā kapilavatthumhi bhavaṃ kāpilavatthavaṃ, vanaṃ. Bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo, gabyaṃ, dabyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3455: ‘Ṭe satissā…’ti ṭamhi paccaye vīsati, tīsatīnaṃ tilopo.
anya-e0201n0:3456: Vīsatiyā pūraṇo vīso, ekūnavīso. Evaṃ tīso, ekūnatīso.
anya-e0201n0:3458: Metteyyo, petteyyo, kivaṃ, kittakaṃ, īdī, īdikkho, īdiso, āhacca, upahacca, sakkacca, adhikicca, kiriyā, vedagū, pāragū iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3459: 554. Paccayānaṃ lopo ka. 391; rū. 423; nī. 830; moggallāne ‘lopo’ tveva dissati.
anya-e0201n0:3461: Buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā saṃ. ni. 4.85. Ettha ca ratanassa bhāvo ratanaṃ, attano bhāvo attā, attano sakassa bhāvo attaniyanti evaṃ bhāvapaccayalopo.
anya-e0201n0:3462: ‘‘Buddhānussati dhammānussati’’ādīsu ‘‘buddhassa bhāvo buddho, buddhassa ayaṃ guṇo buddho’’tiādinā nayena paccayalopo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:3464: Iyi’ṭṭhesu paresu vī, mantu, vantūnaṃ lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3465: Medhāvīnaṃ atisayena medhāvīti medhiyo, medhiṭṭho, satimantānaṃ atisayena satimāti satiyo, satiṭṭho, guṇavantānaṃ atisayena guṇavāti guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:3469: 556. Jo vuddhassiyiṭṭhesu ka. 262; rū. 391; nī. 513; caṃ. 4.3.50; pā. 5.3.61, 62.
anya-e0201n0:3472: 557. Bāḷhantikapasatthānaṃ sādhanedasajā ka. 263, 264, 265; rū. 392, 393, 394; nī. 512, 514, 515; caṃ. 4.3.49, 51; pā. 5.3.60, 63; ‘… dasā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3473: Iya, iṭṭhapaccayesu paresu bāḷha, antika, pasatthasaddānaṃ sādha, neda, sa, jādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3474: Bāḷhānaṃ atisayena bāḷhoti sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho, antikānaṃ atisayena antikoti nediyo, nediṭṭho, pasatthānaṃ atisayena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:3476: Iya, iṭṭhapaccayesu paresu appa, yuvasaddānaṃ kaṇa, kanaādesā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3477: Appānaṃ navānaṃ atisayena appo navoti kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho, yuvānaṃ taruṇānaṃ atisayena yuvā taruṇoti kaniyo, kaniṭṭho, kaniye vaye bhavā kaññā.
anya-e0201n0:3478: 559. Kosajjājjava pārisajja suhajja maddavārisyāsa bhājaññatheyyabāhusaccā ka. 360, 361; rū. 387, 388; nī. 780, 781; ‘…rissā…’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3479: Bhāva, kammesu ṇānubandhe paccaye pare ete saddā nipaccante. Tattha ajjava, maddavā’sabhasaddā ṇamhi sijjhanti, sesā ṇyamhi.
anya-e0201n0:3480: Tattha ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, iminā suttena ṇamhi ussa attaṃ, ‘uvaṇṇassāvaṅa…’ iti ussa avattaṃ. Evaṃ muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ, usabhassa bhāvo āsabhaṃ, ussa āttaṃ. Kusitassa kusītassa? bhāvo kosajjaṃ, iminā ilopo, tyassa jjattaṃ, parisāsu uppanno pārisajjo dī. ni. 2.215, dāgamo, suhadayova suhado, yalopo, suhadassa bhāvo sohajjaṃ jā. 1.5.23, isino idaṃ ārisyaṃ, issa ārittaṃ, ājāniyassa ājānīyassātipi dissati bhāvo ājaññaṃ, yalopo, puna ‘lopovaṇṇivaṇṇāna’nti ilopo, tato paraṃ sandhirūpaṃ, ājāniyo eva vā ājañño jā. 1.1.24, sakatthe ṇyo, thenassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā theyyaṃ, nassa yattaṃ, bahusutassa bhāvo bāhusaccaṃ, ussa attaṃ, puna sandhirūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3481: 560. Adhātussa ke pāṇiniye, cande ca ‘kāka’iti pañcamyantaṃ dissate syādito ghessi ka. 404; rū. 370; nī. 859.
anya-e0201n0:3483: Adhātussa avayavabhūte kakāre pare pubbassa akārassa bahulaṃ i hoti kanissite ghe asyādito pare sati.
anya-e0201n0:3484: Bālikā, ekikā, hatthipotikā, mahallikā, kumbhakārikā, kammakārikā, annadāyikā, upāsikā, sāvikā, dhammavācikā.
anya-e0201n0:3485: Adhātussāti kiṃ? Kulupakā- bhikkhunī, dhenupakā, khīrupakā-vacchī, idha dhātvādesopi kakāro dhātusaññaṃ labhatiyeva.
anya-e0201n0:3489: Ettha ca bahavo paribbājakā yassā sā bahuparibbājakāti viggaho. Paribbājakasaddo pakatisyādisaddo hoti, tasmā kanissitassa ghasaññassa ākārassa syādito parattā pubbassa assa ittaṃ na bhavati. Yadi bhaveyya, bahukā paribbājikāyo yassanti atthappasaṅgo siyāti.
anya-e0201n0:3495: Atha dhātupaccayasaṃsiddhaṃ kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṃ liṅgabhedarahitaṃ kriyāpadhānavācakaṃ tyādyantanāmakaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n0:3496: Tattha kriyaṃ dhāretīti dhātu. Sā pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividhā.
anya-e0201n0:3497: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n0:3498: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n0:3499: Puttīya, pabbatāya iccādi nāmadhātu nāma nāmabhūtassa sato kriyavācīpaccayayogena dhātuṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
anya-e0201n0:3501: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3502: Yā kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā akammikā nāma. Bhavati, hoti, tiṭṭhati, seti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3504: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3505: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3507: Tattha yā dhātu pāpanatthā hoti, sā nyādi nāma. Ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, bhāraṃ gāmaṃ vahati, sākhaṃ gāmaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0201n0:3508: Sesā dvikammikā duhādi nāma. Gāviṃ khīraṃ duhati, brāhmaṇaṃ kambalaṃ yācati, dāyakaṃ bhikkhaṃ bhikkhati, goṇaṃ vajaṃ rundhati, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, sissaṃ dhammaṃ anusāsati, bhagavā bhikkhū etaṃ [vacanaṃ] avoca, rājā amaccaṃ vacanaṃ bravīti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3509: Tattha yadā kammasmiṃ rūpaṃ sijjhati, tadā vibhatti, paccayā nyādimhi padhānakammaṃ vadanti, duhādimhi apadhānakammaṃ, sabbadhātūsu kāritayoge kāritakammanti, sabbañcetaṃ dhātūnaṃ pakatiatthavasena vuttaṃ, anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṃ atthantaravacane vā nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti, sakammikāpi akammikā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3514: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṃ vedeti, vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n0:3515: Vida – ārocane, vedayāmahaṃ bhante vedayatīti maṃ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, kāraṇaṃ nivedeti, dhammaṃ paṭivedeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3517: Pada-gatiyaṃ, maggaṃ pajjati, paṭipajjati, maggo uppajjati, nipajjati, sampajjati, bhogo bhavati, sambhavati, bhogaṃ anubhavati, taṇhaṃ abhibhavati, paribhavati, adhibhavati, araññaṃ abhisambhavati, ajjhogāhatīti attho. Gacchantaṃ magge abhisambhavati, sampāpuṇātīti attho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3518: Padānaṃ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3519: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n0:3520: Tattha pubbachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni parassapadāni nāma. Parachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni attanopadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3521: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma. Attahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu pavattibahulāni attanopadāni nāmāti eke.
anya-e0201n0:3522: Paro vuccati kattā sabbakriyāsādhāraṇattā, attā vuccati kammaṃ sakasakakriyāsādhāraṇattā, parassa abhidhāyakāni padāni parassapadāni, attano abhidhāyakāni padāni attanopadānīti aññe.
anya-e0201n0:3523: Attā vuccati padatthānaṃ sarīrabhūtā kriyā, kattunā pana sādhyaṭṭhena kriyarūpāni bhāva, kammānipi attāti vuccanti. Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n0:3524: Attā vuccati amhattho, paro vuccati tumha, nāmattho, pubbachakkāni parabahulattā parassapadāni nāma, parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti. Idaṃ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā. Pāḷibhāsaṃ pana patvā dvinnaṃ chakkānaṃ attahita, parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṃ na dissatiyeva, tasmā imasmiṃ ganthe taṃ nāmadvayaṃ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3525: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n0:3526: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṃ visadisarūpāni karonti, te vikaraṇapaccayā nāma, la, ya, ṇoiccādayo.
anya-e0201n0:3528: Paresaṃ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3529: Visuṃ taṃtaṃkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3530: ‘‘Kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpaka’’nti ettha atīta, paccuppannā’nāgata, kālavimuttavasena kālabhedo catubbidho.
anya-e0201n0:3531: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n0:3534: Sattamī, kālātipattīti dve kālavimutte vattanti, ayaṃ kira porāṇiko vibhattīnaṃ kamo, so ca pāḷiyā sametiyeva.
anya-e0201n0:3536: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā’’ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n0:3537: ‘‘Abbhatītā ca ye buddhā, vattamānā anāgatā’’ti ca apa. thera 1.1.588 pāḷī. Imasmiṃ kame pañcamī, sattamīti nāmadvayampi anvatthavasena siddhaṃ bhavati. Pacchā pana garuno vatticchāvasena vibhattīnaṃ nānākamaṃ karonti.
anya-e0201n0:3538: Kattu, kamma, bhāvā pana kārakabhedo nāma. Tattha bhāvo duvidho sādhya, sādhanavasena visesana, visesyavasena ca. Tattha dhātvatthakriyā sādhyabhāvo nāma. Paccayatthakriyā sādhanabhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3539: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti. Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṃ pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti. So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati, tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati, tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati. Yathā ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā ‘‘cintanaṃ jātaṃ, phusanaṃ jāta’’ miccādinā ekantameva jātiṃ visesenti, tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi ‘‘bhuyyate, gamyate, paccate, bhavanaṃ, gamanaṃ, pacana’’ miccādinā ekantameva paccayatthaṃ visesenti. Vatticchāvasena pana bhāvasādhanapadesu dhātvattha, paccayatthānaṃ abhedopi vattuṃ yujjatiyeva. Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n0:3540: Paṭhama, majjhimu’ttamapurisā purisabhedo. ‘Puriso’ti ca ‘‘yaṃkiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā’’ti ma. ni. 3.1 ettha attā eva vuccati, so ca attā ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedetī’’ti a. ni. 6.43; visuddhi. 2.580 ettha kārakoti vuccati. Iti ‘puriso’ti kārako eva.
anya-e0201n0:3541: So ca tividho nāmattho, tumhattho, amhattho cāti. Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā amhattho uttamapuriso nāma, sesā pana kamena paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapurisoti vuccanti. Vibhattiyo pana taddīpakattā paṭhamapurisādināmaṃ labhanti. Idañca nāmaṃ kārakabhede antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṃ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n0:3543: ‘Liṅgabhedarahita’nti ‘‘puriso gacchati, itthī gacchati, kulaṃ gacchati’’ iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṃ abhidheyyapadānaṃ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n0:3544: ‘Kriyāpadhānavācaka’nti ettha kriyaṃ eva padhānato abhidhāti, na nāmapadaṃ viya dabbaṃ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n0:3545: Tattha kriyā nāma dhātvatthabhāvo vuccati, sā ca kālavasena atītakriyā, paccuppannakriyā, anāgatakriyā, kālavimuttakriyāti catubbidhā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3546: Āṇattikriyā, āsiṭṭhakriyā, anumatikriyā, parikappakriyā, araha, sakka, vidhi, nimantanā’mantanādikriyāti bahuvidho kriyābhedoti.
anya-e0201n0:3547: Bhū-sattāyaṃ, santassa bhāvo sattā, tassaṃ sattāyaṃ, bhūdhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, sabbapadatthānaṃ sadda, buddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānabhāve vattatetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:3549: Adhikārasuttamidaṃ, kriyatthā paraṃ vibhatti, paccayā bhavantīti attho. Kriyā attho yassāti kriyattho. Pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividho dhātu, kāritapaccayantarūpampi vikatidhātumhi saṅgayhati.
anya-e0201n0:3550: 562. Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe ka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṃ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n0:3551: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṃ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma, taṃsambandhīkālopi tadūpacārena vattamānoti vuccati. Vattamāne kāle kriyatthā paraṃ tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti. Ayañca vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3552: 563. Pubbāparachakkānamekānekesu tumhamhasesesu dve dve majjhimuttamapaṭhamā ka. 408; rū. 431; nī. 867.
anya-e0201n0:3553: Tumhanāmaṃ, amhanāmaṃ, tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu vā ekasmiṃ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka, parachakkānaṃ dve dve majjhima, uttama, paṭhamā vibhattiyo bhavanti. ‘‘Uttamanti uttaraṃ antima’’nti cūḷamoggallāne vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3554: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṃtaṃsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3555: Kathaṃ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3556: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3557: Pubbachakke ca-ti, antidvayaṃ paṭhamadukaṃ nāma, si, thadvayaṃ majjhimadukaṃ nāma, mi, madvayaṃ uttamadukaṃ nāma. Evaṃ parachakke.
anya-e0201n0:3558: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṃ bhavati. Tathā tumhanāme majjhimadukaṃ, amhanāme uttamadukaṃ. Dukesu ca ekasmiṃ atthe vattabbe ekavacanaṃ, bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3559: Ettha ca nāmānaṃ atthanissitā katvattha, kammatthā idha nāmatthāti vuccanti. Kattu, kammasaṅkhāte yasmiṃ nāmatthe tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti, so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṃ eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti, na syādivibhattīnaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3560: Vuttakattu, kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṃ nāmapadaṃ abhidheyyapadaṃ nāma, etadeva tulyādhikaraṇapadanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n0:3561: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṃ okāsaṃ na labhanti, liṅgatthamattajotikā paṭhamāvibhatti eva okāsaṃ labhati. Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni sandhāya sutte ‘tumhamhasesesū’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3562: Idañca suttaṃ suddhehi tumha’mha, sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3563: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṃ dukāni vattanti. Yathā? So gacchati, te gacchanti, tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāmāti.
anya-e0201n0:3564: Tathā suddhadvandepi. Yathā? So ca so ca gacchati, gacchanti vā. Te ca te ca gacchanti, so ca te ca gacchanti, tvañca tvañca gacchasi, gacchatha vā. Tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchatha, tvañca tumhe ca gacchathāti.
anya-e0201n0:3565: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṃ labhanti, tesu ca bahuvacanāni eva. Yathā? So ca tvañca gacchatha, so ca ahañca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca ahañca gacchāma. Ekavacanacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3566: Te ca tumhe ca gacchatha, te ca mayañca gacchāma, tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3567: So ca tumhe ca gacchatha, so ca mayañca gacchāma, tvañca mayañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca mayañca gacchāma. Ekavacanamūlacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3568: Te ca tvañca gacchatha, te ca ahañca gacchāma, tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanamūlacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3569: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha, ahañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca so ca gacchāma, tumhe ca so ca gacchatha, mayañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca te ca gacchatha, ahañca te ca gacchāmaiccādīnipi catukkāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0201n0:3570: Atrimā pāḷī – tuvañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasetha jā. 1.8.7. Ahañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasema jā. 1.8.7.
anya-e0201n0:3571: Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāma ma. ni. 2.160.
anya-e0201n0:3572: Ahañca ime ca bhikkhū samādhinā nisīdimhā.
anya-e0201n0:3573: Ahañca bhariyā ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1593.
anya-e0201n0:3574: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3575: Yaṃ pana ‘‘so ca gacchati, tvañca gacchasī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘tumhe gacchathā’’ti vā ‘‘so ca gacchati, ahañca gacchāmī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘mayaṃ gacchāmā’’ti vā vacanaṃ, taṃ pakatibahuvacanameva, na paropurisabahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3576: Yañca kaccāyane – ‘‘sabbesamekābhidhāne paro puriso’’ti nī. 216 piṭṭhe suttaṃ, tatthapi sabbesaṃ dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā missakabhūtānaṃ nāma, tumha’mhānaṃ ekato abhidhāne missakadvandavākye paro puriso yojetabboti attho na na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0201n0:3578: Aparokkhesu māna, nta, tyādīsu paresu kriyatthā paraṃ kattari lānubandho apaccayo hoti. Lānubandho ‘ūlasse’ti sutte visesanattho.
anya-e0201n0:3579: Etena yattha māna, nta, tyādayo kattari vattanti, tattha ayaṃ lapaccayoti lapaccayena tesaṃ kattuvācakabhāvaṃ ñāpeti, esa nayo ‘‘kyo bhāvakammesu…’’ iccādīsupi.
anya-e0201n0:3580: Ettha ca vikaraṇapaccayā nāma byañjanapūraṇā eva honti, na atthapūraṇā, tasmā yasmiṃ payoge tehi vinā padarūpaṃ na sijjhati, tattheva te vattanti. Yattha sijjhati, tattha na vattanti, ayampi lapaccayo dhātuto paraṃ vibhattisare vā āgamasare vā asante vattati, sante pana ‘‘pacāmi, pacāma, pacāhi, gameti, gamenti, vajjeti, vajjenti’’-iccādīsu kāriyantaratthāya vattati. Yattha ca paccayānaṃ lopo vihito, tattha gaṇantara, rūpantarappasaṅgapaṭisiddhāya vattati, aññattha na vattati.
anya-e0201n0:3581: 565. Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye ka. 485; rū. 434; nī. 975; caṃ. 1.1.82; pā. 3.1.60.
anya-e0201n0:3582: Vibhatti, paccayā paccayo nāma. I, kī, khi, ci, ji iccādayo ivaṇṇā nāma. Cu, ju, bhū, hū iccādayo uvaṇṇā nāma. Paccaye pare ekakkharadhātvantānaṃ ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ kamena e, ovuddhiyo honti. ‘Paro kvacī’ti parasaralopo.
anya-e0201n0:3583: Saṃpubbo-sambhoti, sambhonti, sambhosi, sambhotha, sambhomi, sambhoma.
anya-e0201n0:3584: Anupubbo-anubhavane, so bhogaṃ anubhoti, te bhogaṃ anubhonti, tvaṃ bhogaṃ anubhosi, tumhe bhogaṃ anubhotha, ahaṃ bhogaṃ anubhomi, mayaṃ bhogaṃ anubhoma.
anya-e0201n0:3585: Tattha yathā ‘‘nīlo paṭo’’ti ettha nīlasaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:3588: Nīlasaddo pana vaccātthameva ujuṃ vadati, nīlasaddamattaṃ suṇanto nīlaguṇameva ujuṃ jānāti, tasmā ‘‘paṭo’’ iti padantarena nīlasaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati.
anya-e0201n0:3589: Tathā ‘‘anubhotī’’ti ettha tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:3592: Tisaddo pana vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ. ‘‘Anubhotī’’ti suṇantosādhyakriyāsahitaṃ kattārameva ujuṃ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti attho. Tasmā ‘‘so’’ iti padantarena tisaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati, vāccatthassa pana tisaddeneva ujuṃ vuttattā tatiyāvibhattiyā puna ācikkhitabbakiccaṃ natthi, liṅgatthajotanatthaṃ abhidheyyapade paṭhamāvibhatti eva pavattatīti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0201n0:3594: Sare pare e, onaṃ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n0:3597: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3599: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n0:3601: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṃsāyaṃ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3602: Vipubbo vināse, pākaṭe, sobhaṇe ca, vibhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3604: Abhi, saṃpubbo pattiyaṃ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3607: 568. Kyo bhāvakammesvaparokkhesu māna nta tyādīsu ka. 440; rū. 445; nī. 920; caṃ. 1.1.80; pā. 3.1.67.
anya-e0201n0:3608: Parokkhāvajjitesu māna, ntapaccayesu tyādīsu ca paresu kriyatthā bhāvasmiṃ kammani ca kānubandho yapaccayo hoti, bahulādhikārā kvaci kattari ca.
anya-e0201n0:3609: Rūpaṃ vibhuyyati, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249, bhattaṃ paccati, gimhe udakaṃ chijjati, kusūlo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n0:3611: Kānubandhe nāgame ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ assa ca te e, o,-ā na hontīti kyamhi vuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n0:3612: Kamme-tena purisena bhogo anubhūyati, tena bhogā anubhūyanti, tena tvaṃ anubhūyasi, tena tumhe anubhūyatha, tena ahaṃ anubhūyāmi, tena mayaṃ anubhūyāma. Yassa dvittaṃ rassattañca, anubhuyyati, anubhuyyanti.
anya-e0201n0:3613: Tattha ‘‘anubhūyatī’’ti ettha kyapaccayasahitassa tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n0:3616: Tisaddo pana kyapaccayasahito vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ. ‘‘Anubhūyatī’’ti suṇanto sādhyakriyāsahitaṃ kammasattiṃ eva ujuṃ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva.
anya-e0201n0:3617: Anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhūyante, anubhuyyante, anubhūyase, anubhūyavhe, anubhūye, anubhuyye, anubhūyamhe, anubhuyyamhe.
anya-e0201n0:3618: 570. Garupubbā rassā re ntentīnaṃ ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘guru…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3619: Garupubbamhā rassato nte, ntīnaṃ reādeso hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3620: Jāyare, jāyanti, jāyare, jāyante, gacchare, gacchanti, gacchare, gacchante, gamissare, gamissanti, gamissare, gamissante.
anya-e0201n0:3623: Ettha ca suttavibhāgena ‘‘sabbaṃ hidaṃ bhañjare kālapariyāyaṃ jā. 1.15.370, muñcare bandhanasmā jā. 2.22.1648, jīvare’ vāpi sussatī’’ti jā. 2.22.840 etāni pāḷipadāni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3624: Tattha ‘bhañjare’ti bhijjati, ‘muñcare’ti muñcantu, ‘jīvare’ vāpī’ti jīvanto’vāpi. Anubhūyare, anubhūyanti, anubhūyare, anubhūyante.
anya-e0201n0:3625: Bhāvo nāma bhavana, gamanādiko kriyākāro, so dhātunā eva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena visesīyati, na nāmapadena, tasmā tattha tumha’mha, sesanāmavasena tyādidukavisesayogo nāma natthi, paṭhamadukameva tattha bhavati, dabbasseva ca tassa abyattasarūpattā saṅkhyābhedopi natthi, ekavacanameva bhavati.
anya-e0201n0:3626: Tena bhogaṃ anubhūyati, anubhuyyati, anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhavanaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3629: 571. Payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ca ka. 438; rū. 540; nī. 914.
anya-e0201n0:3630: Yo suddhakattāraṃ payojeti, tassa payojakassa kattuno byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi ca ṇāpi ca honti. Ṇānubandhā vuddhutthā.
anya-e0201n0:3631: Tesu ca ākārantato ‘ato’ (moga.) ṇāpiyeva hoti, dāpeti, dāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:3633: Sesato dvepi, pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0201n0:3634: Payojakabyāpāropi kriyā evāti tadatthavācīhi ṇi,-ṇāpīhi paraṃ vibhatti, paccayā bhavanti, dhātvantassa ca ṇi, ṇāpīnañca vuddhi.
anya-e0201n0:3635: So maggaṃ bhāveti, te maggaṃ bhāventi, tvaṃ maggaṃ bhāvesi, tumhe maggaṃ bhāvetha, ahaṃ maggaṃ bhāvemi, mayaṃ maggaṃ bhāvema.
anya-e0201n0:3637: E, onaṃ kamena āya, āvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe paccaye pare, suttavibhattiyā aṇānubandhepi āyā’vā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3640: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3642: Ṇi, ṇāpi, āpīhi ca kattari lo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3644: Iminā asare ṭhāne ayādesato paraṃ akāro hoti, so maggaṃ bhāvayati, bhāvayanti, bhāvayasi, bhāvayatha, bhāvayāmi, bhāvayāma.
anya-e0201n0:3649: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa ādimhi īña hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3650: Tena maggo bhāvīyati, tena maggā bhāvīyanti, tena tvaṃ bhāvīyasi, tena tumhe bhāvīyatha, tena ahaṃ bhāvīyāmi, tena mayaṃ bhāvīyāma.
anya-e0201n0:3656: Ekakammā dvikammā ca, dvikammā ca tikammakā.
anya-e0201n0:3657: Iti suddhakatturūpaṃ, suddhakammarūpaṃ, hetukatturūpaṃ, hetukammarūpanti ekadhātumhi cattāri nipphannarūpāni labbhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3658: Katturūpena cettha kammakatturūpampi saṅgayhati. Kusūlo bhijjati, bhijjanadhammo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n0:3659: Kammarūpena ca kattukammarūpampi saṅgayhati. Tattha yaṃ padaṃ kattuvācakaṃ samānaṃ saddarūpena kammarūpaṃ bhavati, taṃ kattukammarūpaṃ nāma, taṃ pāḷiyaṃ bahulaṃ dissati.
anya-e0201n0:3660: Rūpaṃ vibhāviyyati mahāni. 108, atikkamiyyati, samatikkamiyyati, vītivattiyyati, nimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu paṭi. ma. 1.59, pavattaṃ abhibhuyyati paṭi. ma. 1.59, cutiṃ abhibhuyyati, upapattiṃ abhibhuyyatīti paṭi. ma. 1.59 gotrabhu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3661: Tathā so pahīyethāpi nopi pahīyetha saṃ. ni. 1.249, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249, nihiyyati yaso tassa dī. ni. 3.246, hiyyoti hiyyati poso, pareti parihāyati jā. 1.15.348, ājānīyā hasīyanti jā. 2.22.2369, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati jā. 2.22.1350 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3662: Yañca ‘yamhi dā dhā mā thā hā pā maha mathādīnamī’ti kaccāyane suttaṃ, taṃ kammani icchanti, kattari eva yujjati kammani ivaṇṇāgamassa sabbhāvā. Saddanītiyaṃ pana ‘‘so pahīyissatī’’ti padānaṃ bhāvarūpattaṃ daḷhaṃ vadati, tāni pana kattukammarūpāni evāti.
anya-e0201n0:3663: Ettha ca vattamānaṃ catubbidhaṃ niccapavattaṃ, pavattāvirataṃ, pavattuparataṃ, samīpavattamānanti.
anya-e0201n0:3664: Tattha niccapavatte – idhāyaṃ pabbato tiṭṭhati, candimasūriyā pariyāyanti, disā bhanti virocamānā a. ni. 4.69.
anya-e0201n0:3665: Pavattāvirate – api nu te gahapati kule dānaṃ dīyatīti, dīyati me bhante kule dānaṃ a. ni. 9.20.
anya-e0201n0:3666: Ettha ca yāva dāne saussāho, tāva yathāpavattā dānakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti ussāhassa aviratattā.
anya-e0201n0:3667: Pavattuparate – na khādati ayaṃ maṃsaṃ, neva pāṇaṃ hanati a. ni. 3.67, na adinnaṃ ādiyati a. ni. 3.67. Ettha yāva tabbipakkhakriyaṃ na karoti, tāva viramaṇakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3668: Samīpe – atīte – kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi saṃ. ni. 1.130, rājagahato āgacchāmīti. Anāgate – dhammaṃ te desemi, sādhukaṃ suṇohi.
anya-e0201n0:3669: Suttavibhattena tadāyoge atītepi ayaṃ vibhatti hoti, vākacīrāni dhunanto, gacchāmi ambare tadā bu. vaṃ. 2.37.
anya-e0201n0:3670: Yāva, pure, purāyoge anāgatepi-idheva tāva tiṭṭhāhi, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā, pure adhammo dibbati, dhammo paṭibāhiyyati cūḷava. 437, dante ime chinda purā marāmi jā. 1.16.127.
anya-e0201n0:3671: Ekaṃsatthepi-nirayaṃ nūnagacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṃsayo jā. 2.22.331. Avassambhāviyatthepi-dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ bu. vaṃ. 2.109, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissati bu. vaṃ. 2.81 vā.
anya-e0201n0:3672: Aniyamatthepi-manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā dha. pa. 2 cintetīti cittaṃ dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, phusatīti phasso dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, bujjhatīti buddho.
anya-e0201n0:3673: Kadā karahiyogepi-kadā gacchati, karahi gacchati, gamissati vā.
anya-e0201n0:3677: 575. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ su vho e āmase ka. 424; rū. 450; nī. 897; caṃ. 1.3.122; pā. 3.3.162.
anya-e0201n0:3678: Vattamāne kāle pañha, patthanā, vidhīsu kriyatthā tvādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3679: Pañhe-dhammaṃ vā tvaṃ adhiyassu vinayaṃ vā pāci. 471 (atthato sadisaṃ).
anya-e0201n0:3681: Tattha patthanāyaṃ-bhavābhave saṃsaranto, saddho homi amaccharī.
anya-e0201n0:3682: Āsīsāyaṃ-etena saccavajjena, pajjunno abhivassatu cariyā. 3.89, sabbe bhadrāni passantu jā. 1.2.105, sabbe sattā averā hontu paṭi. ma. 2.22.
anya-e0201n0:3684: Āyācane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ dī. ni. 2.68, ovadatu maṃ bhagavā saṃ. ni. 3.1, anusāsatu maṃ sugata saṃ. ni. 3.1, ullumpatu maṃ bhante saṅgho mahāva. 71, asmākaṃ adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181, etha byagghā nivattavho jā. 1.3.66.
anya-e0201n0:3686: Tattha vidhimhi-akusalaṃ pajahatha, kusalaṃ upasampajja viharatha paṭi. ma. 3.30; pārā. 19, evaṃ vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakketha paṭi. ma. 3.30.
anya-e0201n0:3687: Niyojane-etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha a. ni. 5.114, appamādena sampādetha dī. ni. 2.185, etha gaṇhatha bandhatha dī. ni. 2.342, mā vo muñcittha kiñcanaṃ dī. ni. 2.342.
anya-e0201n0:3691: Pavāraṇāyaṃ-vadatu maṃ bhante saṅgho mahāva. aṭṭha. 213, vadetha bhante yenattho pārā. 290.
anya-e0201n0:3692: Anumatiyaṃ-paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohi pāci. 374.
anya-e0201n0:3693: Varadāne-phussatī varavaṇṇābhe, varassu dasadhā vare jā. 2.22.1655, icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, khippameva samijjhatu a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.192.
anya-e0201n0:3694: Anuññāyaṃ-puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi dī. ni. 2.356.
anya-e0201n0:3697: Akkose-muddhā te phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.16.295, corā taṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindantu ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.
anya-e0201n0:3698: Sapathe-etena saccavajjena, putto uppajjataṃ ise jā. 1.14.104, musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.14.104.
anya-e0201n0:3699: Āmantane-etu vessantaro rājā jā. 2.22.2341, ‘‘ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṃ mahāva. 28, etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha’’ iccādīsupi ehi, ethasaddā āmantane tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3700: Nimantane-adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ pārā. 77.
anya-e0201n0:3701: Pavedane-vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu dī. ni. 1.299, punārāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisa dī. ni. 2.369.
anya-e0201n0:3702: Pattakāle-parinibbātu bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo bhante bhagavato dī. ni. 2.168, kālo kho te mahāvīra, uppajja mātukucchiyaṃ bu. vaṃ. 1.67, byākarohi aggivessana na dāni te tuṇhībhāvassa kālo ma. ni. 1.357.
anya-e0201n0:3703: Anubhotu, anubhontu, anubhohi, anubhotha, anubhomi, anubhoma, bhavatu, bhavantu, ‘himimesvassā’ti hi, mi, mesu assa dīgho, tvaṃ paṇḍito bhavāhi.
anya-e0201n0:3707: Iminā ato hissa lopo, tvaṃ paṇḍito bhava.
anya-e0201n0:3709: Parachakke-so bhavataṃ, te bhavantaṃ, tvaṃ bhavassu, tumhe bhavavho, ahaṃ bhave, mayaṃ bhavāmase, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3710: Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu, anubhuyyatu, anubhuyyantu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3711: Bhāvetu, bhāventu, bhāvayatu, bhāvayantu iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3712: Bhāvīyatu, bhāvīyantu. Rassatte-bhāviyatu, bhāviyantu. Dvitte-bhāviyyatu, bhāviyyantu. Tathā bhāvayīyatu, bhāvayīyantuiccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3713: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena thassa vho, tumhe bhavavho, bhavatha vā.
anya-e0201n0:3717: 577. Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyāvho eyyavho (moggallānādīsu) eyyaṃ eyyāmhe vā ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 880; caṃ. 1.3.120; pā. 3.3.156.
anya-e0201n0:3718: Aññamaññasambandhiniyā hetukriyāyañca phalakriyāyañca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā. Hetuphalesupi kadāci aññavibhattuppattidīpanattho vāsaddo, sace so yānaṃ labhissati, gamissati, sace na labhissati, na gamissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3719: Sace saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya, sukho nāma bhaveyya, sace so paṇḍito bhaveyya, sukhito bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:3722: Pañhe-kinnu kho tvaṃ vinayaṃ vā adhiyyeyyāsi dhammaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:3724: Vidhimhi-pāṇaṃ na haneyya, adinnaṃ na ādiyeyya, dānaṃ dadeyya, sīlaṃ rakkheyya.
anya-e0201n0:3725: 579. Sattārahesveyyādī ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 881-4; caṃ. 1.3.128; pā. 3.3.169-172; satyarahesveyyādī (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3727: Bhavaṃ rajjaṃ kareyya, bhavaṃ rajjaṃ kātuṃ sakko, kātuṃ arahoti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3728: So imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.23.
anya-e0201n0:3731: Pabbatamapi sirasā bhindeyya, bhaveyya, bhaveyyuṃ, bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha, bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0201n0:3732: Parachakke-so bhavetha, te bhaveraṃ, tvaṃ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho, ahaṃ bhaveyyaṃ, mayaṃ bhaveyyāmhe, iti suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3733: Anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṃ. Dvitte rassattaṃ, anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyeyyuṃ iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3734: Bhāveyya, bhāveyyuṃ, bhāvayeyya, bhāvayeyyuṃ iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3735: Bhāvīyeyya, bhāvīyeyyuṃ. Rassatte-bhāvayiyeyya, bhāvayiyeyyuṃ. Dvitte-bhāviyyeyya, bhāviyyeyyuṃ. Tathā bhāvayīyeyya, bhāvayīyeyyuṃ iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3737: Eyya, eyyāsi, eyyamiccetesaṃ ṭe hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3738: Atrimā pāḷī-caje mattā sukhaṃ dhīro, passe ce vipulaṃ sukhaṃ dha. pa. 290. Kiṃ tvaṃ sutasomā’nutappe jā. 2.21.399, dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase jā. 1.13.94 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3739: So bhave, bhaveyya, tvaṃ bhave, bhaveyyāsi, ahaṃ bhave, bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3742: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, upayānāni me dajjuṃ, rājaputta tayī gateti jā. 2.22.26.
anya-e0201n0:3744: Eyyāmassa emu ca hoti, antassa u ca.
anya-e0201n0:3745: Atrimā pāḷī-kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ dī. ni. 2.318, muñcemu naṃ uragaṃ bandhanasmā jā. 1.15.252, dakkhemu te nāga nivesanāni jā. 1.15.254, gantvāna taṃ paṭikaremu accayaṃ, appeva naṃ putta labhemu jīvitaṃ jā. 1.15.13, dajjemu kho pañcasatāni bhoto jā. 2.22.1302, pañhaṃ pucchemu mārisa dī. ni. 2.354, viharemu averino dī. ni. 2.357, tayājja guttā viharemu rattinti jā. 1.2.18. Bhaveyyāmu, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0201n0:3746: Mahāvuttinā kvaci majjhe yyā-kārassa lopo, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi jā. 1.16.150, uregaṇḍāyo bujjhesi, tāyo bujjhesi māṇava jā. 2.17.132-133, yathā gatiṃ me abhisambhavetha jā. 2.17.87-89, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavema jā. 2.17.87-89, okāsaṃ sampajānātha, vane yattha vasemaseti jā. 2.22.1885 ‘vasāmase’.
anya-e0201n0:3747: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena eyyāthassa o ca, tumhe bhaveyyātho, bhaveyyātha vā.
anya-e0201n0:3748: Ettha ca pubbe vuttā pañha, patthanā, vidhippabhedā idhapi yathāpayogaṃ veditabbā. Pañhasaddena paripañha, paripucchā, parivitakka, parivīmaṃsādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3749: Paripañhe-dhammaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyeyyāma vinayaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:3750: Paripucchāyaṃ-vadetha bhante kimahaṃ kareyyaṃ, ko imassa attho, kathañcassa atthaṃ ahaṃ jāneyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3751: Parivitakke-kassāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ dī. ni. 2.72, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā.
anya-e0201n0:3752: Parivīmaṃsāyaṃ-gaccheyyaṃ vā ahaṃ uposathaṃ, na vāgaccheyyaṃ mahāva. 137.
anya-e0201n0:3753: Patthanāyaṃ-evaṃrūpo siyaṃ ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ ma. ni. 3.274, ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siyaṃ jā. 2.18.70, passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ jā. 2.21.453.
anya-e0201n0:3754: Āyācane-labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ mahāva. 28; saṃ. ni. 2.17.
anya-e0201n0:3756: Niyojane-careyyādittasīsova, natthi maccussa nā gamo saṃ. ni. 1.145.
anya-e0201n0:3757: Ajjhesane-yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyya mahāva. 132, yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya mahāva. 70.
anya-e0201n0:3759: Anumatiyaṃ-taṃ jano hareyya vā daheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya ma. ni. 1.247.
anya-e0201n0:3761: Āmantane-yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya jā. 2.22.635.
anya-e0201n0:3763: Pattakāle-saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya mahāva. 167.
anya-e0201n0:3764: ‘Sambhāvane vā’ti vāsaddo avuttavikappanattho, tena parikappa, kriyātipannādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3766: Tattha bhūtaparikappe-yo bālaṃ seveyya, sopi bālo bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n0:3767: Abhūtaparikappe-yadā kacchapalomānaṃ, pāvāro tividho siyā jā. 1.8.78. Yadā sasavisāṇānaṃ, nisseṇī sukatā siyā jā. 1.8.79.
anya-e0201n0:3768: Kriyātipanne-sace so agāraṃ ajjhāvaseyya, rājā assa cakkavattī dī. ni. 3.136.
anya-e0201n0:3772: 584. Anajjattane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṃ se vhaṃ iṃ mhase ka. 418; rū. 456; nī. 886; caṃ. 1.2.77; pā. 3.2.111.
anya-e0201n0:3773: Ajjato aññasmiṃ bhūte kāle kriyatthā paraṃ āiccādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3774: 585. Ā ī ssādīsvaña vā ka. 519; rū. 457; nī. 1032.
anya-e0201n0:3775: Āiccādīsu īiccādīsu ssādīsu ca tesaṃ ādimhi aña hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3776: So abhavā, bhavā, te abhavū, bhavū, tvaṃ abhavo, bhavo, tumhe abhavattha, bhavattha, ahaṃ abhava, bhava, mayaṃ abhavamhā, bhavamhā.
anya-e0201n0:3777: Parachakke-abhavattha, bhavattha, abhavatthuṃ, bhavatthuṃ, abhavase, bhavase, abhavavhaṃ, bhavavhaṃ, abhaviṃ, bhaviṃ, abhavamhase, bhavamhase.
anya-e0201n0:3778: 586. Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssāmhānaṃ vā ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:3780: So abhava, te abhavu, mayaṃ abhavamha.
anya-e0201n0:3781: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā āssa tthattaṃ, assa ca aṃ, so abhavattha, bhavattha, abhavā, bhavā vā, ahaṃ abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ, abhava, bhava vā, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3782: Ettha ca mahāvuttinā ā-vibhattiyā thādeso bahulaṃ dissati, medanī sampakampatha jā. 2.22.1672, visaññī samapajjatha jā. 2.22.328, imā gāthā abhāsatha jā. 2.22.328, tuccho kāyo adissatha theragā. 172, nibbidā samatiṭṭhatha theragā. 273, eko rahasi jhāyatha jā. 1.15.286 iccādi. Tathā o-vibhattiyā ca, dubbheyyaṃ maṃ amaññatha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3786: 587. Bhūte ī uṃ o ttha iṃ mhā ā ū se vhaṃ aṃ mhe ka. 419; rū. 469; nī. 887.
anya-e0201n0:3787: Abhavīti bhūto, atītoti attho, bhūte kāle kriyatthā paraṃ īiccādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3788: 588. A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu ka. 516; rū. 466; nī. 1030; caṃ. 1.2.76; pā. 3.2.110 aīssaādīnaṃ byañjanassiu (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3789: Aādissa īādissa ssāādissa ssatiādissa ca byañjanassa ādimhi iu hoti. ‘Byañjanassā’ti etena aādimhi pañca, īādimhi sattāti dvādasa suddhasaravibhattiyo paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0201n0:3791: So abhavī, bhavī, te abhavuṃ, bhavuṃ, tvaṃ abhavo, bhavo, tumhe abhavittha, bhavittha, ahaṃ abhaviṃ, bhaviṃ, mayaṃ abhavimhā, bhavimhā, so abhavā, bhavā, te abhavū, bhavū, tvaṃ abhavise, bhavise, tumhe abhavivhaṃ, bhavivhaṃ, ahaṃ abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ, mayaṃ abhavimhe, bhavimhe.
anya-e0201n0:3792: ‘Āīū’iccādinā ī, mhā, ā, ūnaṃ rassatte-so abhavi, bhavi, mayaṃ abhavimha, bhavimha, so abhava, bhava, te abhavu, bhavu.
anya-e0201n0:3793: 589. Eyyāthasseaāīthānaṃ o a aṃ ttha ttho vho vā ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘…vhoka’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3795: Tumhe gaccheyyātho, gaccheyyātha vā, tvaṃ agacchissa, agacchisse vā, ahaṃ agamaṃ, gamaṃ, agama, gama vā, so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā vā, so agamittho, gamittho, agamī, gamī vā, tumhe gacchavho, gacchatha vāti.
anya-e0201n0:3796: Iminā ī, ā, avacanānaṃ ttho, ttha, aṃādesā honti, so abhavittho, bhavittho, so abhavittha, bhavittha, ahaṃ abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3797: Atrimā pāḷī – īmhi-paṅko ca mā visiyittho jā. 1.13.44, sañjagghittho mayā saha jā. 1.16.241. Āmhi-anumodittha vāsavo jā. 2.22.1667, nimantayittha vāsavo jā. 2.22.1667, khubbhittha nagaraṃ tadā jā. 2.22.1673, subhūtitthero gāthaṃ abhāsittha theragā. 1. Amhi-idhāhaṃ mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.119, ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ jānāmīti pārā. 195, ahaṃ kāmānaṃ vasamanvagaṃ jā. 2.19.45, ajjhagaṃ amataṃ santiṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3800: Agamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, agamuṃ. Iminā uṃssa iṃsu, abhaviṃsu, bhaviṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3801: 591. Ossa a i ttha ttho ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:3803: Tvaṃ abhava, tvaṃ abhavi, tvaṃ abhavittha, tvaṃ abhavittho.
anya-e0201n0:3804: Atrimā pāḷī-ossa atte-mā hevaṃ ānanda avaca dī. ni. 2.95, tvameva dāni’makara, yaṃ kāmo byagamā tayi jā. 1.2.167. Itte-mā tvaṃ bhāyi mahārāja, mā tvaṃ bhāyi rathesabha jā. 2.22.684, mā cintesi mā tvaṃ soci, yācāmi luddakaṃ ahaṃ gavesitabbaṃ. Tthattemāssu tiṇṇo amaññittha jā. 2.22.255, mā kilittha mayā vinā jā. 2.22.1713, māssu kujjhittha nāvika jā. 1.6.5. Tthotte-mā purāṇe amaññittho theragā. 280, mā dayhittho punappunaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.212, tiṇamatte asajjittho jā. 1.1.89, mā tvaṃ brahmuno vacanaṃ upātivattittho ma. ni. 1.502, mā tvaṃ maññittho na maṃ jānātī ma. ni. 1.502 ti.
anya-e0201n0:3806: Suttavibhattena tthassa ttho hoti, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, yāvantettha samāgatā apa. thera 1.1.367, massu mittānaṃ dubbhittho. Mittadubbho hi pāpakoti jā. 1.16.222.
anya-e0201n0:3807: Mahāvuttinā ossa kvaci lopo, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ jā. 2.22.1786, mā no tvaṃ tāta adadā jā. 2.22.2126, mā bhoti kupitā ahu jā. 2.22.1931, māhu pacchānutāpinī saṃ. ni. 1.162; therīgā. 57.
anya-e0201n0:3813: Assosumhā, ahesumhā, avocumhā, avocuttha iccādīni dissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3814: Tumhe abhavuttha, bhavuttha, abhavittha, bhavittha vā, mayaṃ abhavumhā, bhavumhā, abhavimhā, bhavimhā vā.
anya-e0201n0:3815: 594. Iṃssa ca suu ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘‘…siu’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3816: Imiccassa mhā, tthānañca ādimhi suu hoti, sāgamo hotīti attho. Casaddena īādīnampi ādimhi sāgamo hoti, sāgame ca sati byañjanaṃ hoti, tassa ādimhi iāgamo labbhati. Tena ‘‘imā gāthā abhāsisuṃ gavesitabbaṃ, te me asse ayācisuṃ, yathābhūtaṃ vipassisuṃ’’ jā. 2.22.1863 iccādīni dī. ni. 3.277 sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3817: So bhogaṃ anubhosi, anubhavi vā, tumhe anubhosittha, anubhavittha vā, ahaṃ anubhosi, anubhaviṃ vā. Mayaṃ anubhosimhā anubhavimhā vā.
anya-e0201n0:3818: 595. Eontā suṃ ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘eottā suṃ’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3819: Edantato odantato ca parassa uṃvacanassa suṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3820: Ānesuṃ, sāyesuṃ, cintesuṃ, paccanubhosuṃ, paribhosuṃ, adhibhosuṃ, abhibhosuṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3821: Suttavibhattena ādantatopi ca, vihāsuṃ viharanti ca saṃ. ni. 1.173, te anubhosuṃ, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3825: Tena bhogā anvabhūyuṃ, anubhūyuṃ, anvabhūyiṃsu, anubhūyiṃsu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3826: So maggaṃ abhāvi, bhāvi, abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, te maggaṃ abhāviṃsu, bhāviṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3827: ‘Eontāsu’nti edantamhā suṃ. Te maggaṃ abhāvesuṃ, bhāvesuṃ, abhāvayiṃsu, bhāvayiṃsu, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvaya, bhāvaya, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvittha, bhāvittha, abhāvayittha, bhāvayittha, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvayittho, bhāvayittho, tvaṃ maggaṃ abhāvesi, bhāvesi, tumhe maggaṃ abhāvittha, bhāvittha, abhāvayittha, bhāvayittha, ahaṃ maggaṃ abhāviṃ, bhāviṃ, abhāvesiṃ, bhāvesiṃ, abhāvayiṃ, bhāvayiṃ, mayaṃ maggaṃ abhāvimhā, bhāvimhā, abhāvimha, bhāvimha, abhāvayimhā, bhāvayimhā, abhāvayimha, bhāvayimha.
anya-e0201n0:3828: So maggaṃ abhāvā, bhāvā, abhāvittha, bhāvittha, abhāvayittha, bhāvayittha iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3829: Tena maggo abhāviyi, bhāviyi, tena maggā abhāviyiṃsu, bhāviyiṃsu iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3833: 596. Parokkhe a u e tha aṃ mha ttha re ttho vho iṃ mhe ka. 417; rū. 460; nī. 887; caṃ. 1.2.81; pā. 3.2.115.
anya-e0201n0:3834: Akkhānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraṃ parokkhaṃ, apaccakkhanti attho. Bhūte kāle attano parokkhakriyāya vattabbāya kriyatthā aādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3835: Mahāvuttinā gassa dīgho vā, so kira jagāma, te kira jagāmu, tvaṃ kira jagāme, tumhe kira jagāmittha, ahaṃ kira jagāmaṃ, mayaṃ kira jagāmimha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3836: Ettha ca ‘so kira jagāma’ iccādīni anussavaparokkhāni nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3837: ‘Ahaṃ kira jagāmaṃ, mayaṃ kira jagāmimhā’ti idaṃ attanā gantvāpi gamanaṃ pamuṭṭhassa vā asampaṭicchitukāmassa vā paṭivacanaparokkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:3838: 597. Parokkhāyañca ka. 458; rū. 461; nī. 939; caṃ. 5.1.3; pā. 6.1.2.
anya-e0201n0:3839: Parokkhamhi pubbakkharaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hoti, casaddena aññasmimpi dvedverūpaṃ sijjhati.
anya-e0201n0:3840: Caṅkamati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, juhoti, lolupo, momūho.
anya-e0201n0:3842: Dvitte pubbesaṃ dutiya, catutthānaṃ kamena paṭhama, tatiyā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3844: Dvitte pubbassa bhūssa anto a hoti.
anya-e0201n0:3846: Dvitte bhūdhātussa ante vuka hoti, vāgamo hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:3848: So kira rājā babhūva, te kira rājāno babhūvu, tvaṃ babhūve.
anya-e0201n0:3849: ‘A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti suttena byañjanādimhi iāgamo, tumhe babhūvittha, ahaṃ babhūvaṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimha, so babhūvittha, te babhūvire, tvaṃ babhūvittho, tumhe babhūvivho, ahaṃ babhūviṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimhe, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n0:3850: ‘Kyo bhāvakammesvaparokkhesū’ti paṭisiddhattā parokkhamhi bhāvakammesu yapaccayo na hoti, ‘tena kira bhogo anubabhūvittha, tena bhogo anubabhūvire’tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3854: 601. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃ ssāmhe ka. 421; rū. 473; nī. 892; caṃ. 1.3.2; pā. 3.3.13.
anya-e0201n0:3855: Bhavissatīti bhavissanto, anāgatakālo, tasmiṃ bhavissati kāle kriyatthassa tyādayo honti.
anya-e0201n0:3856: 602. Nāme garahāvimhayesu ka. 421; rū. 473; nī. 893; caṃ. 1.3.109, 115; pā. 3.3.143, 150.
anya-e0201n0:3857: Nipātanāmayoge garahāyañca vimhaye ca ssatyādayo honti, atītakālepi ssatyādīnaṃ uppattidīpanatthamidaṃ suttaṃ, anutthunana, paccānutāpa, paccānumodanādīnipi ettha saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:3858: Tattha garahāyaṃ-atthi nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi pārā. 32.
anya-e0201n0:3859: Vimhaye-yatra hi nāma saññī samāno pañcamattānaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ saddaṃ na sossati dī. ni. 2.192.
anya-e0201n0:3860: Anutthunanādīsu-na attanā paṭicodessaṃ, na gaṇassa ārocessaṃ pāci. 665, na pubbe dhanamesissaṃ jā. 1.12.50, iti pacchānutappati jā. 1.12.53, bhūtānaṃ nāpacāyissaṃ, pahu santo na posissaṃ, paradāraṃ asevissaṃ jā. 1.12.54, na pubbe payirupāsissaṃ jā. 1.12.58, iti pacchānutappati jā. 1.12.50, anekajātisaṃsāraṃ, sandhāvissaṃ anibbisaṃ dha. pa. 153.
anya-e0201n0:3861: Katthaci pana gāthāvasena ekasakāralopo, mitto mittassa pāniyaṃ, adinnaṃ paribhuñjisaṃ jā. 1.11.59, nirayamhi apaccisaṃ therīgā. 438, gacchanto naṃ udakkhisaṃ gavesitabbaṃ, yoniso paccavekkhisaṃ theragā. 347 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3862: ‘A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti iāgamo, bhavissati, bhavissanti, bhavissare, bhavissasi, bhavissatha, bhavissāmi, bhavissāma, bhavissate, bhavissante, bhavissare, bhavissase, bhavissavhe, bhavissaṃ, bhavissāmhe.
anya-e0201n0:3866: Kyassa lopo hoti vā ssakāravati vibhattimhi.
anya-e0201n0:3867: Tena maggo gamissati, gamīyissati vā, tena maggo agamissā, agamīyissā vāti vikappena kyassa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:3868: Tena bhogo anubhavissati, anubhūyissati vā, tena bhogā anubhavissanti, anubhūyissanti vā iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3869: Bhāvissati, ‘ūlasse’ti issa e, bhāvessati, bhāvayissatiiccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3870: Tena maggo bhāvīyissati, maggā bhāvīyissanti iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3874: 604. Eyyādotipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṃsu ssase ssavhe ssiṃ ssāmhase ka. 422; rū. 475; nī. 895; caṃ. 1.3.107; pā. 3.3.139; eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:3875: Eyyādivisaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo bhavanti. Eyyādivisayo nāma hetuphalakriyāsambhavo, tadubhayakriyāya abhāvo kriyātipatti.
anya-e0201n0:3876: Sā duvidhā atītā ca anāgatā ca.
anya-e0201n0:3877: Tattha atītāyaṃ-sace so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissā, arahā abhavissā ‘sace pana nikkhamitvā pabbajissa, arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa’ (dhammapada aṭṭha. 1) iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3878: Anāgatāyaṃ-sacāhaṃ na gamissaṃ, mahājāniyo so abhavissā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3879: ‘Āīssādīsvaña vā’iti dhātvādimhi vikappena akārāgamo,‘a īssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti ssādīsu iāgamo, abhavissā, bhavissā, abhavissaṃsu, bhavissaṃsu, abhavisse, bhavisse, abhavissatha, bhavissatha, abhavissaṃ, bhavissaṃ, abhavissāmhā, bhavissāmhā, abhavissatha, bhavissatha, abhavissiṃsu, bhavissiṃsu, abhavissase, bhavissase, abhavissavhe, bhavissavhe, abhavissiṃ, bhavissiṃ, abhavissāmhase, bhavissāmhase.
anya-e0201n0:3880: ‘Āīū’iccādinā ssā, ssāmhānaṃ rassatte-so abhavissa, bhavissa, mayaṃ abhavissāmha, bhavissāmha. ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā ssessa atte-tvaṃ abhavissa, bhavissa iccādīni rūpacatukkāni yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0201n0:3887: Ito paṭṭhāya sarantadhātuyo sarānukkamena, byañjanantadhātuyo akkharānukkamena vuccante.
anya-e0201n0:3888: Kaccāyanaganthe anekassaradhātuyo idha byañjanantadhātuyo nāma. Tasmā idha dhātvantasaralopakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0201n0:3889: Khā, khyā-kathane, gā-sadde, ghā-gandhopādāne, ñā-paññāyane avabodhane ca, ṭhā-gatinivattiyaṃ, tā-pālane, thā-ṭhāne, dā-dāne, dhā-dhāraṇe, pā-pāne, phā-vuddhiyaṃ, bhā-dittiyaṃ, mā-māne, yā-gatiyaṃ, lā-ādāne chedane ca, vā-gati, bandha, gandhanesu, sā-assādane tanukaraṇe antakammani ca, hā-cāge, nhā-soceyye.
anya-e0201n0:3890: Tyādyuppatti, kattarilo, mahāvuttinā sare pare ādantamhā kvaci yāgamo, akkhāti. Parassaralopo, akkhāyati, kriyaṃ ākhyāti, ākhyāyati, jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito su. ni. 423, saṅgāyati, saṅgāyiṃsu mahesayo vi. va. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā, gandhaṃ ghāyati, paññāyati, paññāyanti, paññāyatu, paññāyantu.
anya-e0201n0:3891: Kamme kyo, dhammo ñāyati, dhammā ñāyanti, viññāyati, viññāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:3893: Kamme-ñāpīyati, ñāpīyanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti, opupphā padmā ṭhānti, mālāva ganthitā ṭhānti, dhajaggāneva dissare jā. 2.22.1989.
anya-e0201n0:3895: Ñānubandhassa īāgamassa ca kattari vihitassa lapaccayassa ca kvaci ettaṃ hotīti lassa ettaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3898: Ṭhā, pānaṃ tiṭṭha, pivā honti nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:3900: 607. Pādito ṭhāssa vā ṭhaho kvaci ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:3901: Pādayo upasaggā pādi nāma, pādito parassa ṭhāssa ṭhaho hoti vā kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:3902: Saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti, saṇṭhāti, saṇṭhānti, upaṭṭhahati, upaṭṭhahanti, upaṭṭhāti, upaṭṭhānti.
anya-e0201n0:3905: Ñādito aññassa ākārantakriyatthassa i hoti kye paramhi.
anya-e0201n0:3907: Aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, ñāyanti, ākkhāyati, ākkhāyanti, ākhyāyati, ākhyāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:3909: Ajjhattanimhi vikappena sāgamo, aṭṭhāsi, patiṭṭhāsi, adhiṭṭhahi, adhiṭṭhāsi, adhiṭṭhesi, saṇṭhahi, saṇṭhāsi, upaṭṭhahi, upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0201n0:3910: ‘Uṃssiṃsvaṃsū’ti uṃssa iṃsu, aṃsu, adhiṭṭhahiṃsu, saṇṭhahiṃsu, upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Atthamentamhi sūriye, vāḷā panthe upaṭṭhahuṃ jā. 2.22.2186. Aṭṭhaṃsu, upaṭṭhahaṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3914: ‘Eontāsu’nti uṃssasuṃ, saralopo, aṭṭhāsuṃ, upaṭṭhāsuṃ, patiṭṭhāpesuṃ, saṇṭhāpesuṃ, patiṭṭhāpayuṃ, saṇṭhāpayuṃ, patiṭṭhāpayiṃsu, saṇṭhāpayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3915: Ssatyādimhi-ṭhassati, ṭhassanti, rassattaṃ, upaṭṭhissati, upaṭṭhissanti, ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ jā. 2.22.1934, saṇṭhahissati, saṇṭhahissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3918: Thā-ṭhāne, avatthāti, avatthāyati, vitthāyati, vitthāyanti, mā kho vitthāsi mahāva. 126.
anya-e0201n0:3919: Dā-dāne, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṃ, deti, denti, desi, detha, demi, dema.
anya-e0201n0:3920: ‘Parokkhāyañcā’ti sutte casaddena dāssa dvittaṃ. ‘Rasso pubbassā’ti pubbassa rassattaṃ, dadāti, dadanti, dadāsi, dadātha, dadāmi, dadāma.
anya-e0201n0:3921: 609. Dāssa daṃ vā mimesvadvitte ka. 482; rū. 508; nī. 972.
anya-e0201n0:3922: Advitte dāssa daṃ hoti vā mi, mesu, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:3926: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅa hoti kvaci.
anya-e0201n0:3927: ‘Iyaṅa’ iti suttavibhattena aññadhātūnampi. Jā-hāniyaṃ, appena bahuṃ jiyyāma jā. 1.2.52, tassevā’nuvidhiyyati jā. 1.2.67, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati jā. 2.22.1350, nihīyati tassa yaso jā. 1.10.60; a. ni. 4.17, eko rājā vihiyyasi jā. 2.22.1750, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:3928: Ādiyati, ādiyanti, upādiyati, upādiyanti, samādiyati, samādiyanti, sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmi khu. pā. 2.1, vattaṃ samādiyāmi cūḷava. 85.
anya-e0201n0:3929: 611. Gama vada dānaṃ ghamma vajja dajjā ka. 499-500-1; rū. 443-486-507; nī. 1013, 1005-1006.
anya-e0201n0:3930: Etesaṃ ghamma, vajja, dajjā honti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n0:3931: Dajjati, dajjanti, dajjasi, dajjatha, dajjāmi, dajjāma.
anya-e0201n0:3933: Kamme ‘aññādissi kye’ti kyamhi āssa ittaṃ, diyati, diyanti.
anya-e0201n0:3937: Pādipubbe rasso, samādapeti ma. ni. 2.387; 3.276, samādapenti, samādapayati, samādapayanti.
anya-e0201n0:3939: Eyyādimhi mahāvuttinā dajjato eyyādīnaṃ antassa eyyassa lopo vā, dānaṃ dajjā, dadeyya, dajjuṃ, dadeyyuṃ, dajjāsi, dadeyyāsi, dajjātha, dadeyyātha, dajjāmi, dadeyyāmi, dajjāma, dadeyyāma, ahaṃ dajjaṃ, dadeyyaṃ, mayaṃ dajjāmhe, dadeyyāmhe.
anya-e0201n0:3940: Atrimā pāḷī-dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ jā. 2.22.2261, upāyanāni me dajjuṃ jā. 2.22.24, mātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino jā 1.16.227. Tāni ammāya dajjesi jā. 2.22.2149, chaṭṭhāhaṃ dajjamattānaṃ, neva dajjaṃ mahosadhaṃ jā. 1.16.225.
anya-e0201n0:3941: Ajjhattanimhi-adadi, adāsi, adaduṃ, adaṃsu, adajji, adajjuṃ, tvaṃ adado. Varañce me ado sakka jā. 2.17.142.
anya-e0201n0:3942: Parachakke-so dānaṃ adā, brāhmaṇassa adā dānaṃ, sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhano jā. 2.22.2117.
anya-e0201n0:3943: Ssatyādimhi-dāssati, dāssanti, dadissati, dadissanti, dajjissati, dajjissanti.
anya-e0201n0:3944: Dāiccassa diccha, pavecchādesampi icchanti, vipulaṃ annaṃ pānañca, samaṇānaṃ pavecchasi therīgā. 272. Appasmeke pavecchanti, bahuneke na dicchare saṃ. ni. 1.33. Devo sammā dhāraṃ pavecchatu. Bhojanaṃ bhojanatthīnaṃ, sammadeva pavecchatha.
anya-e0201n0:3945: Dhā-dhāraṇe, sandhāti, vidhāti, nidheti, nidhenti. Vidheti, vidhenti.
anya-e0201n0:3946: ‘Parokkhāyañcā’ti casaddena dvittaṃ. ‘Dutiyacatutthāna…’nti dhassa dattaṃ. ‘Rasso pubbassā’ti pubbassa rasso.
anya-e0201n0:3949: Saddahāti, saddahati vā. Saddahāti tathāgatassa bodhiṃ. Vidahāti, nidahāti, saddahanti, vidahanti, nidahanti.
anya-e0201n0:3950: ‘Mayadā sare’ti sutte ‘mayadā’ti suttavibhattiyā byañjanepi niggahītassa dattaṃ, kammaṃ saddahāti, kammaphalaṃ saddahāti, saddahanti, vatthaṃ paridahāti, paridahanti.
anya-e0201n0:3951: Kamme-sandhīyati, sandhīyanti, sandhiyyati, sandhiyyanti, vidhiyyati. Navena sukhadukkhena, porāṇaṃ apidhiyyati jā. 1.2.114.
anya-e0201n0:3955: Īādimhi-saddahi, saddahiṃsu. Tatra bhikkhavo samādahiṃsu dī. ni. 2.332, samādahaṃsu vā.
anya-e0201n0:3959: Ṇimhi-‘āssā ṇāpimhi yuka’ iti suttena ṇānubandhe āssa ante yāgamo, puttaṃ thaññaṃ pāyeti, pāyenti, pāyayati, pāyayanti.
anya-e0201n0:3962: Atrimā pāḷī-ayañhi te mayā’ruḷho, saro pissati lohitaṃ jā. 2.22.1968,aggodakāni pissāmi, yūthassa purato vajaṃ jā. 1.8.14. Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, na ca maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasi jā. 1.1.20.
anya-e0201n0:3963: Bhā-dittiyaṃ, bhāti, rattimābhāti candimā dha. pa. 387, disā bhanti virocamānā ma. ni. 1.503, daddallamānā ābhanti vi. va. 738; jā. 2.22.508, paṭibhāti, paṭibhanti, paṭibhātu, paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā saṃ. ni. 5.197, tisso maṃ upamāyo paṭibhaṃsu ma. ni. 1.374, ratti vibhāti, vibhāyati.
anya-e0201n0:3964: Mā-māne, dvittaṃ rasso ca, mamāyati, mamāyanti. Yemaṃ kāyaṃ mamāyanti, andhā bālā puthujjanā theragā. 575.
anya-e0201n0:3965: Yā-gatiyaṃ, yāti, yanti, yāyati, yāyanti, yāyanta’ manuyāyanti jā. 2.22.1753, uyyāti, uyyanti, niyyāti, niyyanti dhīrā lokamhā, hitvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ. Anuyāti, anuyanti, anupariyāyati, anupariyāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:3967: Vā-gati, gandhanesu, vāti devesu uttamo dha. pa. 56, vāto vāyati, vāyanti, nibbāti, nibbanti, nibbāyati, nibbāyanti, parinibbāti, parinibbāyati.
anya-e0201n0:3971: Sā-assādana, tanukaraṇa, antakriyāsu, sāti, sāyati, sāyanti, pariyosāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:3975: Kattu, kammani kyo, īñaāgamo, hiyyoti hiyyati poso jā. 1.15.348, nihiyyati tassa yaso a. ni. 4.17; jā. 1.10.60, tvaṃ eko avahiyyasi, dvittaṃ rasso ca.
anya-e0201n0:3976: 613. Kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā ka. 462-4; rū. 467-504; nī. 943-5; caṃ. 6.2.116; pā. 7.4.62.
anya-e0201n0:3977: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavagga, hānaṃ cavagga, jā honti.
anya-e0201n0:3982: Ṇāpimhi-hāpeti, hāpenti, hāpayati, hāpayanti, jahāpeti, jahāpenti, jahāpayati, jahāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:3986: Hāto parassa ssa-kārassa ha hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:3987: ‘‘Hāhisi tvaṃ jīvaloka’’nti jā. 1.5.36 pāḷi, hāhiti, hāhinti, hāhati, hāhanti, jahissati, hissati, aññamaññaṃ vadhitvāna, khippaṃ hissāma jīvitaṃ jā. 2.22.673.
anya-e0201n0:3992: I-gatiyaṃ ajjhāyane ca, khi-khaye pakāsane ca, cicaye, ji-jaye, ḍī-vehāsagatiyaṃ, nī-naye, bhī-bhaye, lī-laye, sī-saye, mhi-hāse.
anya-e0201n0:3993: Tyādyuppatti, kattari lo, eti, enti, esi, etha, emi, ema, veti, venti, sameti, samenti, abbheti, abbhenti, abhisameti, abhisamenti, aveti, aventi, samaveti, samaventi, apeti, apenti, upeti, upenti, anveti, anventi, acceti, accenti, pacceti, paccenti, ajjheti, ajjhenti, udeti, udenti, samudeti, samudenti, pariyeti, pariyenti, upayati, upayanti, accayati, accayanti, udayati, samudayati.
anya-e0201n0:3994: Etu, sametu, entu, samentu, ehi, samehi, etha, sametha, etha byagghā nivattavho, paccupetha mahāvanaṃ jā. 1.3.66.
anya-e0201n0:3995: Mahāvuttinā idhātumhā eyyādīnaṃ ekārassa lopo, na ca apatvā dukkhassantaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.107, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito, yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya jā. 2.22.635.
anya-e0201n0:3996: Īādimhi ‘paro kvacī’ti vibhattisaralopo, dhammaṃ abhisami, abhisamiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:3997: ‘Eontā su’nti uṃssa suṃ, abhisamesuṃ, abhisamayuṃ, abhisamayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4000: ‘Etī’ti dhātuniddeso tisaddo, idhātumhā parassa ssakārassa hi hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4001: Ehiti, essati. Bodhirukkhamupehiti bu. vaṃ. 2.63, nerañjaramupehiti bu. vaṃ. 2.63, upessati, tadā ehinti me vasaṃ jā. 1.1.33, tato nibbānamehisi cūḷava. 382 tassuddānaṃ, na punaṃ jātijaraṃ upehisi dha. pa. 238. Suttavibhattena aññadhātūhipi, kathaṃ jīvihisi tvaṃ apa. thera 1.3.13, jāyihitippasādo jā. 2.17.145, paññāyihinti etā daharā jā. 2.17.197.
anya-e0201n0:4002: Ssādimhi ‘‘sace puttaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, kukkurānaṃ adāhisī’’ti gavesitabbaṃ pāḷi, ‘adāhisī’ti ca adadissasetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:4004: Khito yāgamo, vikappena yassa dvittaṃ, kappo khīyetha, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304, ujjhāyanti khīyanti pārā. 88, avaṇṇaṃ pakāsentīti attho. Khiyyati, khiyyanti, āyu khiyyati maccānaṃ, kunnadīnaṃva odakaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.146.
anya-e0201n0:4006: 616. Nito cissa cho ka. 20; rū. 27; nī. 50.
anya-e0201n0:4007: Nito parassa cissa ca-kārassa cho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4011: Sarantassa dhātussa dīgho hoti kyamhīti ikāru’kārānaṃ kyamhi vikappena dīgho.
anya-e0201n0:4013: Ji-jaye, jeti, jenti, vijeti, vijenti, parājeti, parājenti, jayati, jayanti, vijayati, vijayanti, parājayati, parājayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4014: Kamme kyamhi dīgho, na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati. Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyati jā. 1.1.70.
anya-e0201n0:4015: Ṇāpimhi pubbassaralopo vā, jāpeti, jāpayati. Yo na hanti na ghāteti, na jināti na jāpaye jā. 1.10.144. Jayāpeti, jayāpayati, jayāpīyati, jayāpīyanti, jayatu, jayantu.
anya-e0201n0:4016: Īādimhi-ajesi, ajesuṃ, vijesi, vijesuṃ, ajayi, ajayuṃ, ajayiṃsu, vijayi, vijayuṃ, vijayiṃsu, jessati, vijessati, parājessati, jayissati, vijayissati, parājayissati.
anya-e0201n0:4017: Ḍī-vehāsagatiyaṃ, sakuṇo ḍeti, ḍenti dī. ni. 1.215; a. ni. 4.198. Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti, oḍḍenti.
