anya-e0201n0:4715: 667. Tesu suto kṇokṇānaṃ roṭa ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:4716: Tesu īādīsu ssakāravantesu ca vacanesu sudhātuto paresaṃ kṇo, kṇānaṃ roṭa hoti, rānubandho sabbādesadīpanattho. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti suttena ādisarassa lopo, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4717: Assosi, assosuṃ, assosi, assosittha, assosiṃ, assosimhā, assosumhā, assosittha iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4718: Ssatyādimhi-suṇissati, sossati, suṇissanti, sossanti, suṇissasi, sossasi, suṇissatha, sossatha, suṇissāmi, sossāmi, suṇissāma, sossāma. Evaṃ parachakke.
anya-e0201n0:4721: Īādimhi-dūtaṃ pahiṇi, pahiṇiṃsu, ‘kvaci vikaraṇāna’nti vikaraṇalopo, mahāvuttinā passa dīgho, dūtaṃ pāhesi pārā. 297; mahāva. 198, pāhesuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4723: 668. Sakāpānaṃ kukku kṇe ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘‘…kukakū ṇe’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4724: Saka, āpadhātūnaṃ kānubandhā kukāra, ukārā kamena āgamā honti kṇamhi paccaye.
anya-e0201n0:4737: Sakamhā parassa kṇāssa kho hoti īādimhi.
anya-e0201n0:4740: Sakamhā parassa kṇassa kho hoti vā sse pare.
anya-e0201n0:4741: Sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati, sakkhissanti, sakkuṇissanti, sakkhissasi, sakkhissatha, sakkhissāmi, sakkhissāma, sakkuṇissāma.
anya-e0201n0:4742: ‘Dakkha sakkha hehi hohīhi lopo’ti ssassa vikappena lopo, sakkhiti, sakkhissati, sakkhinti, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0201n0:4747: Kī, ji, ñā, dhū, pu, bhū, mā, mū, lū.
anya-e0201n0:4749: Kīiccādīhi kriyatthehi paraṃ kattari kānubandho ṇāpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4759: Kārite-jayāpeti, jayāpayati, parājeti, parājayati, parājenti, parājayanti, jināpeti, jināpayati, ajini, jini, ajiniṃsu, jiniṃsu, jinissati, jinissanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4763: Jānāti, pajānāti, ājānāti, sañjānāti, vijānāti, abhijānāti, parijānāti, paṭijānāti, jānanti.
anya-e0201n0:4764: Kamme-ñāyati, paññāyati, aññāyati, saññāyati, viññāyati, abhiññāyati, pariññāyati, paṭiññāyati, ñāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4765: Kārite-ñāpeti, ñāpayati, ñāpenti, ñāpayanti, jānāpeti, jānāpayati, jānāpenti, jānāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4767: 675. Ñāssa sanāssa nāyo timhi ka. 509; rū. 516; nī. 1022.
anya-e0201n0:4768: Nāsahitassa ñāssa nāyo hoti timhi, suttavibhattiyā anti, antesu ca.
anya-e0201n0:4769: Nāyati. Viceyya viceyya atthe panāyatīti kho bhikkhave vipassīti vuccati dī. ni. 2.41-44. Nāyanti. ‘‘Animittā na nāyare’’ti visuddhi 1.174 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:4770: Eyyādimhi-jāneyya, jāneyyuṃ, jāneyyāsi, jāneyyātha, jāneyyāmi, jāneyyāma.
anya-e0201n0:4772: Eyyāmassa emutte ‘‘kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya’’nti jā. 2.22.7 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:4774: Ñāto eyyassa iyā, ñā honti, vāsaddena eyyumādīnampi ñū, ñāsi, ñātha, ñāmi, ñāmādesā honti, eyyamiccassa ñañca.
anya-e0201n0:4777: Ñādese pare sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4779: Suttavibhattena ñūādīsupi jaṃ hoti. ‘‘Pāpaṃ katvā mā maṃ jaññūti icchati su. ni. 127; vibha. 894 ‘jaññā’ti, vivekadhammaṃ ahaṃ vijaññaṃ gavesitabbaṃ, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññu’’nti jā. 2.22.1301 pāḷī. ‘Jaññāsi, jaññātha, jaññāmi, jaññāmā’tipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:4781: Knāssa lopo hoti vā īādimhi ssatyādimhi ca.
anya-e0201n0:4782: Aññāsi, abbhaññāsi, ajāni, aññāsuṃ, aññaṃsu, abbhaññaṃsu, jāniṃsu, aññāsi, abbhaññāsi, ajāni, aññittha, jānittha, aññāsiṃ, abbhaññāsiṃ, ajāniṃ, jāniṃ, aññāsimhā, ajānimhā, jānimhā, ñāssati, jānissati, ñāssanti, jānissanti.
anya-e0201n0:4784: 679. Ssassa hi kamme ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n0:4785: Ñāto ssassa hi hoti vā kamme.
anya-e0201n0:4786: Paññāyihi. ‘‘Paññāyihinti etā, daharā’’ti jā. 2.17.197 pāḷi. Paññāyissati, paññāyissanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4791: Bhū-pattiyaṃ, rasso, abhisambhunāti, abhisambhunanti. Nāssa ṇatte-abhisambhuṇāti, abhisambhuṇanti.
anya-e0201n0:4792: Mā-parimāṇe, mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa ittaṃ, mināti, nimmināti.
anya-e0201n0:4794: Kārite-nagaraṃ māpeti, māpayati, māpīyati, māpīyanti, nimmini, nimminiṃsu, māpesi, māpayi, māpesuṃ, māpayuṃ, nimminissati, nimminissanti, māpessati, māpessanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4807: Āpa-pāpuṇane papubbo. Dhātvantassa dvittaṃ rasso ca, pappoti, papponti.
anya-e0201n0:4813: ‘Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi dhātvantassa yattaṃ, kayyati, kayyanti, kayyare, kayyate, kayyante.
anya-e0201n0:4814: Kārite-kāreti, kārayati, kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpeti, kārāpayati, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4815: 681. Karassa sossa kuṃ ka. 511; rū. 521; nī. 1124.
anya-e0201n0:4816: O-kārasahitassa karassa kuṃ hoti mi, mesu paresu.
anya-e0201n0:4817: Kummi, kumma, ‘‘bhattu apacitiṃ kummi jā. 1.3.126, dhammassāpacitiṃ kummī’’ti jā. 2.22.1752 pāḷī.
anya-e0201n0:4819: Pādito parassa karadhātussa kvaci kho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4825: 683. Karassa sossa kubbakurukayirā ka. 511-2; rū. 521-2; nī. 1077-8-9-10; caṃ. 5.2.103; pā. 6.4.110.
anya-e0201n0:4826: O-kārasahitassa karassa kubba, kuru, kayirā honti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu, mahāvuttinā vikappena kussa kruttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4828: Parachakke-kubbate, krubbate, kubbante, krubbante, kurute, kayirati, kayiranti, kayirasi, kayiratha, kayirāmi, kayirāma, kayirate, kayirante.
anya-e0201n0:4829: Karotu, saṅkharotu, kubbatu, krubbatu, kurutu, agghaṃ kurutu no bhavaṃ dī. ni. 2.318, kayiratu.
anya-e0201n0:4832: Kayirādesato parassa eyyavibhattissa ṭānubandho ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4833: So puññaṃ kayirā, puññaṃ ce puriso kayirā dha. pa. 118, kayirā naṃ punappunaṃ dha. pa. 118.
anya-e0201n0:4835: Kayirādesato parassa eyyuṃādīnaṃ eyyasaddassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4836: Kayiruṃ, kayireyyuṃ, kayirāsi, kayireyyāsi, kayirātha, kayireyyātha, kayirāmi, kayireyyāmi, kayirāma, kayireyyāma.
anya-e0201n0:4838: Kayirādesato parassa ethassa e-kārassa ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4839: So kayirātha, dīpaṃ kayirātha paṇḍito dha. pa. 28, kayirā ce kayirāthenaṃ dha. pa. 313; saṃ. ni. 1.89.
anya-e0201n0:4840: Īādimhi-akari, kari, saṅkhari, abhisaṅkhari, akubbi, kubbi, akrubbi, krubbi, akayiri, kayiri, akaruṃ, karuṃ, saṅkharuṃ, abhi, saṅkharuṃ, akariṃsu, kariṃsu, saṅkhariṃsu, abhisaṅkhariṃsu, akubbiṃsu, kubbiṃsu, akrubbiṃsu, krubbiṃsu, akayiriṃsu, kayiriṃsu, akayiruṃ, kayiruṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4842: Īādīsu saokārassa karassa kā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4844: Ā, e, ūdīghehi parassa īvacanassa si hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4845: Aṭṭhāsi, adāsi, vadesi, vajjesi, bhāvesi, kāresianubhosi, ahosi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4846: So akāsi, te akaṃsu, gāthāyaṃ ‘‘akaṃsu satthuvacana’’nti jā. 2.22.564 pāḷi. Akāsuṃ, tvaṃ akāsi. Mā tumhe evarūpaṃ akattha gavesitabbaṃ, mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvī vā yadi vā raho udā. 44. Akāsittha, ahaṃ akāsiṃ, mayaṃ akāsimhā, akamhā. Bhogesu vijjamānesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano jā. 1.4.53. So akā. ‘‘Tato ekasataṃ khatye, anuyante bhavaṃ akā’’ti jā. 2.20.94 pāḷi. Akāsittha vā, ahaṃ akaṃ, akaraṃ vā. ‘‘Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ nākaṃ, pitu vuddhassa bhāsita’’nti jā. 2.17.134 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n0:4847: Kārite-so kāresi, kārayi, kārāpesi, kārāpayi, te kāresuṃ, kārayuṃ, kārāpesuṃ, kārāpayuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4848: Karissati saṅkharissati, kubbissati, krubbissati, kayirissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4849: ‘‘Harassa cāhaṅa sse’ti ssena saha karassa rakārassa āhaṅa hoti, kāhati, kāhanti, kathaṃ kāhanti dārakā jā. 2.22.1849.
anya-e0201n0:4850: Iñāgame-kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ jā. 1.4.56, kāhāma puññasañcayaṃ apa. thera 1.1.401.
anya-e0201n0:4851: ‘Āīādīsū’ti sutte yogavibhāgena ssatyādīsupi kā hoti, saṃyoge rassattaṃ, kassati, kassanti, kassasi, kassatha, kassāmi, kassāma, kassaṃ purisakāriyaṃ jā. 2.22.131.
anya-e0201n0:4859: 690. Pubbachakke vā kvaci ka. 511; rū. 521; nī. 1024.
anya-e0201n0:4860: Pubbachakke ovikaraṇassa kvaci u hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:4866: Tanadhātussa na-kārassa ā hoti vā kyamhi.
anya-e0201n0:4867: Tāyati, tāyanti, patāyati, patāyanti. ‘‘Ito’dāni patāyanti, sūciyo balisāni cā’’ti jā. 1.6.84 pāḷi. Tāyate, tāyante.
anya-e0201n0:4868: Saka-sattiyaṃ, sakkoti, sakkonti, sakkosi, sakkotha, sakkomi, sakkoma.
anya-e0201n0:4872: Āpa, kamu, gaṇa, ghaṭa, cinta, ceta, cura, dhara, pāla, pūja, manta, māna, vida.
anya-e0201n0:4873: 692. Curādīhiṇi ka. 452; rū. 525; nī. 933; caṃ. 1.1.45; pā. 3.1.25; ‘curādito ṇi’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4874: Curādīhi kriyatthehi paraṃ sakatthe ṇipaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4877: Kamu-icchāyaṃ, kāmeti, kāmayati, kāmenti, kāmayanti, nikāmeti, nikāmayati, nikāmenti, nikāmayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4881: Gaṇa-saṅkhyāne, gaṇa, ghaṭānaṃ tudādittā na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati.
anya-e0201n0:4883: Cinta-cintāyaṃ, garupantattā na vuddhi, cinteti, cintayati.
anya-e0201n0:4887: Īādimhi-cintesi, cintayi, cinteyuṃ, cintayuṃ, cintesi, cintayi, cintayittha, cintesiṃ, cintayiṃ, cintesimhā, cintayimhā.
anya-e0201n0:4892: Pūja-pūjāyaṃ, garupantattā na vuddhi, pūjeti, pūjayati, pūjenti, pūjayanti.
anya-e0201n0:4894: Āpubbo kathane āmantane ca. Āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave dī. ni. 2.218, bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi dī. ni. 2.208.
anya-e0201n0:4896: Īādimhi-mantesi, mantayi, āmantesi, āmantayi, nimantesi, nimantayi, mantesuṃ, mantayuṃ, mantayiṃsu rahogatā jā. 2.22.1918, mantessati, āmantessati, nimantessati, mantayissati, āmantayissati, nimantayissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4897: Māna-pūjāyaṃ, māneti, mānayati, mānenti, mānayanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4899: Paṭi, ni, papubbo ācikkhane, paṭivedeti, paṭivedayati, nivedeti, nivedayati, pavedeti, pavedayati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4904: Kriyāvācībhāvena dhāturūpā paccayā dhātupaccayā, kriyatthapaccayāti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā tehipi sabbesaṃ tyādi, tabbādivibhatti, paccayānaṃ sambhavo.
anya-e0201n0:4906: 693. Tijamānehi khasā khamāvīmaṃsāsu ka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṃ. 1.1.17, 28; pā. 3.1.5.
anya-e0201n0:4907: Khamāyaṃ vīmaṃsāyañca pavattehi tija, mānadhātūhi paraṃ kamena kha, sapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n0:4909: 694. Khachasānamekassaraṃ dve ka. 458; rū. 461; nī. 939; caṃ. 5.1.1; pā. 6.1.1, 9; ‘…mekasarodi…’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:4910: Kha, cha, sapaccayantānaṃ dhāturūpānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saddarūpaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hotīti ‘tija, tija’iti dvirūpe kate ‘loponādibyañjanassā’ti anādibyañjanabhūtassa ja-kārassa lopo, ‘pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti dhātvantajakārassa pararūpattaṃ. ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti saṃyogādissa khassa kattaṃ, ‘titikkha’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṃ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n0:4918: Māna-vīmaṃsāyaṃ, tato sapaccayo. ‘Khachasānamekassaraṃ dve’ti ‘māna, māna’iti dvirūpe kate –
anya-e0201n0:4919: 695. Mānassa vī parassa ca maṃ ka. 463-7; rū. 532-3; nī. 944.
anya-e0201n0:4920: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti, parassa ca sabbassa mānassa maṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4925: Vīmaṃsāyanti kiṃ? Māna-pūjāyaṃ, māneti, sammāneti, abhimāneti, pūjetīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:4927: 696. Kitā tikicchāsaṃsayesu cho ka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṃ. 1.1.18; pā. 3.1.5 kā.
anya-e0201n0:4928: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca pavattakitadhātuto paraṃ cho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4931: Saṃsayamhā aññasmiṃ tikicchatthe pavattassa kitadhātussa dvitte pubbassa kitassati hoti vā. ‘Pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti pararūpattaṃ, saṃyogādissa cakārattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4932: Tikicchati, tikicchanti. Devāpi naṃ tikicchanti, mātāpettibharaṃ naraṃ jā. 2.22.408.
anya-e0201n0:4935: Vāsaddena tikārābhāve ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti dvitte pubbassa cavaggo, cikicchati, cikicchanti, cikicchīyati, cikicchīyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4938: Kita-ñāṇe nivāse ca, ketati, saṃketati, niketati.
anya-e0201n0:4940: 698. Nindāyaṃ gupabadhā bassa bho ca ka. 433; rū. 528; caṃ. 1.1.19, 20; pā. 3.1.5, 6 kā.
anya-e0201n0:4941: Nindāyaṃ pavattehi gupa, badhehi paraṃ chapaccayo hoti, bassa ca bho hoti. Dvirūpe kate anādibyañjanalopo.
anya-e0201n0:4943: Gupissa dvitte pubbassa u-kārassa i hoti. Gassa cavaggattaṃ, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, saṃyogādissa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4946: Kārite-jiguccheti, jigucchayati, jigucchāpeti, jigucchāpayati. Jigucchatu, jigucchantu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4950: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti kha, cha, sesūti assa ittaṃ, parabakārassa ca bhattaṃ, dhātvantassa pararūpādi.
anya-e0201n0:4952: Nindāyanti kiṃ? Badha-bandhana, hiṃsāsu, bādheti, bādhayati. Vātaṃ jālena bādhesi jā. 1.12.8.
anya-e0201n0:4956: 701. Tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ te ka. 434; rū. 534; nī. 910; caṃ. 1.1.22; pā. 3.1.7.
anya-e0201n0:4957: Tumantehi icchatthe te kha, cha, sā honti, tuṃpaccayassa ca lopo hoti. Idañca suttaṃ tumicchatthasambhave sati sabbadhātupadehipi kha, cha, sānaṃ pavattidīpanatthaṃ. Tena tumicchatthe sa, chapaccaye katvā ‘ū byañjanassā’ti sa, chānaṃ ādimhi īāgamaṃ katvā ‘‘aputtaṃ puttamiva ācarituṃ icchati puttīyīsati, pabbato viya attānaṃ ācarituṃ icchati pabbatāyīsati, dātuṃ icchati dicchati’’ iccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:4958: Bhuja, ghasa, hana, ji, hara, pā, su.
anya-e0201n0:4959: Bhuñjituṃ icchatīti atthe-bhujato khapaccayo, tuṃpaccayalopo, dvittaṃ, pubbassa anādilopo, pararūpatte saṃyogādissa paṭhamattaṃ, pubbassa bhassa battaṃ, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti, bubhukkhīyati, bubhukkhīyanti, bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti, bubhukkhāpayati, bubhukkhāpīyati, bubhukkhāpīyanti, bubhukkhatu, bubhukkhantu, bubhukkheyya, bubhukkheyyuṃ, bubhukkhi, bubhukkhiṃsu, bubhukkhissati, bubhukkhissanti, bubhukkhissā, bubhukkhissaṃsu.
anya-e0201n0:4960: Ghasa-adane, ghasituṃ icchatīti atthe – chapaccayo, dvittādi, pubbassa ghassa gattaṃ, gassa jattaṃ, assa ittaṃ, jighacchati, jighacchanti, jighacchīyati, jighacchīyanti, jighaccheti, jighacchāpeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4961: Hana-hiṃ sāyaṃ, hantuṃ icchatīti atthe – chapaccayo, dvittādi, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4963: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n0:4965: Ji-jaye, jetuṃ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:4967: Ji, harānaṃ dvitte parassa jissa harassa ca gī hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n0:4969: Hara-haraṇe, dvittādi, parassa gī, pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṃ, jigīsati, harituṃ icchatīti attho, jigīsanti.
anya-e0201n0:4970: Pā-pāne, pivituṃ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṃ, ‘rasso pubbassā’ti rasso, assa ittaṃ, pipāsati, pipāsanti, pipāsīyati, pipāsīyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4971: Su-savane, sotuṃ icchatīti atthe – dvitte parassa dvittaṃ, sussusati sussūsati (bahūsu), sussusanti, sussusīyati, sussusīyanti, sussuseti, sussusayati, sussusāpeti, sussusāpayati, sussusāpīyati, sussusāpīyanti, sussusatu, sussusantu iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4972: Titikkhituṃ icchatīti atthe – titikkhato sapaccayo, sapaccayaparattā puna dvittappasaṅge –
anya-e0201n0:4974: Sakiṃ dvitte kate puna dvittaṃ na āpajjatīti puna dvittābhāvo, ‘ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n0:4975: Titikkhisati, titikkhisanti iccādi. Evaṃ tikicchituṃ icchatīti tikicchisati, tikicchisanti, cikicchisati, cikicchisanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4976: Iti tumicchatthe kha, cha, sa rāsi.
anya-e0201n0:4980: Kammatthā nāmapadamhā icchatthe īyo hotīti kammabhūtā puttasaddato icchāyaṃ īyo, ‘puttīya’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṃ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n0:4981: Puttīyati, puttīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṃ cīvarīyati, cīvarīyanti, pattīyati, pattīyanti, parikkhārīyati, parikkhārīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4984: Upamīyati upametabbo attho etenāti upamānaṃ, upamānabhūtā kammapadato ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4986: Kamme-aputtopi putto viya ācarīyati puttīyīyati, puttīyīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṃ sissīyati, sissīyanti.
anya-e0201n0:4989: Upamānabhūtā ādhārabhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4990: Kuṭīyati, kuṭīyanti pāsāde, nadiyaṃ viya samudde ācarati nadīyati, nadīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:4991: Araññe viya nagare ācarati araññīyati, araññīyanti nagare. Evaṃ gehīyati vihāre.
anya-e0201n0:4992: Lokadhammehi akampanīyaṭṭhena pabbato viya attānaṃ ācaratīti atthe –
anya-e0201n0:4994: Upamānabhūtā kattubhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe āyo hotīti pabbatasaddato āyo. Tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n0:4995: Pabbatāyati saṅgho, pabbatāyanti, cicciṭo viya attānaṃ ācarati cicciṭāyati, saddo. Evaṃ paṭapaṭāyati, kaṭakaṭāyati, dhūmadhūmāyati, dhūpāyati, sandhūpāyati.
anya-e0201n0:4998: Cīpaccayassa attho abbhūtatabbhāvo jhattho nāma. Kattuto jhatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:4999: Bhusāyati, bhusāyanti, apaṭopi paṭo bhavati paṭāyati, paṭāyanti, alohitampi lohitaṃ bhavati lohitāyati. Evaṃ nīlāyati, kamalāyati, candāyati, candanāyati, kañcanāyati, vajirāyati.
anya-e0201n0:5002: 710. Saddādīhi karoti ka. 435; rū. 536; nī. 911; caṃ. 1.1.36; pā. 3.1.17, 18; ‘saddādīni’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5003: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi nāmehi karotyatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5004: Saddāyati, saddāyanti, veraṃ karoti verāyati, verāyanti, kalahaṃ karoti kalahāyati, kalahāyanti, mettaṃ karoti mettāyati, mettāyanti, karuṇaṃ karoti karuṇāyati, karuṇāyanti, muditaṃ karoti muditāyati, muditāyanti, upekkhaṃ karoti upekkhāyati, upekkhāyanti, kukkuccaṃ karoti kukkuccāyati, kukkuccāyanti, piyaṃ karoti piyāyati, piyāyanti, paccayaṃ saddahanaṃ karoti pattiyāyati, pattiyāyanti, taṇhaṃ karoti taṇhāyati, taṇhāyanti, taṇhīyati, taṇhīyanti vā, karotyatthe īyo. Mama idanti karoti mamāyati, mamāyanti.
anya-e0201n0:5011: Dhātvattho vuccati yā kāci kriyā. Nāmasmā dhātvatthe i hoti. ‘Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye’ti issa ettaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5013: ‘Eonamayāvā sare’ti essa ayādeso. ‘Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’ti ettha vāsaddena lapaccayo, samānayati, samānayanti, piṇaṃ karoti piṇeti, piṇayati, kusalaṃ pucchati kusaleti, kusalayati, visuddhaṃ hoti visuddheti, visuddhayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇeti, upavīṇāyati, paññāya atikkamati atipaññeti, atipaññāyati, vaccaṃ karoti vacceti, vaccayati, muttaṃ karoti mutteti, muttayati, balena pīḷeti baleti, balayati.
anya-e0201n0:5018: Saccāpeti, saccāpenti, atthavibhāgaṃ karoti atthāpeti, atthāpenti, bedasatthaṃ karoti bedāpeti, bedāpenti, sukkhaṃ karoti sukkhāpeti, sukkhāpenti, sukhaṃ karoti sukhāpeti, sukhāpenti, dukkhaṃ karoti dukkhāpeti, dukkhāpenti, uṇhaṃ karoti uṇhāpeti, uṇhāpenti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5019: Aputtaṃ puttamiva ācarati puttīyati, puttīyituṃ icchatīti atthe ‘tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ te’ti sapaccayo.
anya-e0201n0:5020: 714. Yathiṭṭhaṃ syādino ka. 458; rū. 461; nī. 939; caṃ. 5.1.8; pā. 6.1.3.
anya-e0201n0:5021: Icchīyatīti iṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ iṭṭhaṃ yathiṭṭhaṃ. ‘‘Yamiṭṭha’’ntipi pāṭho. Syādyantassa yathiṭṭhaṃ ekassaraṃ ādibhūta’maññaṃ vā dverūpaṃ hoti, na tyādissa viya ādibhūtamevāti attho. ‘Ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n0:5024: Akamalaṃ kamalaṃ bhavati kamalāyati, kamalāyituṃ icchatīti kakamalāyisati, kamamalāyisati, kamalalāyisati iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5032: Atha dhātupaccayasaṃsiddhaṃ kāla, kāraka, liṅga, saṅkhyā, kriyābhedadīpakaṃ dabbappadhānavācakaṃ kitakapadaṃ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n0:5034: Kattā ca kammañca karaṇañca sampadānañca apādānañca adhikaraṇañca bhāvo cāti satta sādhanāni kārakabhedo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:5037: Tassīlakriyā, taddhammakriyā, tassādhukārakriyā, attamānakriyā, abhikkhaññakriyā, arahakriyā, sakkakriyā, pesanakriyā, atisaggakriyā, pattakālārocanakriyā, avassambhāvīkriyādayo kriyābhedo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:5038: ‘‘Gamanaṃ bhavati, pacanaṃ jānāti’’ iccādīsu paccayatthabhūto bhāvo nāma sādhanarūpo hoti. Jāti viya saṅkhatadhammassa dhātvatthabhūtāya sādhyakriyāya sādhakattā liṅgattayayutto ca hoti, kriyā, kāro, karaṇanti siddhattā saṅkhyābhedayutto ca hoti-nānādhātvatthānañca kattu, kammānañca kālādīnañca bhedena sarūpabhedasabbhavato, tasmā sopi dabbe eva saṅgayhatīti katvā ‘dabbappadhānavācaka’nti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ tyādikaṇḍe bhāvasādhanavinicchaye vuttameva.
anya-e0201n0:5040: 715. Kattari bhūte kta ktavantu ktāvī ka. 555; rū. 612; nī. 1142; caṃ. 1.2.66 …pe… 3.2.102.
anya-e0201n0:5041: Abhavīti bhūto, atīto, bhūte vattabbe kriyatthā kattari kānubandhā ta, tavantu, tāvīpaccayā honti, kānubandhā ‘na te kānubandhanāgamesū’ti sutte visesanatthā.
anya-e0201n0:5043: Bhūte vattabbe kriyatthā bhāva, kammesu kānubandho tapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5044: Abhavīti bhūto-puriso, bhūtā-itthī, bhūtaṃ-kulaṃ, kārite dhātuto ṇānubandhānaṃ paṭhamaṃ sampattattā ‘na te kānubandhanāgamesū’ti paṭisedho na pāpuṇāti, ‘yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye’ti ovuddhi, ‘āvāyā ṇānubandhe’ti ossa āvattaṃ, tato tapaccayo.
anya-e0201n0:5050: Tavantu, tāvīsu-abhavīti bhūtavā-puriso, bhūtavantī, bhūtavatī-itthī, bhūtavaṃ-kulaṃ, guṇavantusamaṃ. Bhūtāvī-puriso. Bhūtāvinī-itthī, bhūtāvi-cittaṃ, daṇḍī, daṇḍinīsamaṃ. Puriso bhogaṃ anubhūto, purisena bhogo anubhūto.
anya-e0201n0:5051: Ettha ca kitapaccayānaṃ attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyattho cāti sabbaṃ tyādikaṇḍe vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5052: Purimesu pana chasu sādhanesu paccayānaṃ abhidheyyattho padantarena ācikkhīyati, bhāvasādhane pana attano dhātunā eva.
anya-e0201n0:5053: Tattha ca kattusatti, kammasatti, karaṇasatti, sampadānasatti, apādānasatti, adhikaraṇasattisaṅkhātaṃ vāccatthaṃ ujuṃ vadantā kitapaccayā attano abhidheyyapadena samānaliṅga, vibhatti, saṅkhyāyuttā hutvā vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:5055: Kattari tāva-puriso bhogaṃ anubhūto, purisā bhogaṃ anubhūtā…pe… purisesu bhogaṃ anubhūtesu, itthī bhogaṃ anubhūtā, itthiyo bhogaṃ anubhūtāyo…pe… itthīsu bhogaṃ anubhūtāsu, kulaṃ bhogaṃ anubhūtaṃ, kulāni bhogaṃ anabhūtāni…pe… kulesu bhogaṃ anubhūtesu.
anya-e0201n0:5056: Kamme-bhogo purisena anubhūto, bhogā purisena anubhūtā…pe… bhogesu purisena anubhūtesu, sampatti purisena anubhūtā, sampattiyo purisena anubhūtāyo…pe… sampattīsu purisena anubhūtāsu, sukhaṃ purisena anubhūtaṃ, sukhāni purisena anubhūtāni…pe… sukhesu purisena anubhūtesu. Esa nayo karaṇādīsupi.
anya-e0201n0:5057: Evaṃ kitavācakā attano abhidheyyapadena samānaliṅga, vibhatti, saṅkhyāyuttā hutvā taṃ taṃ sādhanaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0201n0:5058: ‘Itthiyamaṇatikayakyā cā’ti itthiyaṃ tipaccayo, anubhavanaṃ, anubhūyate vā anubhūti. ‘‘Tissassa anubhūti, phussassa anubhūti’’ iccādikā bahū anubhūtiyopi sijjhanti, tasmā ‘‘anubhūti, anubhūtiyo, anubhūtiṃ, anubhūtiyo…pe… anubhūtīsū’’ti yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:5060: Kattukārake kriyatthā ltu, ṇakā honti, lānubandho tussa kattari nibandhanattho, ‘ltupitādīnamā’ti visesanattho ca.
anya-e0201n0:5062: Sāmaññavidhānattā arahatthe sattiatthe tassīla, taddhamma, tassādhukāra, attamānesu ca kālattaye ca bhavanti.
anya-e0201n0:5067: 719. Pubbekakattukānaṃ ka. 564; rū. 640; nīti. 1150-6; caṃ. 1.3.131; pā. 3.4.21.
anya-e0201n0:5068: Yāsaṃ visesana, visesyānaṃ dvinnaṃ pubbā’parakriyānaṃ kattā ekova hoti. Tāsu pubbakriyāyaṃ bhāvatthe tuna, tvāna, tvāpaccayā honti. ‘Eonamayavā sare’ti īkāre pare ovuddhiyā avattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5070: Ekakattukānanti kiṃ? Devadatto bhuñji, yaññadatto gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:5071: Pubbeti kiṃ? Pacchā bhuñjati, paṭhamaṃ pacati.
anya-e0201n0:5072: Bahulādhikārā samānā’parakriyāsupi nānākattukāsupi tunādayo bhavanti. Thakkacca daṇḍo patati, dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nikkhamati, puriso sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0201n0:5073: Yasmiṃ vākye aparakriyāpadaṃ na dissati. Yathā? Pabbataṃ atikkamma nadī, atikkamma nadiṃ pabbato, ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe arūpāti, tatthapi sattākriyā viññāyateva sabbapadatthānaṃ sattānātivattanato. Aparakriyārahite asamānakattuke ca vākye paṭhamantayogassa diṭṭhattā kattaripi tunādīnaṃ sambhavo yutto.
anya-e0201n0:5074: 720. Paṭisedhālaṃkhalūnaṃ tuna tvāna tvā vā paṭisedhelaṃkhalūnaṃ tunattvāna ttvā vā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5075: Paṭisedhatthānaṃ alaṃ, khalūnaṃ yoge tunādayo honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:5076: Alaṃ bhutvā, khalu bhutvā, alaṃ bhuttena, khalu bhuttena vā.
anya-e0201n0:5077: 721. Tuṃtāyetave bhāve bhavissatikriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ ka. 561-2-3; rū. 636, 638-9; nī. 1148-9.
anya-e0201n0:5078: Tassā tassā kriyāya atthabhūtāya bhavissamānakriyāya gamyamānāya bhāvatthe tuṃ, tāye, tavepaccayā bhavanti. Suttapadavaḍḍhanena tuyepaccayopi.
anya-e0201n0:5079: Anubhavituṃ gacchati, anubhavitāye gacchati, anubhavitave gacchati, anubhavituṃ icchati, kāmeti, sakkoti, jānāti. Tathā kālo anubhavituṃ, samayo anubhavituṃ, velā anubhavituṃ. Tathā anubhavituṃ mano, anubhavituṃ soko, cakkhu daṭṭhuṃ, sotaṃ sotuṃ, mano viññātuṃ, hattho kātuṃ, pādo gantuṃ, dhanu yujjhituṃ, jaḷo vattuṃ, mando gantuṃ, alaso kattunti.
anya-e0201n0:5080: Ettha ca ‘‘kālo anubhavitu’’ntiādīsu sattāvasena hetukriyā sijjhati, tasmā ‘‘anubhavituṃ kālo bhavatī’’tiādinā attho veditabbo.
anya-e0201n0:5081: Ime panettha tāye, tuyepayogā – āgatāmha imaṃ dhammasamayaṃ, dakkhitāye aparājitasaṅghaṃ dī. ni. 2.332. Alañhi te jagghitāye, mamaṃ disvāna edisaṃ jā. 1.5.137. Ko tādisaṃ arahati khāditāye jā. 1.16.92, atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hotuye bu. vaṃ. 2.9 ‘hetuye’, arahasi naṃ yācituye tuvampi, arahasi no jānituye katāni iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5083: Bhāve kammani ca tabba, anīyā honti. Suttapadavaḍḍhanena tabya, tāya, teyyapaccayāpi honti.
anya-e0201n0:5085: Bahulādhikārā kattādīsvapi bhavanti, tapantīti tapanīyāpāpadhammā, upaṭṭhātīti upaṭṭhānīyo-sisso. Pavuccati etenāti pavacanīyo-upajjhāyo, niyyanti etenāti niyyānīyo, so eva niyyāniko.
anya-e0201n0:5086: Sinā-soceyye, sināyanti etenāti sinānīyaṃcuṇṇaṃ, dīyate assāti dānīyo-brāhmaṇo. Sammā vattati etthāti sammāvattanīyo-guru.
anya-e0201n0:5088: Arahatthe ca sakkatthe, pattakāle ca pesane;
anya-e0201n0:5090: Tattha ‘‘araha sakka visiṭṭhe kattarī’’ti vuttiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā bhavatīti bhabbo, bhavituṃ arahatīti attho, majjatīti majjaṃ, madanīyaṃ, majjituṃ sakkotīti attho, evampi yujjati.
anya-e0201n0:5091: Pattakāle-kattabbo bhavatā kaṭo, esa kālo kaṭakaraṇassāti dīpeti.
anya-e0201n0:5092: Pesane-gantabbo bhavatā gāmo, gacchatu bhavaṃ gāmanti dīpeti.
anya-e0201n0:5093: Atisajjanaṃ sambodhanaṃ atisaggo, upadeso ceva vidhi ca. Tattha kattabbā’kattabbassa kammassa ācikkhaṇaṃ upadeso, dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ, pāṇo na hantabbo, adinnaṃ na ādātabbaṃ dī. ni. 3.85. Kattabbā’kattabbākāradassanaṃ vidhi, sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, no asakkaccaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5095: Yaṃ iṇaṃ adentassa daṇḍo āgacchati, idaṃ adhamiṇaṃ nāma, sataṃ me dātabbaṃ bhavatāti.
anya-e0201n0:5096: Ime panettha tabya, tāya, teyyapayogā – na brāhmaṇe addhike tiṭṭhamāne, gantabyamāhu dvipadinda seṭṭha jā. 1.10.13 (gantabba). Bhūtagāmapātabyatā, kāmesu pātabyatā pāci. 90, alajjitāye lajjanti dha. pa. 316, lajjitāye na lajjare. Ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetuṃ, pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetuṃ ma. ni. 1.357, ñāteyyaṃ, diṭṭheyyaṃ, patteyyaṃ, viddheyyaṃ maṃ amaññatha jā. 2.22.297.
anya-e0201n0:5097: Ta,ti, tu, tavantu, tāvī, tvā, tvāna, tuna, tuṃ, tave, tāye, tuye, tabba. Ime takārapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:5098: Kara, khanu, gā, gamu, jana, ṭhā, tanu, thara, dhā, dhara, namu, pā, phara, bhara, mana, mara, ramu, sara, hara, hana.
anya-e0201n0:5100: Gamādīnaṃ makāra, nakārantānaṃ rakārantānañca dhātūnaṃ antassa lopo hoti kānubandhe tapaccaye pare tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5101: Kara-karaṇe, karīyitthāti kato-vihāro, katāgūhā, kataṃ-gehaṃ, sakkarīyitthāti sakkato, mahāvuttinā santassa so.
anya-e0201n0:5102: ‘Karotissa kho’ti pādito karassa kassa kho, saṅkharīyitthāti saṅkhato, abhisaṅkhato, visaṅkharittha vikirīyitthāti visaṅkhato, upakarīyittha sajjīyitthāti upakkhaṭo, ‘tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā’ti tassa ṭo. Evaṃ dukkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5103: Parito karīyitthāti parikkhato, purato karīyitthāti purakkhato, purekkhato vā, mahāvuttinā purassa ettaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5107: Gā, pānaṃ anto īkāro hoti kānubandhe tapaccaye pare tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5109: Gamu-gatimhi agacchīti gato, agacchīyitthāti vā gato. Evaṃ āgato, uggato, duggato, niggato, vigato, sugato, saṅgato, anugato, apagato, avagato, upagato, adhigato.
anya-e0201n0:5112: Janissa nassa ā hoti kānubandhe tapaccaye pare tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5113: Ajāyitthāti jāto, dujjāto, sujāto, sañjāto, anujāto, avajāto, atijāto.
anya-e0201n0:5114: Suttavibhattena aññasmimpi vaṇṇe pare nassa ā hoti, puttaṃ vijāyitvā, vijāyituṃ, vijāyanaṃ, vijāyantī-itthī, vijāyamānā, puttaṃ janetīti jāyā iccādi, sabbattha mahāvuttinā sare pare yāgamo, mahāvuttinā vā sabbattha nassa yādeso ādidīgho ca.
anya-e0201n0:5117: Ṭhāssa i hoti kānubandhe takāre tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5118: Aṭṭhāsīti ṭhito, uṭṭhito, niṭṭhito, saṇṭhito, adhiṭṭhito.
anya-e0201n0:5119: Tanu-vitthāre, ātaññitthāti ātataṃ, vitataṃ, ātatavitataṃ, tūriyabhedo.
anya-e0201n0:5123: Dhādhātussa dhassa hi hoti kānubandhe takāre tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5124: Ādhīyitthāti āhito, āgyāhito, vidhīyitthāti vihito, nidhīyitthāti nihito, sandhīyitthāti saṃhito, odhīyitthāti ohito, abhidhīyitthāti abhihito, pidhīyitthāti pihito, apihito. Dvitte pubbassa tatiyattaṃ, ‘dhāssa ho’ti suttena parassa hattaṃ, ādahito, vidahito, nidahito, saṃdahito, saddahito vā, sannidahito, odahito, pidahito, apidahito, paridahito.
anya-e0201n0:5125: Dhara-dhāraṇe, uddharīyitthāti uddhaṭo, samuddhaṭo, niddhaṭo, tassa ṭattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5126: Namu-namane, namitthāti nato, unnato, samunnato, onato, avanato.
anya-e0201n0:5128: Phara-pharaṇe, pharittha, pharīyitthāti vā phuṭo, vipphuṭo, samphuṭo, ophuṭo, mahāvuttinā phassa uttaṃ, tassa ṭattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5129: Bhara-dhāraṇe, bharīyitthāti bhato, ābhato, ābhaṭo vā. Udakātalamubbhato, ubbhataṃ saṅghena kathinaṃ mahāva. 317, sambhataṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5130: Mana-ñāṇe, mato, mahājanena sammatoti mahāsammato, sammatā sīmā mahāva. 139, anumato, abhimato.
anya-e0201n0:5134: Sara-gati, cintāsu, bahulādhikārā kālattayepi tapaccayo, sarati, asari, sarissatīti sato, anussato, patissato.
anya-e0201n0:5136: Tassa ṭatte-āhaṭo, nihaṭo, udāhaṭo, samudāhaṭo, avahaṭo.
anya-e0201n0:5137: Hana-hiṃsāyaṃ, haññitthāti hato, vihato, samūhato avippavāso mahāva. 145, samūhatā sīmā mahāva. 146.
anya-e0201n0:5138: Tipaccayamhi bahulādhikārā akānubandhepi antalopo. Paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati, ākāro ākati, vikāro vikati, gāyanaṃ gīti, uggīti, saṅgīti, anugāyanaṃ anugīti, gamanaṃ gati, gantabbāti vā gati, gacchanti etthāti vā gati, āgamanaṃ āgati, sugati, duggati, samāgamanaṃ saṅgati, jananaṃ jāti, jāyanti etāya, etthāti vā jāti, ṭhānaṃ ṭhiti, saṇṭhiti, avaṭṭhiti, punappunaṃ tananaṃ santati, dhārenti etāyāti dhīti, mahāvuttinā īttaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5139: Namanaṃ nati, unnati, samunnati, onati, avanati, bharitabbāti bhati, manati jānāti etāyāti mati, vividhā mati vimati, ramaṇaṃ rati, āramaṇaṃ ārati, viramaṇaṃ virati, abhiramaṇaṃ abhirati, paṭiviramaṇaṃ pativirati, saraṇaṃ sati, saranti etāyāti vā sati, anussati, paṭissati, upahananaṃ upahati.
anya-e0201n0:5144: Karadhātussa ra-kārassa ā hoti vā tuṃ, tuna, tabbesu. Tunasaddena tvāna, tvāpi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n0:5148: Yathā karassa, tathā mahāvuttinā harassa rūpaṃ sijjhati, hāthuṃ, hātave, hātuna. Tesaṃ tuṇḍena hātūna, muñce pubbakataṃ iṇaṃ jā. 1.14.10.
anya-e0201n0:5149: Tvāmhi āssa ittaṃ, āhitvā, soṇḍāyudakamāhitvā jā. 1.10.9 (…hatvā).
anya-e0201n0:5155: Yakāravajjite byañjanapaccaye pare sabbadhātūnaṃ antabyañjano pararūpaṃ āpajjate.
anya-e0201n0:5156: Karotīti kattā, kātuṃ arahati, kātuṃ sakkoti, karaṇasīlo, karaṇadhammo, sakkaccaṃ vā karotīti attho. Bharatīti bhattā, haratīti hattā.
anya-e0201n0:5157: Tvādīsu ra-kārassa āttaṃ, saṃyoge pare rassattañca, katvā, katvāna.
anya-e0201n0:5158: Pararūpattaṃ, kattuna, kattuṃ, kattabbaṃ, bharaṇaṃ bhattuṃ, bhattave, haraṇaṃ hattuṃ, abhihattuṃ, hattave.
anya-e0201n0:5159: Āpa, ṇāpa, khipa, gupa, caja, ñapa, ñāpa, tapa, dīpa, dhūpa, pada, bhaja, bhuja, mada, mida, yuja, rica, ranja, lipa, lupa, vaca, vatu, vada, vapa, vica, sanja, sica, sambhu, sūca, sūda, supa.
anya-e0201n0:5160: Dhātvantabyañjanassa pararūpattaṃ, tapaccayamhi vipubbo āpabyāpane, byāpayati khippaṃ ñāṇabyāpanena byāpituṃ sakkotīti byatto, viyatto.
anya-e0201n0:5164: Khipa-khipane, khipīyitthāti khitto-daṇḍo, khittā-mattikā, khittaṃ-leṭṭu. Evaṃ sabbattha. Pakkhitto, ukkhitto, nikkhitto, vikkhitto, okkhitto, saṃkhitto.
anya-e0201n0:5168: Ñāpa-ñāpane, vikatidhātu nāmesā kāritantattā, paññāpīyitthāti paññatto, saññāpīyitthāti saññatto, viññāpīyitthāti viññatto.
anya-e0201n0:5171: Dhūpa-soṇḍiye, dhūpati, adhūpi, dhūpissatīti dhutto, surādhutto, akkhadhutto su. ni. 106.
anya-e0201n0:5175: Bhuja-pālana, byavaharaṇesu, bhuñjittha, bhuñjīyitthāti vā bhutto, paribhutto.
anya-e0201n0:5176: Mada-ummāde, majjitthāti matto, sammatto, pamatto, ummatto.
anya-e0201n0:5178: Yuja-yoge, yuñjatīti yutto, payutto, uyyutto, niyutto, viyutto, saṃyutto, saññutto.
anya-e0201n0:5184: 731. Vacādīnaṃ vassuṭa vā ka. 579; rū. 629; nī. 1182.
anya-e0201n0:5185: Vacādīnaṃ vassa uṭa hoti vā kānubandhe ta-kārapaccaye tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5186: Vuccitthāti utto-dhammo, uttā-kathā, uttaṃ-vacanaṃ, nirutto, niruttā, niruttaṃ, rāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:5188: Vacādīnaṃ assa u hoti kānubandhe ta-kārapaccaye tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5194: Sica-secane, siñcīyitthāti sitto, āsitto, avasitto, abhisitto.
anya-e0201n0:5198: Tipaccayamhi-byāpanaṃ byatti, viyatti, pariyāpuṇanaṃ pariyatti, samāpanaṃ samatti, parisamatti, āṇāpanaṃ āṇatti, gopanaṃ gutti, ñāpanaṃ ñatti, paññāpanaṃ paññatti, saññāpanaṃ saññatti, viññāpanaṃ viññatti.
anya-e0201n0:5199: Tapa-tappane, tappanaṃ titti, mahāvuttinā assa ittaṃ. Dīpanaṃ ditti, pajjanaṃ patti, āpatti, uppatti, nippatti, vipatti, sampatti, bhajanaṃ bhatti, sambhatti, bhuñjanaṃ bhutti, yuñjanaṃ yutti, riñcanaṃ ritti, niddhāretvā vuccati attho etāyāti nirutti, vuccati suttassa attho etāyāti vutti. ‘‘Vivarīyati suttassa attho etāyāti vuttī’’tipi vadanti. Vattanaṃ vutti, jīvitavutti, tadāyattavutti, ‘assū’ti assa uttaṃ. Vivecanaṃ vivitti, sajjanaṃ satti, āsatti, visatti iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5200: Tupaccayamhi-khipatīti khittā, gopetīti guttā, cajatīti cattā.
anya-e0201n0:5201: Idha chida, bhidādayopi vattabbā, chindatīti chettā, bhindatīti bhettā, bhajatīti bhattā, bhuñjatīti bhuttā, bhottā, yuttā, rittā, littā, luttā, vacati vadatīti vā vattā, viviccatīti vivittā, sañjatīti sattā, suppatīti suttā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5202: Tavantupaccayamhi-khipitthāti khittavā, gopitthāti guttavā, cajitthāti cattavā, chinditthāti chettavā.
anya-e0201n0:5203: Bhaja-puthakkaraṇe, bhājitthāti bhattavā, vibhattavā, abhuñjīti bhuttavā, ayuñjīti yuttavā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5204: Tāvīpaccayamhi-khittāvī, guttāvī, cattāvī, chettāvī, vibhattāvī, bhettāvī, bhuttāvī, yuttāvī iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5205: Tvādīsu pararūpatte mahāvuttinā tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ ādibyañjanassa lopo, chetvā, chetvāna, chettuna, vibhatvā, vibhatvāna, vibhattuna, bhutvā, bhutvāna, bhuttuna iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5206: Tuṃ, tavesu-chettuṃ, chettave, chetuṃ, chetave vā, ādibyañjanassa lopo. Vibhattuṃ, vibhattave, bhettuṃ, bhettave, bhottuṃ, bhottave, ādivuddhi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5207: Tabbapaccaye-chettabbaṃ, chetabbaṃ vā, bhettabbaṃ, bhottabbaṃ, vuccatīti vattabbaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5211: Kamu, kilamu, khanu, khamu, gamu, tanu, timu, damu, bhamu, mana, yamu, vamu, samu, hana.
anya-e0201n0:5213: Makāra, nakārantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto makāro nakāro ca niggahītaṃ hoti yakāravajjite byañjane pare. ‘Vagge vagganto’ti niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5214: Kamu-pādagamane, pakkamitthāti pakkanto, pādena akkamitthāti akkanto, ukkanto, vikkanto, nikkhanto, ‘nito kamassā’ti kassa khattaṃ, saṅkanto, okkanto, avakkanto, apakkanto, atikkanto, paṭikkanto, kassa dvittāni.
anya-e0201n0:5223: Tipaccayamhi-kāmanaṃ kanti, nikāmanaṃ nikanti, pakkamanaṃ pakkanti, khamanaṃ khanti, tananaṃ tanti, damanaṃ danti, bhamanaṃ bhanti, vibbhanti, mananaṃ manti, samanaṃ santi iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5224: Tupaccaye-pakkamatīti pakkantā, khanatīti khantā, khamatīti khantā, gacchatīti gantā, tanotīti tantā, temayatīti tintā, damayatīti dantā, bhamatīti bhantā, manatīti mantā.
anya-e0201n0:5225: Nipubbo yamu-niyamane, niyāmetīti niyantā, vamatīti vantā, samatīti santā, hanatīti hantā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5226: Tvādīsu-gantvā, gantvāna, gantuna, mantvā, mantvāna, mantuna, hantvā, hantvāna, hantuna iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5227: Tuṃ, tavesu-pakkantuṃ, pakkantave, khananaṃ khantuṃ, khantave, gamanaṃ gantuṃ, gantave, mananaṃ mantuṃ, mantave, hananaṃ hantuṃ, hantave iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5228: Tabbamhi-abhikkantabbaṃ, paṭikkantabbaṃ, khaññateti khantabbaṃ, gacchīyateti gantabbaṃ, maññateti mantabbaṃ, vamīyateti vantabbaṃ, haññateti hantabbaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5235: Pacamhā ta, tavantūnaṃ tassa ko hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5237: Bahulādhikārā tapaccayo kālattayepi hoti, asakkhi, sakkhati, sakkhissatīti sakko, mahāvuttinā tapaccayassa ko.
anya-e0201n0:5240: Mucamhā ta, tavantūnaṃ tassa anantarassa ko hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:5244: Susamhā ta, tavantūnaṃ tassa kho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5247: Bhanjādīhi ta, tavantūnaṃ tassa go hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5248: Abhañjitthāti bhaggo, bhaggavā, obhaggo, sambhaggo, palibhaggo.
anya-e0201n0:5249: Laga-laggane, lagitthāti laggo, laggavā, vilaggo, vilaggavā.
anya-e0201n0:5250: Muja-mujjane, mujjitthāti muggo, muggavā, nimmuggo, ummuggo.
anya-e0201n0:5251: Vija-bhaya, calanesu, saṃvijitthāti saṃviggo, saṃviggavā, ubbiggo, ubbiggavā.
anya-e0201n0:5252: Luja-vināse, palujitthāti paluggo, paluggavā, oluggo, oluggavā, viluggo, viluggavā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:5255: Isu, āsa, esa, kasa, kisa, kilisa, kusa, ghusa, jusa, tusa, disa, dusa, daṃsa, nasa, pisa, pusa, puccha, phusa, bhassa, bhajja, maja, masa, musa, vassa, visa, saja, sisa, silisa, hasa, hassa, haṃsa.
anya-e0201n0:5256: 738. Sānantarassa tassa ṭho ka. 573; rū. 626; nī. 1176 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ).
anya-e0201n0:5257: Sakārantehi dhātūhi parassa anantarassa paccayatakārassa ṭho hoti, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, ‘catutthadutiyesvesa’nti saṃyogādissa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5261: 739. Kasassima ca vā ka. 573; rū. 626; nī. 1176 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ).
anya-e0201n0:5262: Kasamhā parassa paccayatakārassa ṭho hoti, kasassa ādisaramhā paraṃ ima ca hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:5267: Kilisa-vibādhane upatāpe ca, kilissatīti kiliṭṭho, saṃkiliṭṭho, upakkiliṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:5269: Ghusa-sadde, ghosīyitthāti ghuṭṭho, saṅghuṭṭho. Accharāgaṇasaṅghuṭṭhaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.46. Ugghuṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:5273: Disī-kathane, uddisīyitthāti uddiṭṭho, niddisīyitthāti niddiṭṭho, apadisīyitthāti apadiṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:5280: Bhassa-kathane cavane ca, bhassitthāti bhaṭṭho, ābhaṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:5281: Masa-āmasane vijjhane ca, masīyitthāti maṭṭho, āmaṭṭho, omaṭṭho, ummaṭṭho. Sattiyā viya omaṭṭho saṃ. ni. 1.21.
anya-e0201n0:5292: Pucchādīhi parassa antarassa paccayatakārassa ṭho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5296: Saja-saṃsaggādīsu, saṃsajjitthāti saṃsaṭṭho, visaṭṭho, nisaṭṭho, osaṭṭho.
anya-e0201n0:5298: 741. Yajassa yassa ṭiyī ka. 610; rū. 627; nī. 1215.
anya-e0201n0:5299: Yajassa yakārassa ṭi, yiādesā honti kānubandhe paccayatakāre tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5302: Esa-gavesane, esanaṃ eṭṭhi, pariyeṭṭhi, tussanaṃ tuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi, dassanaṃ diṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhi, vassanaṃ vuṭṭhi, ‘assū’ti uttaṃ. Visajjanaṃ visaṭṭhi.
anya-e0201n0:5303: Tvādīsu-disa-pekkhane, ‘disassa passadassadasādadakkhā’ti suttena disassa dasādeso, mahāvuttinā vakāralopo, daṭṭhā, daṭṭhāna, daṭṭhuna.
anya-e0201n0:5304: ‘Tuṃyānā’ti tvāpaccayassa tuṃādeso. Nekkhamaṃ daṭṭhu khemato su. ni. 426, gāthāvasena niggahītalopo.
anya-e0201n0:5305: Tuṃ, tavesu-daṭṭhuṃ, daṭṭhave, pucchanaṃ puṭṭhuṃ, puṭṭhave.
anya-e0201n0:5306: Tabbamhi-tussitabbanti tuṭṭhabbaṃ, toṭṭhabbaṃ, passitabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, pucchitabbanti puṭṭhabbaṃ, phusitabbanti phoṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5310: Dahamhā parassa anantarassa paccayatakārassa ḍho hoti, pararūpatte saṃyogādissa tatiyattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5313: Bahamhā parassa anantarassa tassa ḍho hoti, bahassa ādisaramhā uma ca hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5314: Baha-vuddhiyaṃ, abahīti buḍḍho, bassa vo, vuḍḍho.
anya-e0201n0:5317: Vaḍḍhamhā parassa tipaccayassa takārassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5321: Kira khī, cara, jara, tara, thara, pūra.
anya-e0201n0:5323: Kirādīhi paresaṃ ta, tavantūnaṃ takārassa anantarabhūtassa ṇo hoti, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5324: Kira-ākiraṇe sammissana, khipanesu ca, kiritthāti kiṇṇo, pakiṇṇo, ākiṇṇo, vikkiṇṇo, saṃkiṇṇo, samākiṇṇo.
anya-e0201n0:5329: Tarādīhi paresaṃ ta, tavantūnaṃ takārassa anantarabhūtassa riṇṇo hoti. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti dhātvantabyañjanassa ādisarassa ca lopo.
anya-e0201n0:5330: Cara-gati, bhakkhanesu, carittha, carīyitthāti vā ciṇṇo, āciṇṇo, samāciṇṇo.
anya-e0201n0:5332: Tara-taraṇe, taritthāti tiṇṇo, uttiṇṇo, nittiṇṇo, vitiṇṇo, otiṇṇo, samotiṇṇo.
anya-e0201n0:5338: Dhasto, utrastoti ete saddā tapaccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n0:5341: Bhasa-bhasmīkaraṇe, bhasanti bhasmiṃ karonti etenāti bhastā, bhastrā vā, kammāragaggarī, evamādīnipi idha veditabbāni.
anya-e0201n0:5342: 748. Sāsa vasa saṃsa haṃsā tho ‘…saṃsa sasā tho’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5343: Etehi parassa anantarassa paccayatakārassa tho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5346: Sāsassa sisā honti kānubandhe paccayatakāre tvādivajjite, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ saṃyogādissa ca paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5347: Sāsīyatīti sittho, anusāsīyatīti anusiṭṭho. ‘‘Anusiṭṭho so mayā’’ti mahāva. 126 ettha pana tthakārassa ṭṭhakāroti vuttiyaṃ vutto. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ sāsati ettha, etenāti vā satthaṃ, saddasatthaṃ, vedasatthaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5348: Vasa-nivāse, ‘assū’ti uttaṃ, avasīti vuttho, vasīyitthāti vā vuttho, vassaṃ vasitthāti vassaṃvuttho, āvasīyitthāti āvutthaṃ-jetavanaṃ, nivasitthāti nivuttho, ajjhāvasitthāti ajjhāvuttho. Bahulādhikārā ‘‘rukkhe adhivatthā devatā’’ti pāci. 86 ettha uttaṃ natthi. Uposathaṃ upavasitthāti uposathaṃupavuttho, upavasīyitthāti vā upavutthouposatho, parivāsaṃ parivasitthāti parivāsaṃparivuttho, parivasīyitthāti vā parivuttho-parivāso.
anya-e0201n0:5351: Tipaccayamhi-anusāsanaṃ anusitthi, anusiṭṭhi vā, nivasanaṃ nivutthi.
anya-e0201n0:5357: Vasa-paridahane, bahulādhikārā uttaṃ natthi, vāsitabbanti vatthaṃ, nivāsīyitthāti nivatthaṃ, vatthabbaṃ, nivatthabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5360: Idha, kudha, gidha, badha, budha, budhi, midha, yudha, rādha, rudha, vidha, sidha, sudha, thabhi, rabha, labha, lubha, sambhū, duha, naha, muha.
anya-e0201n0:5361: 750. Dho dhabhahehi ka. 576; rū. 607; nī. 1179; ‘dho dhahabhehi’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5362: Etehi parassa anantarassa tassa dho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5363: Idha-ijjhane, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ saṃyogādissa ca tatiyattaṃ, samijjhitthāti samiddho-mahaddhano.
anya-e0201n0:5366: Badha-bandhane, bajjhitthāti baddho, pabaddho, ābaddho, nibaddho.
anya-e0201n0:5367: Budha-ñāṇe jāgare vikasane ca, bujjhati jānātīti buddho, sambuddho, sammāsambuddho, pabujjhati jāgarotīti vā pabuddho, paṭibuddho.
anya-e0201n0:5368: Budhi-nivāraṇe, paribundhīyatīti palibuddho. Vātapalibuddho, pittapalibuddho, semhapalibuddho.
anya-e0201n0:5370: Yudha-sampahāre, yujjhīyateti yuddhaṃ. Mallayuddhaṃ, meṇḍayuddhaṃ, hatthiyuddhaṃ, kukkuṭayuddhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5383: Rabha-ārabhe, ārabhitthāti āraddho, ārabbhitthāti vā āraddho, samāraddho.
anya-e0201n0:5384: Labha-lābhe, alabhīti laddho, labbhitthāti vā laddho, paṭiladdho, upaladdho.
anya-e0201n0:5390: Tipaccayamhi-ijjhanaṃ iddhi, ijjhanti etāyāti vā iddhi, samijjhanaṃ samiddhi, gijjhanaṃ giddhi, mijjhanaṃ middhi, abhirādhanaṃ abhiraddhi, virujjhanaṃ viruddhi, paṭiviruddhi, sijjhanaṃ siddhi, saṃsiddhi, paṭisiddhi, sujjhanaṃ suddhi, visuddhi, pārisuddhi, labhanaṃ laddhi, upaladdhi, lubbhanaṃ luddhi, passambhanaṃ passaddhi, muyhanaṃ muddhi.
anya-e0201n0:5394: Tuṃ, tavesu-budha-ñāṇe, buddhuṃ, buddhave, subuddhuṃ, subuddhave, boddhuṃ, boddhave, laddhuṃ, laddhave, paṭiladdhuṃ, paṭiladdhave.
anya-e0201n0:5397: Vaddhassa u hoti vā kānubandhe paccayatakāre tvādivajjite.
anya-e0201n0:5398: Vaddhitthāti vuddho, vaddho vā, vaddhanaṃ vuddhi, mahāvuttinā uttaṃ. Tipaccayassa ca tassa lopo.
anya-e0201n0:5401: Hā, i, ci, ji, ṭi, thī, dī,pī, mi, lī, thu, dū, dhū, pū, bhū, lū, vu, su, hu, āsa, katha, kupa, pala, mala, supa, paḷa.
anya-e0201n0:5403: Bhidādimhā paresaṃ kta, ktavantūnaṃ takārassa anantarabhūtassa no hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5404: Hā-cāge, hīyitthāti hīno, pahīno, nihīno, ohīno. Ettha ca noādesaṃ katvā pacchā ‘ūbyañjanassā’ti īāgamo, tassa ca kvaci rasso. Evaṃ parattha.
anya-e0201n0:5413: Lī-laye, līyitthāti līno, allīyitthāti allīno. Nilīyitthāti nilīno, paṭilīyitthāti paṭilīno, paṭilīnacaro bhikkhu, paṭisallīyitthāti paṭisallīno.
anya-e0201n0:5416: Dhū-niddhūnane, ahite dhamme dhunātīti dhuno, dhonopaññavā.
anya-e0201n0:5417: Pū-sodhane, punātīti puno, dantaṃ punanti etenāti dantapoṇo, nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5421: Su-savane, suṇātīti suno, soṇo, nassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5423: Hu-pūjā, dānesu, āhutabbanti āhunaṃ, pāhutabbanti pāhunaṃ-dātabbavatthu.
anya-e0201n0:5424: Āsa-upavesane, acchatīti āsino, tuṇhī acchatīti tuṇhīmāsino.
anya-e0201n0:5430: Paḷa-gatiyaṃ, paḷetīti paḷino, paḷinā jambudīpāte pārā. aṭṭha. 1.tatiyasaṃgītikathā.
anya-e0201n0:5433: Khida, chida, tuda, dā, nuda, pata, pada, bhida, vida, sada.
anya-e0201n0:5434: ‘Bhidādito no ktaktavantūna’nti tassa no, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, khijjitthāti khinno, chijjitthāti chinno, sañchinno, tuditthāti tunno, patunno, nitunno, vitunno.
anya-e0201n0:5436: Pata-patane, patatīti panno, pannadhajo, nnassa ṇṇatterukkhapaṇṇaṃ, pattaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n0:5437: Pada-gatiyaṃ, pajjitthāti panno, āpanno, uppanno, nipanno, vipanno, sampanno, upapanno, samupapanno, pariyāpanno.
anya-e0201n0:5438: Bhida-vidāraṇe, bhijjitthāti bhinno, pabhinno, sambhinno, paribhinno, vibhinno.
anya-e0201n0:5440: Sada visaraṇa, gatyā’vasānesu, sīditthāti sanno, osanno, pasīditthāti pasanno, abhippasanno, nisīditthāti nisinno, sannisinno, ‘sadajarānamīma’iti īma, saṃyoge rasso ca.
anya-e0201n0:5441: Tavantumhi-khinnavā, chinnavā, sañchinnavā, tunnavā, patunnavā, panunnavā, pannavā, āpannavā, bhinnavā, sambhinnavā, sannavā, pasannavā, nisinnavā.
anya-e0201n0:5443: Dādhātumhā paresaṃ ta, tavantūnaṃ tassa inno hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5444: Dīyitthāti dinno, padinno, ādinno, samādinno, upādinno, pariyādinno, nnassa ṇṇatte upādiṇṇo.
anya-e0201n0:5447: Ūha, gāhu, guha, baha, bāha, buha, muha, ruha, vaha.
anya-e0201n0:5448: 754. Ruhādīhi ho ḷo ca ka. 589; rū. 621; nī. 1192; ‘…ḷa ca’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5449: Ruhādīhi parassa anantarabhūtassa tapaccayassa takārassa ho hoti, dhātvantassa ḷo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5450: Ūha-sañcaye, byūhitthāti byūḷho, viyūḷho, paribyūḷho, devāsurasaṅgāmo samupabyūḷho ahosi saṃ. ni. 1.249.
anya-e0201n0:5451: Gāhu-bhusatthe vilolane ca, mā gāḷhaṃ paridevayi. Āgāḷhāya ceteti. Gāhitthāti gāḷho, pagāḷho, āgāḷho, ogāḷho, ajjhogāḷho pārā. aṭṭha. 1.1.
anya-e0201n0:5453: 755. Muhabahabuhānañca te kānubandhetve ka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘‘muhabahānañca…’’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5454: Tvādivajjite kānubandhe paccayatakāre pare muha, baha, buhānañca guhassa ca dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n0:5455: ‘Ruhādīhiho ḷo cā’ti dhātvantassaḷo, tapaccayassa ho, abahīti bāḷhaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5456: Buha-uddharaṇe, abuhitthāti būḷho, abbūḷho, abūḷhasallo su. ni. 785.
anya-e0201n0:5459: Muhamhā parassa anantarabhūtassa takārassa ho hoti, dhātvantassa ca ḷo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:5461: Ruha-janane, gatiyañca, ruhitthāti rūḷho, parūḷho, ārūḷho, orūḷho, virūḷho, nirūḷho.
anya-e0201n0:5463: Tipaccayamhi-ruhanaṃ rūḷhi, niruhanaṃ nirūḷhi, viruhanaṃ virūḷhi.
anya-e0201n0:5466: Samāsaṭṭhāne tvāpaccayassa pānubandho yo hoti vā. Pānubandho ‘pye sissā’ti visesanattho. ‘Hassa vipallāso’ti ha, yānaṃ vipariyāyo.
anya-e0201n0:5467: Byuyha, paribyuyha. Byūhitvā, viyūhitvā vā, vigāyha, vigāhitvā, ogāyha, ogāhitvā, ajjhogāyha, ajjhogāhitvā.
anya-e0201n0:5468: Bahulādhikārā asamāsepi pyo hoti, guyha, gūhitvā, niguyha, nigūhitvā, oguyha, ogūhitvā.
anya-e0201n0:5470: Bāha-nivāraṇe, dīgho, bāyha, bāhitvā, paṭibāyha, paṭibāhitvā.
anya-e0201n0:5471: Buha-uddharaṇe papubbo, pabbuyha. Samūlaṃ taṇhaṃ pabbuyha saṃ. ni. 1.159 (taṇhamabbumha).
anya-e0201n0:5472: Āpubbo-abbuyha, ‘‘abbuhe sallamattano’’ti ādīsu viya. Pamuyha, pamuyhitvā, vimuyha, vimuyhitvā, sammuyha, sammuyhitvā, āruyha, āruhitvā, ārohitvā, oruyha, orohitvā.
anya-e0201n0:5476: Atha tvā, tvāna, tunānaṃ vikāro vuccate.
anya-e0201n0:5479: Idhātumhā parassa tvāssa cco hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:5480: Pecca, samecca, abhisamecca, avecca, anvecca, apecca, upecca, samupecca, adhicca, aticca, paṭicca.
anya-e0201n0:5482: 759. Sādhikarā raccariccā ka. 598; rū. 643; nī. 1203; ‘sāsādhikarā cacariccā’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n0:5483: Santa, adhiparā karamhā tvāssa racca, riccā honti vā, suttavibhattaṃ idha labbhati.
anya-e0201n0:5486: Suttavibhatte-attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati jā. 2.21.461, abhisaṅkhacca bhojanaṃ.
anya-e0201n0:5487: 760. Hanā racco ka. 598; rū. 643; nī. 1203. ‘sāsādhikarā cacariccā’ (bahūsu).
